GSP33brssbh2u:9: sa eva ca sarveṣāṃ na ātmetyetadvedāntavākyasamanvayapratipādanena pratipāditam /
GSP33brssbh2u:13: prativedāntaṃ ca sṛṣṭyādiprakriyāyā avigītatvamisyarthajātasya pratipādanāya dvitīyo 'dhyāya ārabhyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:19: smṛtiśca tantrākhyā paramarṣipraṇītā śiṣṭaparigṛhītā anyāśca tadanusīriṇyaḥ smṛtayaḥ,
GSP33brssbh2u:21: tāsu hyacetanaṃ pradhānaṃ svatantraṃ jagataḥ kāraṇamupanibadhyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:32: kathaṃ punarīkṣatyādibhyo hetubhyo brahmaiva sarvajñaṃ jagataḥ kāraṇamityavadhāritaḥ śrutyarthaḥ smṛtyanavakāśadoṣaprasaṅgena punarākṣipyate
GSP33brssbh2u:34: paratantraprajñāstu prāyeṇa janāḥ svātantryeṇa śrutyarthamavadhārayitumaśaknuvantaḥ prakhyātapraṇetṛkāsu smṛtiṣvavalamberan /
GSP33brssbh2u:36: asmatkṛte ca vyākhyāne na viśvasyurbahumānātsmṛtīnāṃ praṇetṛṣu /
GSP33brssbh2u:38: śrutiśca bhavati- 'ṛṣiṃ prasūtaṃ kapilaṃ yastamagre jñānairbibharti jāyamānaṃ ca paśyet' (śve. 5.2) iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:41: tasmādapi smṛtibalena vedāntā vyākhyeyā iti punarākṣepaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:45: tā udāhariṣyāmaḥ - 'yattatsūkṣmamavijñeyam' iti paraṃ brahma prakṛtya 'sa hyantarātmā
GSP33brssbh2u:46: bhūtānāṃ kṣetrajñaśceti kathyate' iti coktvā 'tasmādavyaktamutpannaṃ triguṇaṃ dvijasattama' ityāha /
GSP33brssbh2u:49: sa sargakāle ca karoti sarvaṃ saṃhārakāle ca tadatti bhūyaḥ' iti purāṇe /
GSP33brssbh2u:50: bhagavadgītāsu ca- 'ahaṃ kṛtsnasya jagataḥ prabhavaḥ pralayastathā' (bha.gī. 7.6) iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:51: paramātmānameva ca prakṛtyāpastamabaḥ paṭhati- 'tasmātkāyāḥ prabhavanti sarve sa mūlaṃ śāśvatikaḥ sa nityaḥ (dha.sū. 1.8.23.2) iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:55: vipratipattau ca smṛtīnāmavaśyakartavye 'nyataraparigrahe 'nyataraparityāge ca śrutyanusāriṇyaḥ smṛtayaḥ pramāṇamanapekṣyā itarāḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:56: taduktaṃ pramāṇalakṣaṇe- 'virodhe tvanapekṣaṃ syādasti hyanumānam' (jai.sū. 1.3.3) iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:57: nacātīndriyānarthañśrutimantareṇa kaścidupalabhata iti śakyaṃ saṃbhāvayituṃ nimittābhāvāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:62: tataśca pūrvasiddhāyāścodanāyā artho na paścimasiddhapuruṣavacanavaśenātiśaṅkituṃ śakyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:63: siddhavyapāśrayakalpanāyāmapi bahutvātsiddhānāṃ pradraśitena prakāreṇa smṛtivipratipattau satyāṃ na śrutivyapāśrayādanyannirṇayakāraṇamasti
GSP33brssbh2u:66: tasmāttasyāpi smṛtivipratipattyupanyāsena smṛtyanusārāviṣayavivecanena ca sanmārge prajñā saṃgrahaṇīyā /
GSP33brssbh2u:67: yā tu śrutiḥ kapilasya jñānātiśayaṃ pradarśayantī pradarśitā na tayā śrutiviruddhamapi kāpilaṃ mataṃ śraddhātuṃ śakyaṃ,
GSP33brssbh2u:69: anyasya ca kapilasya sagaraputrāṇāṃ pratapturvāsudevanāmnaḥ smaraṇāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:71: bhavati cānyā manormāhātmyaṃ prakhyāpayantī śrutiḥ - 'yadvai kiñca manuravadattadbheṣajam' (tai.saṃ 2.2.10.2) iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:74: ' (12.11) iti sarvātmatvadarśanaṃ praśaṃsatā kāpilaṃ mataṃ nindyata iti gamyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:77: mahābhārate 'pi ca 'bahavaḥ puruṣā brahmannutāho eka eva tu' iti vicārya 'bahavaḥ
GSP33brssbh2u:81: ' ityupakramya 'mamāntarātmā tava ca ye cānye dehasaṃsthitāḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:87: tatra ko mohaḥ kaḥ śokaḥ ekatvamanupaśyataḥ' (ī. 7)
GSP33brssbh2u:89: ataśca siddhamātmabhedakalpanayāpi kapilasya tantraṃ vedaviruddhaṃ vedānusārimanuvacanaviruddhaṃ ca,
GSP33brssbh2u:91: vedasya hi nirapekṣaṃ svārthe prāmāṇyaṃ raveriva rūpaviṣaye /
GSP33brssbh2u:92: puruṣavacasāṃ tu mūlāntarāpekṣaṃ vaktusmṛtivyavahitaṃ ceti viprakarṣaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:110: pradhānāditarāṇi yāni pradhānapariṇāmatvaṃ na samṛtau kalpitāni mahadādīni na tāni vede loke vopalabhyante /
GSP33brssbh2u:113: yadapi kvacittatparamiva śravaṇamavabhāsate tadapyatatparaṃ vyākhyātam 'ānumānikamapyekeṣām' (bra. 1.4.1) ityatra /
GSP33brssbh2u:125: samyagdarśanābhyupāyo hi yogo vede vihitaḥ 'śrotavyo mantavyo nididhyāsitavyaḥ' (bṛ. 2.4.5) iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:127: ityādinā cāsanādikalpanāpuraḥsaraṃ bahuprapañcaṃ yogavidhānaṃ śvetāśvataropaniṣadi dṛśyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:128: liṅgāni ca vaidikāni yogaviṣayāṇi sahasraśa upalabhyante 'tāṃ yogamiti manyante sthirāmindriyadhāraṇām' (kā. 2.6.18)
GSP33brssbh2u:131: yogaśāstre 'pi 'atha tattvadarśanopāyo yogaḥ' iti samyagdarśanābhyupāyatvenaiva yogoṅgīkriyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:135: satīṣvapyadhyātmaviṣayāsu bahvīṣu smṛtiṣu sāṃkhyayogasmṛtyoreva nirākaraṇe yatnaḥ kṛtaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:139: 'tatkāraṇaṃ sāṃkhyayogābhipannaṃ jñātvā devaṃ mucyate sarvapāśaiḥ' (śvaṃ. 6.13) iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:140: nirākaraṇaṃ tu na sāṃkhyajñānena vedanirapekṣeṇa yogamārgeṇa vā niḥśreyasamadhigamyata iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:141: śrutirhi vaidikādātmaikatvavijñānādanyanniḥśreyasasādhanaṃ vārayati 'tameva viditvātimṛtyumeti nānyaḥ panthā vidyate 'yanāya' (śvaṃ. 3.8) iti
GSP33brssbh2u:142: dvaitino hi te sāṃkhyā yogāśca nātmaikatvadarśinaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:144: vaidikameva tatra jñānaṃ dhyānaṃ ca sāṃkhyayogaśabdābhyāmabhilapyate pratyāsatterityavagantavyam /
GSP33brssbh2u:145: yena tvaṃśena na virudhyete teneṣṭameva sāṃkhyayogasmṛtyoḥ sāvakāśatvam /
GSP33brssbh2u:152: tattvajñānaṃ tu vedāntavākyebhya eva bhavati 'nāvedavinmanute taṃ bṛhantam' (tai. brā. 3.12.9.7)
GSP33brssbh2u:159: na vilakṣaṇatvād asya tathātvaṃ ca śabdāt / BBs_2,1.4 /
GSP33brssbh2u:160: brahmāsya jagato nimittakāraṇaṃ prakṛtiścetyasya pakṣasyākṣepaḥ smṛtinimittaḥ parihṛtaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:163: nanu dharma iva brahmaṇyanapekṣa āgamo bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssbh2u:164: bhavedayamavaṣṭambho yadi pramāṇāntarānavagāhya āgamamātraprameyo 'yamarthaḥ syādanuṣṭheyarūpa iva dharmaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:166: pariniṣpanne ca vastuni pramāṇāntarāṇāmastyavakāśo yathā pṛthivyādiṣu /
GSP33brssbh2u:171: anubhavāvasānaṃ ca brahmavijñānamavidyāyā nivartakaṃ mokṣasādhanaṃ ca dṛṣṭaphalatayeṣyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:172: śrutirapi- 'śrotavyo mantavyaḥ' iti śravaṇavyatirekeṇa mananaṃ vidadhatī tarkamapyatrādartavyaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssbh2u:174: yaduktaṃ cetanaṃ brahma jagataḥ kāraṇaṃ prakṛtiriti /
GSP33brssbh2u:178: idaṃ hi brahmakāryatvenābhipreyamāṇaṃ jagat brahmavilakṣaṇamacetanamaśuddhaṃ ca dṛśyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:179: brahma ca jagadvilakṣaṇaṃ cetanaṃ śuddhaṃ ca śrūyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:181: nahi rucakādayo vikārā mṛtprakṛtikā bhavanti śarāvādayo vā suvarṇaprakṛtikāḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:182: mṛdaiva tu mṛdānvitā vikārāḥ kriyante suvarṇena ca suvarṇānvitāḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:183: tathedamapi jagadacetanaṃ sukhaduḥkhamohānvitaṃ sadacetanasyaiva sukhaduḥkhamohātmakasya kāraṇasya kāryaṃ bhavitumarhatīti na vilakṣaṇasya brahmaṇaḥ
GSP33brssbh2u:189: nanu cetanamapi kāryakāraṇaṃ svāmibhṛtyanyāyena bhokturupakariṣyati / na /
GSP33brssbh2u:191: yo hyekasya cetanasya parigraho buddhyādicetanabhāgaḥ sa evānyasya cetanasyopakaroti natu svayameva cetanaścetanāntarasyopakarotyapakaroti vā
GSP33brssbh2u:197: yo 'pi kaścidācakṣīta śrutvā jagataścetanaprakṛtikatāṃ tadbalenaiva samastaṃ jagaccetanamavagamayiṣyāmi /
GSP33brssbh2u:200: yathā spaṣṭacaitanyānāmapyātmanāṃ svāpamūrcchādyavasthāsu caitanyaṃ na vibhāvyata evaṃ kāṣṭhaloṣṭādīnāmapi caitanyaṃ na vibhāvayiṣyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:201: etasmādeva ca vibhāvitāvibhāvitatvakṛtādviśeṣādrūpādibhāvābhāvābhyāṃ ca kāryakāraṇānāmātmanāṃ ca cetanatvāviśeṣe 'pi guṇapradhānabhāvo na virotsyate
GSP33brssbh2u:202: yathā ca pārthivatvāviśeṣe 'pi māṃsasūpaudanādīnāṃ pratyātmavartino viśeṣātparasparopakāritvaṃ bhavatyevamihāpi bhaviṣyati /
GSP33brssbh2u:206: nacetaradapi vilakṣaṇatvaṃ parihartuṃ śakyata ityāha- tathātvaṃ ca śabdāditi /
GSP33brssbh2u:207: anavagamyamānamevaṃ hīdaṃ loke samastasya vastunaścetanatvaṃ cetanaprakṛtikatvaśravaṇācchabdaśaraṇatayā kevalayotprekṣata,
GSP33brssbh2u:222: indriyaviṣayāpi 'te heme prāṇā ahaṃśreyase vivadamānā brahma jagmuḥ' (bṛ. 6.1.7)
GSP33brssbh2u:228: na khalu mṛdabravīdityevañjātīyakayā śrutyā bhūtendriyāṇāṃ cetanatvamāśaṅkanīyam /
GSP33brssbh2u:230: mṛdādyabhimāninyo vāgādyabhimāninyaśca cetanā devatā vadanasaṃvadanādiṣu cetanociteṣu vyavahāreṣu vyapadiśyante na bhūtendriyamātram /
GSP33brssbh2u:233: viśeṣo hi bhoktṛṇāṃ bhūtendriyāṇāṃ ca cetanācetanapravibhāgalakṣaṇaḥ prāgabhihitaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:235: apica kauṣītakinaḥ prāṇasaṃvāde karaṇamātrāśaṅkāvinivṛttaye 'dhiṣṭhātṛcetanaparigrahāya devatāśabdena viśiṣanti- 'etā ha vai devatā ahaṃśreyase vivadamānāḥ' iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:236: 'tā vā etāḥ sarvā devatāḥ prāṇe niḥśreyasaṃ viditvā' (2.14) iti ca /
GSP33brssbh2u:239: ityevamādikā ca śrutiḥ karaṇeṣvanugrāhikāṃ devatāmanugatāṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssbh2u:240: prāṇasaṃvādavākyaśeṣe ca 'te ha prāṇāḥ prajāpatiṃ pitarametyocuḥ' (chā. 5.1.7)
GSP33brssbh2u:245: 'tatteja aikṣata' ityapi parasyā eva devatāyā adhiṣṭātryāḥ svavikāreṣvanugatāyā iyamīkṣā vyapadiśyata iti draṣṭavyam /
GSP33brssbh2u:256: dṛśyate hi loke cetanatvena prasiddhebhyaḥ puruṣādibhyo vilakṣaṇānāṃ keśanakhādīnāmutpattiḥ,
GSP33brssbh2u:260: ucyate- evamapi kiñcidacetanaṃ cetanasyāyatanabhāvamupagacchati kiñcinnetyastyeva vailakṣaṇyam /
GSP33brssbh2u:261: mahāṃścāyaṃ pāriṇāmikaḥ svabhāvaviprakarṣaḥ puruṣādīnāṃ keśanakhādīnāṃ ca svarūpādibhedāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:264: athocyetāsti kaścitpārthivatvādisvabhāvaḥ puruṣādīnāṃ keśanakhādiṣvanuvartamāno gomayādīnāṃ vṛścikādiṣviti /
GSP33brssbh2u:266: vilakṣaṇatvena ca kāraṇena brahmaprakṛtitvaṃ jagato dūṣayatā kimaśeṣasya brahmasvabhāvasyānanuvartanaṃ vilakṣaṇatvamabhipreyata uta yasya kasyacidasya caitanyasyeti vaktavyam /
GSP33brssbh2u:270: dṛśyate hi sattālakṣaṇo brahmasvabhāva ākāśādiṣvanuvartamāna ityuktam /
GSP33brssbh2u:272: kiṃ hi yaccaitanyenānanvitaṃ tadabrahmaprakṛtikaṃ dṛṣṭamiti brahmavādinaṃ pratyudāhriyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:281: tathāca śrutiḥ - 'naiṣā tarkeṇa matirāpaneyā proktānyenaiva sujñānāya preṣṭha' (kā. 1.2.9) iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:284: iti caite ṛcau siddhānāmapīśvarāṇāṃ durbodhatāṃ jagatkāraṇasya darśayataḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:285: smṛtirapi bhavati- 'acintyāḥ khalu ye bhāvā na tāṃstarkeṇa yojayet' iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:287: 'na me viduḥ suragaṇāḥ prabhavaṃ na maharṣayaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:290: yadapi śravaṇavyatirekeṇa mananaṃ vidadhacchabda eva tarkamapyādartavyaṃ darśayatītyuktam /
GSP33brssbh2u:299: vijñānaṃ cāvijñānaṃ ca iti cetanācetanavibhāgaśravaṇaṃ vibhāvanāvibhāvanābhyāṃ caitanyasya
GSP33brssbh2u:303: paramakāraṇasya hyatra samastajagadātmanā samavasthānaṃ śrāvyate 'vijñānaṃ cāvijñānaṃ cābhavat' iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:306: pratyuktatvāttu vilakṣaṇatvasya yathāśrutyaiva kāraṇaṃ grahītavyaṃ bhavati // 6 // @----------------------
GSP33brssbh2u:308: eṣā vedāntaśāstrajanyā matistarkeṇa svamatyūhamātreṇāpaneyā bādhārhā na /
GSP33brssbh2u:310: kintu anyena nipuṇenācāryeṇa proktaprabodhitā satī sujñānāya sākṣātkārāya bhavati /
GSP33brssbh2u:312: iyaṃ visṛṣṭirākāśādisṛṣṭiḥ kutaḥ kasmājjātā kasmācca sthitiṃ prāptetyaddhā tattvena ko veda, na ko 'pi /
GSP33brssbh2u:315: asad iti cen na pratiṣedhamātratvāt / BBs_2,1.7 /
GSP33brssbh2u:316: yadi cetanaṃ śuddhaṃ śabdavihīnaṃ ca brahma tadviparūtasyācetanasyāśuddhasya śabdādimataśca kāryasya kāraṇamiṣyetāsattarhi kāryaṃ prāgutpatteriti prasajyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:321: nahyayaṃ pratiṣedhaḥ prāgutpatteḥ sattvaṃ kāryasya pratiṣeddhuṃ śaknoti /
GSP33brssbh2u:323: yathaiva hīdānāmapīdaṃ kāryaṃ kāraṇātmanā sadevaṃ prāgutpatterapīti gamyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:330: natu śabdādimatkāryaṃ kāraṇātmanā hīnaṃ prāgutpatteridānīṃ vāsti /
GSP33brssbh2u:335: brahmakāraṇamabhyupagamyeta tadapītau pralaye pratisaṃsṛjyamānaṃ kāryaṃ kāraṇāvibhāgamāpadyamānaṃ
GSP33brssbh2u:336: kāraṇamātmīyena dharmeṇa dūṣayedityapītau kāraṇasyāpi brahmaṇaḥ kāryasyevāśuddhyādirūpaprasaṅgātsarvajñaṃ
GSP33brssbh2u:339: apica bhoktṛṇāṃ pareṇa brahmaṇāvibhāgaṃ gatānāṃ karmādinimittapralaye 'pi punarutpattāvabhyupagamyamānāyāṃ muktānāmapi punaruttattiprasaṅgādasamañjasam
GSP33brssbh2u:350: santi hi dṛṣṭāntā yathā kāraṇamapigacchatkāryaṃ kāraṇamātmīyena dharmeṇa na dūṣayati /
GSP33brssbh2u:351: tadyathā śarāvādayo mṛtprakṛtikā vikārā vibhāgāvasthāyāmuccāvacamadhyamaprabhedāḥ santaḥ punaḥ prakṛtimapigacchanto na tāmātmīyena dharmeṇa saṃsṛjanti /
GSP33brssbh2u:352: rucakādayaśca suvarṇavikārā apītau na suvarṇamātmīyena dharmeṇa saṃsṛjanti /
GSP33brssbh2u:353: pṛthivīvikāraścaturvidho bhūtagrāmo na pṛthivīmapītāvātmīyena dharmeṇa saṃsṛjati /
GSP33brssbh2u:355: apītireva hi na saṃbhavedyadi kāraṇe kāryaṃ svadharmeṇaivāvatiṣṭheta /
GSP33brssbh2u:356: ananyatve 'pi kāryakāraṇayoḥ kāryasya kāraṇātmatvaṃ natu kāraṇasya kāryātmatvaṃ 'ārambhaṇaśabdādibhyaḥ' iti vakṣyāmaḥ (bra.sū. 2.1.14) /
GSP33brssbh2u:357: atyalpaṃ cedamucyate kāryamapītāvātmīyena dharmeṇa kāraṇaṃ saṃsṛjediti /
GSP33brssbh2u:364: ityevamādyābhirhi śrutibhiraviśeṣeṇa triṣvapi kāleṣu kāryasya kāraṇānanyatvaṃ śrāvyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:365: tatra yaḥ parihāraḥ kāryasya taddharmāṇāṃ cāvidyādhyāropitatvānna taiḥ kāraṇaṃ saṃsṛjyata iti,
GSP33brssbh2u:367: asti cāyamaparo dṛṣṭānto yathā svayaṃ prasāritayā māyayā māyāvī triṣvapi kāleṣu na saṃspaśyate,
GSP33brssbh2u:369: evaṃ paramātmāpi saṃsāramāyayā na saṃspṛśyata iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:370: yathā ca svapnadṛgekaḥ svapnadarśanamāyayā na saṃspṛśyata iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:374: atroktaṃ vedāntārthasaṃpradāyavidbhirācāryaiḥ - 'anādimāyayā supto yadā jīvaḥ prabudhyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:376: tatra yaduktamapītau kāraṇasyāpi kāryasyeva sthaulyādidoṣaprasaṅga ityetadayuktam /
GSP33brssbh2u:377: yatpunaretaduktaṃ samastasya vibhāgasyāvibhāgaprāpteḥ punarvibhāgenotpattau niyamakāraṇaṃ nopapadyata iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:380: yathāhi suṣuptisamādhyādāvapi satyāṃ svābhāvikyāmavibhāgaprāptau mithyājñānasyānapoditatvātpūrvavatpunaḥ prabodhe vibhāgo bhavatyevamihāpi bhaviṣyati
GSP33brssbh2u:381: śrutiścātra bhavati- 'imāḥ sarvāḥ prajāḥ sati saṃpadya na viduḥ sati saṃpadyāmaha
GSP33brssbh2u:382: iti ta iha vyāghro vā siṃho vā vṛko vā varāho vā kīṭo vā pataṅgo vā daṃśo vā maśako
GSP33brssbh2u:384: yathā hyavibhāge 'pi paramātmani mithyājñānapratibaddho vibhāgavyavahāraḥ svapnavadavyāhataḥ sthito dṛśyate,
GSP33brssbh2u:388: yaḥ punarayamante 'paro vikalpa utprekṣito 'thedaṃ jagadapītāvapi vibhaktameva pareṇa brahmaṇāvatiṣṭheteti,
GSP33brssbh2u:394: iha suṣupteḥ prāk prabodhe yena jātyādinā vibhaktā bhavanti tadā punarutthānakāle tathaiva bhavantīti vibhāgoktiḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:396: svapakṣe caite prativādinaḥ sādhāraṇā doṣāḥ prāduṣyuḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:404: prākpralayātpratipuruṣaṃ ye niyatā bhedā na te tathaiva punarutpatau niyantuṃ śakyante kāraṇābhāvāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:407: ye nāpadyante teṣāṃ pradhānakāryatvaṃ na prāpnotītyevamete doṣāḥ sādhāraṇatvānnānyatarasminpakṣe codayitavyā bhavantītyadoṣatāmevaiṣāṃ draḍhayati
GSP33brssbh2u:410: tarkāpratiṣṭhānād apy anyathānumeyam iti ced evam apy anirmokṣaprasaṅgaḥ / BBs_2,1.11 /
GSP33brssbh2u:415: tairapyutprekṣitāḥ santastato 'nyairābhāsyanta iti na pratiṣṭhitatvaṃ tarkāṇāṃ śakyamāśrayituṃ,
GSP33brssbh2u:417: atha kasyacitprasiddhamāhātmyasya kapilasya cānyasya vā saṃmatastarkaḥ pratiṣṭhita ityāśrīyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:421: nahi pratiṣṭhitastarka eva nāstīti śakyate vaktum /
GSP33brssbh2u:425: atītavartamānādhvasāmyena hyanāgate 'pyadhvani sukhaduḥkhaprāptiparihārāya pravartamāno loko dṛśyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:426: śrutyarthavipratipattau cārthābhāsanirākaraṇena samyagarthanirdhāraṇaṃ tarkeṇaiva vākyavṛttinirūpaṇarūpeṇa kriyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:427: manurapi caivaṃ manyate- 'pratyakṣamanumānaṃ ca śāstraṃ ca vividhāgamam /
GSP33brssbh2u:435: nahi pūrvajo mūḍha āsīdityātmanāpi mūḍhena bhavitavyamiti kiñcidasti pramāṇam /
GSP33brssbh2u:438: yadyapi kvacidviṣaye tarkasya pratiṣṭhitatvamupalakṣyate tathāpi prakṛte tāvadviṣaye prasajyata evāpratiṣṭhitatvadoṣādanirmokṣastarkasya /
GSP33brssbh2u:445: loke tadviṣayaṃ jñānaṃ samyagjñānamityucyate yathāgniruṣṇā iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:448: yaddhi kenacittārkikeṇedameva samyagjñānamiti pratipāditaṃ tadapareṇa vyutthāpyate,
GSP33brssbh2u:449: tenāpi pratiṣṭhāpitaṃ tato 'pareṇa vyutthāpyata iti prasiddhaṃ loke /
GSP33brssbh2u:451: naca pradhānavādī tarkavidāmuttama iti sarvāstārkikaiḥ parigṛhīto yena tadīyaṃ mataṃ samyagjñānamiti pratipadyemahi /
GSP33brssbh2u:452: naca śakyante 'tītānāgatavartamānāstārkikā ekasmindeśe kāle ca samāhartuṃ yena tanmatirekarūpaikārthaviṣayā samyaṅmatiriti syāta /
GSP33brssbh2u:453: vedasya tu nityatve vijñānotpattihetutve ca sati vyavasthitārthaviṣayatvopapattestajjanitasya jñānasya samyaktvamatītānāgatavartamānaiḥ sarvairapi tārkikairapahnotumaśakyam /
GSP33brssbh2u:456: ata āgamavaśenāgamānusāritarkavaśena ca cetanaṃ brahmajagataḥ kāraṇaṃ prakṛtiśceti sthitam // 11 // @----------------------
GSP33brssbh2u:467: idānīmaṇvādivādavyapāśrayeṇāpi kaiścinmandamatibhirvedāntavākyeṣu punastarkanimitta ākṣepa āśaṅkyata ityataḥ pradhānamallanibarhaṇanyāyenātidiśati
GSP33brssbh2u:468: parigṛhyanta iti parigrahāḥ na parigrahā aparigrahāḥ śiṣṭānāmaparigrahāḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:472: tulyamātrāpi paramagambhīrasya jagatkāraṇasya tarkānavagāhyatvaṃ tarkasyāpratiṣṭhitatvamanyathānumāne 'pyavimokṣa āgamavirodhaścetyevañjātīyakaṃ nirākaraṇam // 12 //
GSP33brssbh2u:474: bhoktrāpatter avibhāgaś cet syāl lokavat / BBs_2,1.13 /
GSP33brssbh2u:476: yadyapi śrutiḥ pramāṇaṃ svaviṣaye bhavati tathāpi pramāṇāntareṇa viṣayāpahāre 'nyaparā bhavitumarti /
GSP33brssbh2u:481: kathaṃ punaḥ pramāṇāntaraprasiddhor'thaḥ śrutyā bādhyata iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:482: atrocyate- prasiddho hyayaṃ bhoktṛbhogyavibhāgo loke bhoktā cetanaḥ śārīro bhogyāḥ śabdādayo viṣayā iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:483: yathā bhoktā devadatto bhojya odana iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:484: tasya ca vibhāgasyābhāvaḥ prasajyeta yadi bhoktā bhogyabhāvamāpadyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:490: upapadyata evāyamasmatpakṣe 'pi vibhāgaḥ evaṃ loke dṛṣṭatvāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:491: tathāhi- samudrādudakātmano 'nanyatve 'pi tadvikārāṇāṃ phenavīcītaraṅgādīnāmitaretaravibhāga itaretarasaṃśleṣādilakṣaṇaśca vyavahāra upalabhyate
GSP33brssbh2u:507: abhyupagamya cemaṃ vyāvahārikaṃ bhoktṛbhogyalakṣaṇaṃ vibhāgaṃ syāllokavaditi parihāroṣa'bhihitaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:515: ekavijñānena sarvavijñānaṃ pratijñāya dṛṣṭāntāpekṣāyāmucyate- 'yathā somyaikena mṛtpiṇḍena
GSP33brssbh2u:516: sarvaṃ mṛnmayaṃ vijñātaṃ syādvācārambhaṇaṃ vikāro nāmadheyaṃ mṛttiketyeva satyam' (chā. 6.1.1) iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:517: etaduktaṃ bhavati- ekena mṛtpiṇḍena paramārthato mṛdātmanā vijñātena sarvaṃ mṛnmayaṃ ghaṭaśarāvodañcanādikaṃ mṛdātmakatvāviśeṣādvijñātaṃ bhavet
GSP33brssbh2u:518: yato vācārambhaṇaṃ vikāro nāmadheyaṃ vācaiva kevalamastītyārabhyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:523: tatra śrutādvācārambhaṇaśabdāddārṣṭāntike 'pi brahmavyatirekeṇa kāryajātasyābhāva iti gamyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:525: bravīti- 'apāgādagneragnitvaṃ vācārambhaṇaṃ vikāro nāmadheyaṃ trīṇi rūpāṇītyeva satyam'
GSP33brssbh2u:527: ārambhaṇaśabdādibhya ityādiśabdāt 'aitadātmyamidaṃ sarvaṃ tatsatyaṃ sa ātmā tattvamasi' (chā. 6.8.7)
GSP33brssbh2u:540: yathā vṛkṣa ityanekatvaṃ śākhā iti nānātvam /
GSP33brssbh2u:544: nānātvāṃśena tu karmakāṇḍāśrayau laukikavaidikavyavahārau setsyata iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:549: dārṣṭāntike 'pi 'aitadātmyamidaṃ sarvaṃ tatsatyam' iti ca paramakāraṇasyaivaikasya satyatvāvadhāraṇāt 'sa ātmā tattvamasi śvetaketo' iti ca śārīrasya brahmabhāvopadeśāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:550: svayaṃ prasiddhaṃ hyetaccharīrasya brahmātmatvamupadiśyate na yatnāntaraprasādhyam /
GSP33brssbh2u:551: ataścedaṃ śāstrīyaṃ brahmātmatvamavagamyamānaṃ svābhāvikasya śārīrātmatvasya bādhakaṃ saṃpadyate,
GSP33brssbh2u:553: bādhite ca śārīrātmatvasya tadāśrayaḥ samastaḥ svābhāviko vyavahāro bādhito bhavati yatprasiddhaye nānātvāṃśo 'paro brahmaṇaḥ kalpyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:556: ityādinā brahmātmatvadarśinaṃ prati samastasya kriyākārakaphalalakṣaṇasya vyavahārasyābhāvam /
GSP33brssbh2u:559: taskaradṛṣṭāntena cānṛtābhisaṃdhasya bandhanaṃ satyābhisaṃdhasya ca mokṣaṃ darśayannekatvamevaikaṃ pāramārthikaṃ darśayati (chā. 6.16) /
GSP33brssbh2u:561: ubhayasatyatāyāṃ hi kathaṃ vyavahāragocaro 'pi janturanṛtābhisaṃdha ityucyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:562: 'mṛtyoḥ sa mṛtyumāpnoti ya iha nāneva paśyati' (bṛ. 4.4.19)
GSP33brssbh2u:576: vikārāneva tvahaṃ mametyavidyāyāmātmīyena bhāvena sarvo jantuḥ pratipadyate svābhāvikīṃ brahmātmatāṃ hitvā /
GSP33brssbh2u:578: yathā suptasya prākṛtasya janasya svapna uccāvacānbhāvānpaśyato niścitameva pratyakṣābhimataṃ vijñānaṃ bhavati prākprabodhāt,
GSP33brssbh2u:580: kathaṃ tvasatyena vedāntavākyena satyasya brahmātmatvasya pratipattirupapadyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:587: tatra brūmaḥ- yadyapi svapnadarśanāvasthasya sarpadaṃśanodakasnānādikāryamanṛtaṃ tathāpi tadavagatiḥ satyameva phalaṃ,
GSP33brssbh2u:589: nahi svapnādutthitaḥ svapnadṛṣṭaṃ sarpadaṃśanodakasnānādikāryaṃ mithyeti manyamānastadavagatimapi mithyeti manyate kaścit /
GSP33brssbh2u:591: tathāca śrutiḥ - 'yadā karmasu kāmyeṣu striyaṃ svapneṣu paśyati /
GSP33brssbh2u:593: ityasatyena svapnadarśanena satyāyāḥ samṛddheḥ pratipattiṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssbh2u:594: tathā pratyakṣadarśaneṣu keṣucidariṣṭeṣu jāteṣu 'na ciramiva jīviṣyatīti vidyāt'
GSP33brssbh2u:595: ityuktvā 'atha svapnāḥ puruṣaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ kṛṣṇadantaṃ paśyati sa enaṃ hanti' ityādinā
GSP33brssbh2u:596: tena tenāsatyenaiva svapnadarśanena satyaṃ maraṇaṃ sūcyata iti darśayati /
GSP33brssbh2u:597: prasiddhaṃ cedaṃ loke 'nvayavyatirekakuśalānāmīdṛśena svapnadarśanena sādhvāgamaḥ sūcyata īdṛśenāsādhvāgama iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:599: apicāntyamidaṃ pramāṇamātmaikatvasya pratipādakaṃ nātaḥ paraṃ kiñcidākāṅkṣyamasti /
GSP33brssbh2u:600: yathāhi loke yajetetyukte kiṃ kena kathamityākāṅkṣyate naivaṃ 'tattvamasi' 'ahaṃ brahmāsmi' ityukte kiñcidanyadākāṅkṣyamasti,
GSP33brssbh2u:607: avagatisādhanānāṃ ca śravaṇādīnāṃ vedānuvacanādīnāṃ ca vidhānāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:612: tasmādantyena pramāṇena pratipādita ātmaikatve samastasya prācīnasya bhedavyavahārasya bādhitatvānnānekātmakabrahmakalpanāvakāśo 'sti /
GSP33brssbh2u:614: pariṇāmino hi mṛdādayor'thā loke samadhigatā iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:620: nahyekasya brahmaṇaḥ pariṇāmadharmatvaṃ tadrahitatvaṃ ca śkyaṃ pratipattum /
GSP33brssbh2u:625: naca yathā brahmaṇa ātmaikatvadarśanaṃ mokṣasādhanamevaṃ jagadākārapariṇāmitvadarśanamapi svatantrameva kasmaicitphalāyābhipreyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:627: kūṭasthabrahmātmavijñānādeva hi phalaṃ darśayati śāstram- 'sa eṣa neti netyātmā' ityupakramya 'abhayaṃ vai janaka prāpto 'si' (bṛ. 4.2.4)
GSP33brssbh2u:630: phalasiddhau satyāṃ yattatrāphalaṃ śrūyate brahmaṇo jagadākārapariṇāmitvādi tadbrahmadarśanopāyatvenaiva viniyujyate,
GSP33brssbh2u:635: kūṭasthabrahmātmavādina ekatvaikāntyādīśitrīśitavyābhāva īśvarakāraṇapratijñāvirodha iti cet / na /
GSP33brssbh2u:641: sā pratijñā tadavasthaiva na tadviruddhor'thaḥ punarihocyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:644: sarvajñasyeśvarasyātmabhūta ivāvidyākalpite nāmarūpe tattvānyatvābhyāmanirvacanīye saṃsāraprapañcabījabhūte sarvajñasyeśvarasya māyāśaktiḥ prakṛtiriti ca śrutismṛtyorabhilapyete /
GSP33brssbh2u:645: tābhyāmanyaḥ sarvajña īśvaraḥ 'ākāśo vai nāma nāmarūpayornirvahitā te yadantarā tadbrahma' (chā. 8.14.1) iti śruteḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:647: , 'sarvāṇi rūpāṇi vicitya dhīro nāmāni kṛtvābhivadanyadāste' (tai. ā. 3.12.7)
GSP33brssbh2u:652: sa ca svātmabhūtāneva ghaṭākāśasthānīyānavidyāpratyupasthāpitanāmarūpakṛtakāryakaraṇasaṃghātānurodhino jīvākhyānvijñānātmanaḥ pratīṣṭe vyavahāraviṣaye
GSP33brssbh2u:654: ca na paramārthato vidyāyāpāstasarvopādhisvarūpa ātmanīśitrīśitavyasarvajñatvādivyavahāra upapadyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:655: tathācoktam- 'yatra nānyatpaśyati nānyacchṛṇoti nānyadvijānāti sa bhūmā' (chā. 7.24.1)
GSP33brssbh2u:658: evaṃ paramārthāvasthāyāṃ sarvavyavahārābhāvaṃ vadanti vedāntāḥ sarve /
GSP33brssbh2u:659: tatheśvaragītāsvapi- 'na kartṛtvaṃ na karmāṇi lokasya sṛjati prabhuḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:661: nādatte kasyacitpāpaṃ na caiva sukṛtaṃ vibhuḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:664: vyavahārāvasthāyāṃ tūktaḥ śrutāvapīśvarādivyavahāraḥ 'eṣa sarveśvara eṣa bhūtādhipatireṣa bhūtapāla eṣa seturvidhāraṇa eṣāṃ lokānāmasaṃbhedāya' (bṛ. 4.4.22) iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:668: vyavahārābhiprāyeṇa tu syāllokavaditi mahāsamudrasthānīyatāṃ brahmaṇaḥ kathayati /
GSP33brssbh2u:669: apratyākhyāyaiva kāryaprapañcaṃ pariṇāmaprakriyāṃ cāśrayati saguṇopāsaneṣūpayokṣyata iti // 14 // @----------------------
GSP33brssbh2u:670: FN: dṛṣṭaṃ prātītikaṃ naṣṭhamanityaṃ yatsvarūpaṃ tadrūpeṇānupākhyatvātsattāsphūrtiśūnyatvādananyatvamiti saṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:676: rekhāsvakāratvādibhrāntyā satyā akārādayo jñāyanta iti prasiddham /
GSP33brssbh2u:679: yatkāraṇaṃ bhāva eva kāraṇasya kāryamupalabhyate, nābhāve /
GSP33brssbh2u:680: tadyathā satyāṃ mṛdi ghaṭa upalabhyate satsu ca tantuṣu paṭaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:689: atha dhūmaṃ kayācidavasthayā viśiṃṣyādīdṛśo dhūmo nāsatyāgnau bhavatīti /
GSP33brssbh2u:690: naivamapi kaściddoṣaḥ tadbhāvānuraktāṃ hi buddhiṃ kāryakāraṇayorananyatve hetuṃ vayaṃ vadāmaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:697: tantusaṃsthāne paṭe tantuvyatirekeṇa paṭo nāma kāryaṃ naivopalabhyate kevalāstu tantava ātānavitānavantaḥ pratyakṣamupalabhyante,
GSP33brssbh2u:699: anayā pratyakṣopalabdhyā lohitaśuklakṛṣṇāni trīṇi tato rūpāṇi vāyumātramākāśamātraṃ cetyanumeyam /
GSP33brssbh2u:702: FN: kāraṇasya bhāve sattve upalabdhau ca kāryasya sattvādupalabdheścānanyatvamiti sūtrārthaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:705: yatkāraṇaṃ prāgutpatteḥ kāraṇātmanaiva kāraṇe sattvamavarakālīnasya kāryasya śrūyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:709: yacca yadātmanā yatra na vartate na tattata utpadyate,
GSP33brssbh2u:712: yathāca kāraṇaṃ brahma triṣu kāleṣu sattvaṃ na vyabhicaratyevaṃ kāryamapi jagattriṣu kāleṣu sattvaṃ na vyabhicarati /
GSP33brssbh2u:714: asadvyapadeśān neti cen na dharmāntareṇa vākyaśeṣāt / BBs_2,1.17 /
GSP33brssbh2u:715: nanu kvacidasattvamapi prāgutpatteḥ kāryasya vyapadiśati śrutiḥ - 'asadevedamagra āsīt (chā. 3.19.1)
GSP33brssbh2u:720: kiṃ tarhi vyākṛtanāmarūpatvāddharmādavyākṛtanāmarūpatvaṃ dharmāntaraṃ tena dharmāntareṇāyamasadvyapadeśaḥ prāgutpatteḥ sata eva kāryasya kāraṇarūpeṇānanyasya
GSP33brssbh2u:724: iha ca tāvat 'asadevedamagra āsīt' ityasacchabdenopakrame nirdiṣṭaṃ yattadeva punastacchabdena parāmṛśya saditi viśinaṣṭi 'tatsadāsīt' iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:726: 'asadvā idamagra āsīt' ityatrāpi 'tadātmānaṃ svayamakuruta' iti vākyaśeṣe viśeṣaṇānnātyantāsattvam /
GSP33brssbh2u:728: nāmarūpavyākṛtaṃ hi vastu sacchabdārhaṃ loke prasiddham /
GSP33brssbh2u:730: FN: agre śūnyamāsīcchūnyādeva jagatabhūditi pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:731: rāddhānte tu idaṃ jagadagre sṛṣṭeḥ prāgasadavyākṛtanāmarūpatvādasattulyamatisūkṣmaṃ brahmaivāsīt /
GSP33brssbh2u:734: yukteśca prāgutpatteḥ kāryasya sattvamananyatvaṃ ca kāraṇādavagamyate,
GSP33brssbh2u:736: yuktistāvadvarṇyate- dadhighaṭarucakādyarthibhiḥ pratiniyatāni kāraṇāni kṣīramṛttikāsuvarṇādīnyupādīyamānāni loke dṛśyante /
GSP33brssbh2u:737: nahi dadhyarthibhirmṛttikopādīyate na ghaṭārthibhiḥ kṣīraṃ tadasatkāryavāde nopapadyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:738: aviśiṣṭe hi prāgutpatteḥ sarvasya sarvatrāsatve kasmātkṣīrādeva dadhyutpadyate na mṛttikāyāḥ mṛttikāyā eva ca ghaṭa utpadyate na kṣīrāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:739: athāviśiṣṭe 'pi prāgasattve kṣīra eva dadhnaḥ kaścidatiśayo na mṛttikāyāṃ,
GSP33brssbh2u:740: mṛttikāyāmeva ca ghaṭasya kaścidatiśayo na kṣīra ityucyeta,
GSP33brssbh2u:742: śaktiśca kāraṇasya kāryaniyamārthā kalpamānā nānyāsatī vā kāryaṃ niyacchet /
GSP33brssbh2u:746: samavāyakalpanāyāmapi samavāyasya samavāyibhiḥ saṃbandhe 'bhyupagamyamāne tasya tasyānyonyaḥ saṃbandhaḥ kalpayitavya ityanavasthāprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:748: atha samavāyaḥ svayaṃ saṃbandharūpatvādanapekṣyaivāparaṃ saṃbandhaṃ saṃbadhyate,
GSP33brssbh2u:749: saṃyogo 'pi tarhi svayaṃ saṃbandharūpatvādanapekṣyaiva samavāyaṃ saṃbadhyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:751: kathaṃ ca kāryamavayavidravyaṃ kāraṇeṣvavayavadravyeṣu vartamānaṃ vartate /
GSP33brssbh2u:755: nahi bahutvaṃ samasteṣvāśrayeṣu vartamānaṃ vyastāśrayagrahaṇena gṛhyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:757: kalpyeran yairārambhakeṣvavayaveṣvavayavaśo 'vayavī varteta kośāvayavavyatiriktairhyavayavairasiḥ kośaṃ vyāpnoti /
GSP33brssbh2u:760: atha pratyavayavaṃ varteta tadaikatra vyāpāre.'nyatrāvyāpāraḥ syāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:761: nahi devadattaḥ snughne saṃnidhīyamānastadahareva pāṭaliputre 'pi saṃnidhīyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:764: gotvādivatpratyekaṃ parisamāpterna doṣa iti cet / na /
GSP33brssbh2u:766: yadi gotvādivatpratyekaṃ parisamāpto 'vayavī syādyathā gotvaṃ prativyakti pratyakṣaṃ gṛhyata evamavayavyapi pratyavayavaṃ pratyakṣaṃ gṛhyeta
GSP33brssbh2u:768: pratyekaparisamāptau cāvayavinaḥ kāryeṇādhikārāttasya caikatvācchṛṅgeṇāpi stanakāryaṃ kuryādurasā ca pṛṣṭhakāryam /
GSP33brssbh2u:770: prāgutpatteśca kāryasyāsattva utpattirakartṛkā nirātmikā ca syāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:773: kriyā ca nāma syādakartṛkā ceti vipratiṣidhyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:774: ghaṭasya cetpattirucyamānā na ghaṭakartṛkā kiṃ tarihyanyakartṛketi kalpyā syāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:776: tathāca sati ghaṭa utpadyata ityukte kulālādīnāmapyutpadyamānatā pratīyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:780: satorhi dvayoḥ saṃbandhaḥ saṃbhavati na sadasatorasatorvā /
GSP33brssbh2u:782: satāṃ hi loke kṣetragṛhādīnāṃ maryādā dṛṣṭā nābhāvasya /
GSP33brssbh2u:783: nahi vandhyāputro rājā babhūva prākpūrṇavarmaṇo 'bhiṣekādityevañjātīyakena maryādākāraṇena
GSP33brssbh2u:785: maryādākaraṇena nirupākhyo vandhyaputro rājā babhūva bhavati bhaviṣyatīti vā viśeṣyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:786: yadi ca vandyāputro 'pi kārakavyāpārādūrdhvamabhaviṣyattata idamapyupātsyata kāryābhāvo 'pi kārakavyāpārādūrdhvaṃ bhaviṣyatīti /
GSP33brssbh2u:787: vayaṃ tu paśyāmo vandyāputrasya kāryābhāvasya cābhāvatvāviśeṣādyathā vandhyāputraḥ kārakavyāpārādūrdhvaṃ na bhaviṣyatyevaṃ kāryābhāvo 'pi kārakavyāpārādūrdhvaṃ na bhaviṣyatīti /
GSP33brssbh2u:790: evaṃ prāksiddhatvāttadananyatvācca kāryasya svarūpasiddhaye 'pi na kaścidvyāpriyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:798: nahi devadattaḥ saṃkocitahastapādaḥ prasāritahastapādaśca viśeṣaṇa dṛśyamāno 'pi vastvanyatvaṃ gacchati,
GSP33brssbh2u:800: tathā pratidinamanekasaṃsthānānāmapi pitrādīnāṃ na vastvanyatvaṃ bhavati,
GSP33brssbh2u:801: mama pitā mama bhrātā mama putra iti pratyabhijñānāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:804: adṛśyamānānāmapi vaṭadhānādīnāṃ samānajātīyāvayavāntaropacitānāmaṅ kurādibhāvena darśanagocaratāpattau janmasaṃjñā /
GSP33brssbh2u:806: tatredṛgjanmocchedāntaritatvāccedasataḥ sattvapattistathā sati garbhavāsina uttānaśāyinaśca bhedaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:810: yasyapunaḥ prāgutpatterasatkāryaṃ tasya nirviṣayaḥ kārakavyāpāraḥ syāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:816: tasmātkṣīrādīnyeva dravyāṇi dadhyādibhāvenāvatiṣṭhamānāni kāryākhyāṃ labhanta iti na kāraṇādanyatkāryaṃ varṣaśatenāpi śakyaṃ niścetum /
GSP33brssbh2u:817: tathā mūlakāraṇamevāntyātkāryāttena tena kāryākāreṇa naṭavatsarvavyavahārāspadatvaṃ pratipadyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:818: evaṃ yukteḥ kāryasya prāgutpatteḥ sattvamananyatvaṃ ca kāraṇādavagamyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:820: pūrvasūtre 'sadvyapadeśinaḥ śabdasyodāhṛtatvāttato 'nyaḥ sadvyapadeśī śabdaḥ śabdāntaram- 'sadeva somyedamagra āsīdekamevādvitīyam' ityādi /
GSP33brssbh2u:821: 'taddhaika āhurasadevedamagra āsīt' iti cāsatpakṣamupakṣipya 'kathamasataḥ sajjāyeta' ityākṣipya 'sadeva somyedamagra āsīt' (chā. 6.2.1)
GSP33brssbh2u:823: tatredaṃśabdavācyasya kāryasya prāgutpatteḥ sacchabdavācyena kāraṇena sāmānādhikaraṇyasya śrūyamāṇatvātsattvānanyatve prasiddhyataḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:824: yadi tu prāgutpatterasatkāryaṃ syātpaścāccotpadyamānaṃ kāraṇe samaveyāttadānyakāraṇātsyāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:834: yathā ca saṃveṣṭitaḥ paṭo na vyaktaṃ gṛhyate kimayaṃ paṭaḥ kiṃ vānyaddravyamiti /
GSP33brssbh2u:835: sa eva prasārito yatsaṃveṣṭitaṃ dravyaṃ tatpaṭa eveti prasāraṇenābhivyakto gṛhyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:836: yathāca saṃveṣṭanasamaye paṭa iti gṛhyamāṇe 'pi na viśiṣṭāyāmavistāro gṛhyate sa eva prasāraṇasamaye viśiṣṭāyāmavistāro gṛhyate na saṃveṣṭitarūpādanyo 'yaṃ bhinnaḥ paṭa iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:837: evaṃ tantvādikāraṇāvasthaṃ paṭādikāryamaspaṣṭaṃ sat turīvemakuvindādikārakavyāpāradibhirvyaktaṃ spaṣṭaṃ gṛhyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:841: yathā ca loke prāṇāpānādiṣu prāṇabhedeṣu prāṇāyāmena niruddheṣu kāraṇamātreṇa rūpeṇa vartamāneṣu jīvanamātraṃ kāryaṃ nivartyate nākuñcanaprasāraṇādikaṃ kāryāntaram /
GSP33brssbh2u:842: teṣveva prāṇabhedeṣu punaḥ pravṛtteṣu jīvanādadhikamākuñcanaprāsāraṇādikamapi kāryāntaraṃ nirvartyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:846: ataśca kṛtsnasya jagato brahmakāryatvāttadananyatvācca siddhaiṣā śrautī pratijñā 'yenāśrutaṃ śrutaṃ bhavatyamataṃ matamavijñātaṃ vijñātam' (chā. 6.1.1) iti // 20 //
GSP33brssbh2u:853: itarasya śārīrasya brahmātmatvaṃ vyapadiśati śrutiḥ - 'sa ātmā tattvamasi śvetaketo' (chā. 6.8.7)
GSP33brssbh2u:856: itarasya ca brahmaṇaḥ śārīrātmatvaṃ vyapadiśati 'tatsṛṣṭvā tadevānuprāviśat' (tai. 2.6)
GSP33brssbh2u:859: iti ca parā devatā jīvamātmaśabdena vyapadiśantī na brahmaṇo bhinnaḥ śārīra iti darśayati /
GSP33brssbh2u:861: ataḥ sa svatantraḥ kartā san hitamevātmanaḥ saumanasyakaraṃ kuryānnāhitaṃ janmamaraṇajarārogādyanekānarthajālam /
GSP33brssbh2u:867: sarvo hi lokaḥ spaṣṭaṃ kāryaṃ kṛtvā smarati mayedaṃ kṛtamiti /
GSP33brssbh2u:877: nahi tasya hitaṃ kiñcitkartavyamastyahitaṃ vā parihartavyaṃ,
GSP33brssbh2u:879: naca tasya jñānapratibandhaḥ śaktipratibandho vā kvacidapyasti,
GSP33brssbh2u:882: natu taṃ vayaṃ jagataḥ sraṣṭāraṃ brūmaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:885: 'ātmā vā are draṣṭavyaḥ śrotavyo mantavyo nididhyāsitavyaḥ'' (bṛ. 2.4.5)
GSP33brssbh2u:894: apica yadā tattvamasītyevañjātīyakenābhedanirdeśenābhedaḥ pratibodhito bhavatyapagataṃ bhavati tadā jīvasya saṃsāritvaṃ brahmaṇaśca sraṣṭṛtvaṃ,
GSP33brssbh2u:896: tatra kuta eva sṛṣṭiḥ kuto vā hitākaraṇādayo doṣāḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:899: abādhite tu bhedavyavahāre 'se 'nveṣṭavyaḥ sa vijijñāsitavyaḥ' ityevañjātīyakena bhedanirdeśenāvagamyamānaṃ brahmaṇo 'dhikatvaṃ hitākaraṇādidoṣaprasaktiṃ niruṇaddhi // 22 //
GSP33brssbh2u:901: yathā ca loke pṛthivītvasāmānyānvitānāmapyaśmanāṃ kecinmahārhā maṇayo vajravaiḍūryādayo
GSP33brssbh2u:902: 'nye madhyamavīryāḥ sūryakāntādayo 'nye prahīṇāḥ śvavāyasaprakṣepaṇārhāḥ pāṣāṇā ityanekavidhaṃ
GSP33brssbh2u:904: yathā caikapṛthivīvyapāśrayāṇāmapi bījānāṃ bahuvidhaṃ patrapuṣpaphalagandharasādivaicitryaṃ candanakiṃpākādiṣūpalakṣyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:905: yathā caikasyāpyannarasasya lohitādīni keśalomādīni ca vicitrāṇi kāryāṇi bhavanti /
GSP33brssbh2u:906: evamekasyāpi brahmaṇo jīvaprājñapṛthaktvaṃ kāryavaicitryaṃ copapadyata ityastadanupapattiḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:911: upasaṃhāradarśanān neti cen na kṣīravad dhi / BBs_2,1.24 /
GSP33brssbh2u:912: cetanaṃ brahmaikamadvitīyaṃ jagataḥ kāraṇamiti yaduktaṃ tannopapadyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:915: iha hi loke kulālādayo ghaṭapaṭādīnāṃ kartāro mṛddaṇḍacakrasūtrādyanekakārakopasaṃhāreṇa saṃgṛhītasādhanāḥ santastattatkāryaṃ kurvāṇā dṛśyante
GSP33brssbh2u:916: brahma cāsahāyaṃ tavābhipretaṃ tasya sādhanāntarānupasaṃgrahe sati kathaṃ sraṣṭṛtvamupapadyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:920: yathā hi loke kṣīraṃ jalaṃ vā svayameva dadhihimabhāvena pariṇamate 'napekṣya bāhyaṃ sādhanaṃ tathehāpi bhaviṣyati /
GSP33brssbh2u:921: nanu kṣīrādyapi dadhyādibhāvena pariṇāmamānapekṣata eva bāhyaṃ sādhanamauṣṇyādikaṃ kathamucyate kṣīravaddhīti /
GSP33brssbh2u:923: svayamapi hi kṣīraṃ yāṃ ca yāvatīṃ ca pariṇāmamātramanubhavati tāvatyeva tvāryate tvauṣṇyādinā dadhibhāvāya /
GSP33brssbh2u:924: yadi ca svayaṃ dadhibhāvaśīlatā na syānnaivauṣṇyādināpi balāddadhibhāvamāpadyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:929: śrutiśca bhavati- 'na tasya kāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ ca vidyate na tatsamaścābhyadhikaśca dṛśyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:930: parāsya śaktirvividhaiva śrūyate svābhāvikī jñānabalakriyā ca //
GSP33brssbh2u:937: upapadyate kṣīrādīnāmacetanānāmanapekṣyāpi bāhyaṃ sādhanaṃ dadhyādibhāvaḥ, dṛṣṭatvāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:938: cetanāḥ punaḥ kulālādayaḥ sādhanasāmagrīmapekṣyaiva tasmai kāryāya pravartamānā dṛśyante /
GSP33brssbh2u:941: yathā loke devāḥ pitara ṛṣaya ityevamādayo mahāprabhāvāścetanā api santo 'napekṣyaiva
GSP33brssbh2u:943: śarīrīṇi prāsādādīni ca rathādīni ca nirmimāṇā upalabhyante mantrārthavādetihāsapurāṇaprāmāṇyāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:947: evaṃ cetanamapi brahmānapekṣya bāhyaṃ sādhanaṃ svata eva jagatsrakṣyati /
GSP33brssbh2u:948: sa yadi brūyādya ete devādayo brahmaṇo dṛṣṭāntā upāttāste dārṣṭrāntikena brahmaṇā na samānā bhavanti /
GSP33brssbh2u:949: śarīrameva hyacetanaṃ devādīnāṃ śarīrāntarādivibhūtyutpādana upādānaṃ natu cetana ātmā /
GSP33brssbh2u:952: padminī ca cetanaprayuktā satyacetanevaiva śarīreṇa sarontaropasarpaṇe vyāpriyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:956: yathā hi kulālādīnāṃ devādīnāṃ ca samāne cetanatve kulālādayaḥ kāryārambhe bāhyaṃ sādhanamapekṣante na devādayaḥ,
GSP33brssbh2u:957: tathā brahma cetanamapi na bāhyaṃ sādhanamapekṣiṣyata ityetadvākyaṃ devādyudāharaṇena vivakṣyāmaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:958: tasmādyathaikasya sāmarthyaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ tathā sarveṣāmeva bhavitumarhatīti nāstyekānta ityabhiprāyaḥ // 25 // @----------------------
GSP33brssbh2u:959: FN: lokyate jñāyater'thoneneti loko mantrārthavādādiśāstraṃ vṛddhavyavahāraśca /
GSP33brssbh2u:961: yathā bhārate śrīkṛṣṇasya saṃkalpamātreṇa draupadyāḥ paṭaparamparotpattiḥ tathā asahāyasyāpi brahmaṇaḥ kāraṇatvam /
GSP33brssbh2u:964: cetanamekamadvitīyaṃ brahma kṣīrādivaddevādivaccānapekṣya bāhyasādhanaṃ svayaṃ pariṇamamānaṃ jagataḥ kāraṇamiti sthitam /
GSP33brssbh2u:966: kṛtsnaprasaktiḥ kṛtsnasya brahmaṇaḥ kāryarūpeṇa pariṇāmaḥ prāpnoti,
GSP33brssbh2u:969: niravayavaṃ tu brahma śrutibhyo 'vagamyate- 'niṣkalaṃ niṣkriyaṃ śāntaṃ niravadyaṃ nirañjanam' (śve. 6.19)
GSP33brssbh2u:978: athaitaddoṣaparijihīrṣayā sāvayavameva brahmābhyupagamyeta tathāpi ye niravayavatvasya pratipādakāḥ śabdā udāhṛtāste prakuṣyeyuḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:980: sarvathāyaṃ pakṣo na ghaṭayituṃ śakyata ityākṣipati // 26 // @----------------------
GSP33brssbh2u:989: yathaiva hi brahmaṇo jagadutpattiḥ śrūyata evaṃ vikāravyatirekeṇāpi brahmaṇo 'vastānaṃ śrūyate,
GSP33brssbh2u:990: prakṛtivikārayorbhedena vyapadeśāt 'seyaṃ devataikṣata hantāhamimāstisro devatā anena jīvenātmanānupraviśya nāmarūpe vyākaravāṇi' (chā. 6.3.2)
GSP33brssbh2u:995: yadi ca kṛtsnaṃ brahma kāryābhāvenopayuktaṃ syāt 'satā somya tadā saṃpanno bhavati' (chā. 6.81)
GSP33brssbh2u:1002: śabdamūlaṃ ca brahma śabdapramāṇakaṃ nendriyādipramāṇakaṃ tadyathāśabdamabhyupagantavyam /
GSP33brssbh2u:1005: tā api tāvannopadeśamantareṇa kevalena tarkeṇāvagantuṃ śakyante 'sya vastuna etāvatya etatsahāya etadviṣayā etatprayojanāśca śaktaya iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:1006: kimutācintyasvabhāvasya brahmaṇo rūpaṃ vinā śabdena na nirūpyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:1007: tathācāhuḥ paurāṇikāḥ - 'acintyāḥ khalu ye bhāvā na tāṃstarkeṇa yojayet /
GSP33brssbh2u:1010: nanu śabdenāpi na śakyate viruddhor'thaḥ pratyāyayituṃ niravayavaṃ ca brahma pariṇamate naca kṛtsnamiti /
GSP33brssbh2u:1013: atha kenacidrūpeṇa pariṇameta kenaciccāvatiṣṭheteti rūpabhedakalpanātsāvayavameva prasajyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:1014: kriyāviṣaye hi 'atirātre ṣoḍaśinaṃ gṛhṇāti' 'nātirātre ṣoḍaśinaṃ gṛhṇāti' ityevañjātīyakāyāṃ
GSP33brssbh2u:1016: iha tu vikalpāśrayaṇenāpi na virodhaparihāraḥ saṃbhavatyapuruṣatantratvādvastunaḥ tasmāddurghaṭametaditi /
GSP33brssbh2u:1020: nahi timiropahatanayanenāneka iva candramā dṛśyamāno 'neka eva bhavati /
GSP33brssbh2u:1021: avidyākalpitena ca nāmarūpalakṣaṇena rūpabhedena vyākṛtāvyākṛtātmakena tattvānyatvābhyāmanirvacanīyena brahma pariṇāmādisarvavyavahārāspadatvaṃ pratipadyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:1023: vācārambhaṇamātratvāccāvidyākalpitasya nāmarūpabhedasyeti na niravayavatvaṃ brahmaṇaḥ kupyati /
GSP33brssbh2u:1028: 'sa eṣa neti netyātmā' ityupakramyāha- 'abhayaṃ vai janaka prāpto 'si' (bṛ. 4.2.4) iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:1030: ātmani caivaṃ vicitrāś ca hi / BBs_2,1.28 /
GSP33brssbh2u:1031: apica naivātra vivaditavyaṃ kathamekasminbrahmaṇi svarūpānupamardenaivānekākārā sṛṣṭiḥ syāditi /
GSP33brssbh2u:1033: tatra rathā na rathayogo na panthāno bhavantyatha rathārathayogānpathaḥ sṛjate' (
GSP33brssbh2u:1035: loke 'pi devādiṣu māyāvyādiṣu ca svapnarūpānupamardenaiva vicitrā hastyaśvādisṛṣṭayo dṛśyante /
GSP33brssbh2u:1039: pradhānavādino 'pi hi niravayavamaparicchinnaṃ śabdādihīnaṃ pradhānaṃ sāvavasya paricchinnasya śabdādimataḥ kāryasya kāraṇamiti svapakṣaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:1042: sattvarajastamāṃsi trayo guṇā nityāsteṣāṃ sāmyāvasthā pradhāne tairevāvayavaistatsāvayavamiti /
GSP33brssbh2u:1043: naivañjātīyakena sāvayavatvena prakṛto doṣaḥ parihartuṃ pāryate /
GSP33brssbh2u:1048: atha śaktaya eva kāryavaicitryasūcitā avayavā ityabhiprāyaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:1050: tathāṇuvādino 'pyaṇuraṇvantareṇa saṃyujyamāno niravayavatvādyadi kārtsyena saṃyujyeta tataḥ prathimānupapatteraṇumātratvaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:1051: athaikadeśena saṃyujyeta tathāpi niravayavatvābhyupagamakopa iti svapakṣe 'pi samāna eṣa doṣaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:1058: ekasyāpi brahmaṇo vicitraśaktiyogādupapadyate vicitro vikāraprapañca ityuktam /
GSP33brssbh2u:1065: yathāhi darśayati śrutiḥ sarvaśaktiyogaṃ parasyā devatāyāḥ - 'sarvakarmā sarvakāmaḥ sarvagandhaḥ sarvarasaḥ sarvamidamabhyātto 'vākyanādaraḥ' (chā. 3.14.4)
GSP33brssbh2u:1068: , 'etasya vā akṣarasya praśāsane gārgisūryācandramasau vidhṛtau tiṣṭhataḥ' (bṛ. 3.8.9)
GSP33brssbh2u:1073: vikaraṇatvān neti cet tad uktam / BBs_2,1.31 /
GSP33brssbh2u:1074: syādetat vikaraṇāṃ parāṃ devatāṃ śāsti śāstram- 'acakṣuṣkamaśrotramavāgamanāḥ' (bṛ.3.8.8)
GSP33brssbh2u:1076: kathaṃ sā sarvaśaktiyuktāpi satī kāryāya prabhavet /
GSP33brssbh2u:1077: devādayo hi cetanāḥ sarvaśaktiyuktā api santa ādhyatmikakāryakaraṇasaṃpannā eva tasmaitasmai kāryāya prabhavanto vijñāyante /
GSP33brssbh2u:1079: iti pratiṣiddhasarvaviśeṣāyā devatāyāḥ sarvaśaktiyogaḥ saṃbhavediti cet /
GSP33brssbh2u:1082: naca yathaikasya sāmarthyaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ tathānyasyāpi sāmarthyena bhavitavyamiti niyamo 'stīti /
GSP33brssbh2u:1084: tathāca śāstram- 'apāṇipādo javano grahītā paśyatyacakṣuḥ sa śṛṇotyakarṇaḥ' (śvaṃ. 3.19)
GSP33brssbh2u:1089: na khalu cetanaḥ paramātmedaṃ jagadbimbaṃ viracayitumarhati /
GSP33brssbh2u:1092: cetano hi loke buddhipūrvakārī puruṣaḥ pravartamāno na mandopakramāmapi tāvatpravṛttimātmaprayojanānupayogināmārabhamāṇo dṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:1094: bhavati ca lokaprasiddhyanuvādinī śrutiḥ- 'na vā are sarvasya kāmāya sarvaṃ priyaṃ bhavatyātmanastu kāmāya sarvaṃ priyaṃ bhavati' (bṛ. 2.4.5)
GSP33brssbh2u:1095: iti gurutarasaṃrambhā ceyaṃ pravṛttiryaduccāvacaprapañcaṃ jagadbimbaṃ viracayitavyam /
GSP33brssbh2u:1096: yadīyamapi pravṛttiścetanasya paramātmana ātmaprayojanopayoginī parikalpyeta paritṛptitvaṃ paramātmanaḥ śrūyamāṇaṃ bādhyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:1098: atha cetano 'pi sannunmatto buddhyaparādhādantareṇaivātmaprayojanaṃ pravartamāno dṛṣṭastathā paramātmāpi pravartiṣyata ityucyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:1099: tathā sati sarvajñatvaṃ paramātmanaḥ śrūyamāṇaṃ bādhyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:1104: yathā loke kasyacidāptaiṣaṇasya vā vyatiriktaṃ kiñcitprayojanamabhisaṃdhāya kevalaṃ līlārūpāḥ pravṛttayaḥ krīḍāvihāreṣu bhavanti,
GSP33brssbh2u:1105: yathā cocchvāsapraśvāsādayo 'nabhisaṃdhāya bāhyaṃ kiñcitprayojanaṃ svabhāvādeva saṃbhavanti
GSP33brssbh2u:1106: evamīśvarasyāpyanapekṣya kiñcitprayojanāntaraṃ svabhāvādeva kevalaṃ līlārūpā pravṛttirbhaviṣyati /
GSP33brssbh2u:1107: na hīśvarasya prayojanāntaraṃ nirūpyamāṇaṃ nyāyataḥ śrutito vā saṃbhavati /
GSP33brssbh2u:1109: yadyapyasmākamiyaṃ jagadbimbaviracanā gurutarasaṃrambhevābhāti tathāpi parameśvarasya līlaiva kevaleyaṃ,
GSP33brssbh2u:1111: yadi nāma loke līlāsvapi kiñcitsūkṣmaṃ prayojanamutprekṣyeta tathāpi naivātra kiñcitprayojanamutprekṣituṃ śakyate,
GSP33brssbh2u:1122: vaiṣamyanairghṛṇye na sāpekṣatvāt tathā hi darśayati / BBs_2,1.34 /
GSP33brssbh2u:1129: kāṃścinmadhyamabhogabhājo manuṣyādīnītyevaṃ viṣamāṃ sṛṣṭiṃ nirmimāṇasyaiśvarasya pṛthagjanasyeva rāgadveṣopapatteḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:1131: tathā khalajanairapi jugupsitaṃ nirghṛṇatvamatikrūratvaṃ duḥkhayogavidhānātsarvaprajopasaṃhārācca prasajyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:1132: tasmādvaiṣamyanairghṛṇyaprasaṅgānneśvaraḥ kāraṇamityevaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - vaiṣamyanairghṛṇye neśvarasya prasajyete /
GSP33brssbh2u:1135: yadi hi nirapekṣaḥ kevala īśvaro viṣamāṃ sṛṣṭiṃ nirmimīte syātāmetau doṣau vaiṣamyaṃ nairghṛṇyaṃ ca /
GSP33brssbh2u:1142: yathāhi parjanyo vrīhiyavādisṛṣṭau sādhāraṇaṃ kāraṇaṃ bhavati,
GSP33brssbh2u:1143: vrīhiyavādivaiṣamye tu tattadbījagatānyevāsādhāraṇāni sāmarthyāni kāraṇāni bhavanti,
GSP33brssbh2u:1145: devamanuṣyādivaiṣamye tu tattajjīvagatānyevāsādhāraṇāni karmāṇi kāraṇāni bhavantyevamīśvaraḥ sāpekṣatvānna vaiṣamyanairghṛṇyābhyāṃ duṣyati /
GSP33brssbh2u:1146: kathaṃ punaravagamyate sāpekṣa īśvaro nīcamadhyamottamaṃ saṃsāraṃ nirmimīta iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:1147: tathāhi darśayati śrutiḥ - 'eṣa hyeva sādhu karma kārayati taṃ yamebhyo lokebhya unninīṣata eṣa u evāsādhu karma kārayati taṃ yamadho ninīṣate' (kau.brā. 3.8) iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:1148: 'puṇyo vai puṇyena karmaṇā bhavati pāpaḥ pāpena' (bṛ. 3.2.13) iti ca /
GSP33brssbh2u:1149: smṛtirapi prāṇikarmaviśeṣāpekṣameveśvarasyānugrahītatvaṃ ca darśayati- 'ye yathā māṃ prapadyante tāṃstathaiva bhajāmyaham' (bha.gī. 4.11)
GSP33brssbh2u:1152: yaṃ janumunninīṣate ūrdhvaṃ netumicchati taṃ sādhu kārayatyeṣa īśvara ityanvayaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:1153: na karmāvibhāgād iti cen nānāditvād / BBs_2,1.35 /
GSP33brssbh2u:1155: iti prāksṛṣṭeravibhāgāvadhāraṇānnāsti karma yadapekṣya viṣamā sṛṣṭiḥ syāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:1158: ato vibhāgādūrdhvaṃ karmāpekṣa īśvaraḥ pravartatāṃ nāma /
GSP33brssbh2u:1163: anādau tu saṃsāre bījāṅ kuravaddhetumadbhāvena karmaṇaḥ sargavaiṣamyasya ca pravṛttirna virudhyate // 35 //
GSP33brssbh2u:1177: anāditve tu bījāṅ kuranyāyenopapatterna kaściddoṣo bhavati /
GSP33brssbh2u:1180: iti sargapramukhe śārīramātmānaṃ jīvaśabdena prāṇadhāraṇanimittenābhilapannanādiḥ saṃsāra iti darśayati /
GSP33brssbh2u:1181: ādimattve tu prāganavadhāritaprāṇaḥ san kathaṃ prāṇādadhāraṇanimittena jīvaśabdena sargapramukhe 'bhilapyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:1187: smṛtāvapyanāditvaṃ saṃsārasyopalabhyate- 'na rūpamasyeha tathopalabhyate nānto na cādirna ca saṃpratiṣṭhā' (gī. 15.3) iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:1188: purāṇe cātītānāgatānāṃ ca kalpanāṃ na parimāṇamastīti sthāpitam // 36 //
GSP33brssbh2u:1191: cetanaṃ brahma jagataḥ kāraṇaṃ prakṛtiścetyasminnavadhārite vedārthe parairupakṣiptānvilakṣaṇatvādīndoṣānparyahārṣīdācāryaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:1192: idānīṃ parapakṣapratiṣedhapradhānaṃ prakaraṇaṃ prāripsamāṇaḥ svapakṣaparigrahapradhānaṃ prakaraṇamupasaṃharati /
GSP33brssbh2u:1193: yasmādasminbrahmaṇi kāraṇe parigṛhyamāṇe pradarśitena prakāreṇa sarve kāraṇadharmā upapadyante 'sarvajñaṃ sarvaśakti mahāmāyaṃ ca brahma' iti,
GSP33brssbh2u:1195: iti śrīgovindabhagavatpūjyapādaśiṣyaśaṅkarabhagavatpūjyapādakṛtau śārīrakamīmāṃsābhāṣye dvitīyādhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ samāptaḥ // 1 // ____________________________________________________________________________________________
GSP33brssbh2u:1197: yadyapīdaṃ vedāntavākyānāmaidaṃparyaṃ nirūpayituṃ śāstraṃ pravṛttaṃ na tarkśāstravat devalābhir yuktibhiḥ kaṃcit siddhāntaṃ sādhayituṃ dūṣayituṃ vā pravṛttam /
GSP33brssbh2u:1198: tathāpi vedāntavākyam api vyācakṣāṇaiḥ samyagdarśanapratipakṣabhūtāni sāṃkhyādidarśanāni nirākaraṇīyāṇīti tadarthaḥ paraḥ pādaḥ pravartate /
GSP33brssbh2u:1199: vedāntārthanirṇayasya ca samyagdarśanārthatvāt tannirṇayena svapakṣasthāpanaṃ prathamaṃ kṛtaṃ taddyabhyarhitaṃ parapakṣapratyākhyānād iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:1200: nanu mumukṣūṇāṃ mokṣasādhanatvena samyagdarśananirūpaṇāya svapakṣasthāpanam eva kevalaṃ kartuṃ yuktaṃ kiṃ parapakṣanirākaraṇena paradveṣakareṇa
GSP33brssbh2u:1202: tathāpi mahājanaparigṛhītāni mahānti sāṃkhyāditantrāṇi samyagdarśanāpadeśena pravṛttānyupalabhya bhavet keṣāṃcin mandamatīnām etāny api samyagdarśanāyopadeyānītyapekṣā
GSP33brssbh2u:1203: tathā yuktagāḍhatvasaṃbhavena sarvajñabhāṣitatvācca śraddhā ca teṣvityatastadasāratopapādanāya prayatyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:1209: taducyate- sāṃkhyādayaḥ svapakṣasthāpanāya vedāntavākyānyapyudāhṛtya svapakṣānuguṇenaiva yojayanto vyācakṣate,
GSP33brssbh2u:1210: teṣāṃ yadvyākhyānaṃ tadvyākhyanābhāsaṃ na samyagvyakhyānamityetāvatpūrvaṃ kṛtam /
GSP33brssbh2u:1211: iha tu vākyanirapekṣaḥ svatantrastadyuktipratiṣedhaḥ kriyata ityeṣa viśeṣaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:1212: tatra sāṃkhyā manyante- yathā ghaṭaśarāvādayo bhedā mṛdātmanānvīyamānā mṛdātmakasāmānyapūrvakā loke dṛṣṭāḥ,
GSP33brssbh2u:1213: tathā sarva eva bāhyādhyātmikā bhedāḥ sukhaduḥkhamohātmatayānvīyamānāḥ sukhaduḥkhamohātmakasāmānyapūrvikā bhavitumarhanti /
GSP33brssbh2u:1214: yattatsukhaduḥkhamohātmakaṃ sāmānyaṃ tatttriguṇaṃ pradhānaṃ mṛdvadacetanaṃ cetanasya puruṣārthaṃ sādhayituṃ svabhāvenaiva vicitreṇa vikārātmanā vivartata iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:1218: gehaprāsādaśayanāsanavihārabhūmyādayo hi loke prajñāvadbhiḥ śilpibhiryathākālaṃ sukhaduḥkhaprāptiparihārayogyā racitā dṛśyante /
GSP33brssbh2u:1224: mṛdādiṣvapi kumabhakārādyadhiṣṭhiteṣu viśiṣṭākārā racanā dṛśyate tadvatpradhānasyāpi cetanāntarādiṣṭhitatvaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:1225: naca mṛdādyupādānasvarūpavyapāśrayeṇaiva dharmeṇa mūlakāraṇamavadhāraṇīyaṃ na bāhyakumbhakārādivyapāśrayeṇeti kiñcinniyāmakamasti /
GSP33brssbh2u:1235: tathā parimitānāṃ bhedānāṃ mūlāṅ kurādīnāṃ saṃsargapūrvakatvaṃ dṛṣṭvā bāhyādhyātmikānāṃ
GSP33brssbh2u:1238: kāryakāraṇabhāvastu prekṣāpūrvakanirmitānāṃ śayanāsanādīnāṃ dṛṣṭa iti na kāryakāraṇabhāvādbāhyādhyātmikānāṃ bhedānāmacetanapūrvakatvaṃ śakyaṃ kalpayitum // 1 // @----------------------
GSP33brssbh2u:1242: tatsiddhyarthā yā pravṛttiḥ sāmyāvasthānātpracyutiḥ sattvarajastamasāmaṅgāṅgibhāvarūpāpattirviśiṣṭakāryābhimukhapravṛttitā sāpi nācetanasya pradhānasya svatantrasyopapadyate,
GSP33brssbh2u:1244: nahi mṛdādayo rathādayo vā svayamacetanāḥ santaścetanaiḥ kulālādibhiraśvādibhirvānadhiṣṭhitā viśiṣṭakāryābhimukhapravṛttayo dṛśyante dṛṣṭāccādṛṣṭisiddhiḥ
GSP33brssbh2u:1246: nanu cetanasyāpi pravṛttiḥ kevalasya na dṛṣṭā /
GSP33brssbh2u:1251: yasminpravṛttirdṛṣṭā tasya sota yatasaṃyuktasya dṛṣṭā tasya seti /
GSP33brssbh2u:1252: nanu yasmindṛśyate pravṛttistasyaiva seti yuktamubhayoḥ pratyakṣatvāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:1254: pravṛtyāśrayadehādisaṃyuktasyaiva tu cetanasya sadbhāvasiddhiḥ kevalācetanarathādivailakṣaṇyaṃ jīvadehasya dṛṣṭamiti /
GSP33brssbh2u:1255: ata eva ca pratyakṣe dehe sati darśanādasati cādarśanāddehasyaiva caitanyamapīti laukāyatikāḥ pratipannāḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:1257: tadabhidhīyate- na brūmo yasminnacetane pravṛttirdṛśyate na tasya seti /
GSP33brssbh2u:1261: yathā kāṣṭhādivyapāśrayāpi dāhaprakāśalakṣaṇā vikriyānupalabhyamānāpi ca kevale jvalane jvalanādeva bhavati,
GSP33brssbh2u:1263: laukāyatikānāmapi cetana eva deho 'cetanānāṃ rathādīnāṃ pravartako dṛṣṭa ityavipratiṣiddhaṃ cetanasya pravartakatvam /
GSP33brssbh2u:1264: nanu tava dehādisaṃyuktasyāpyātmano vijñānasvarūpamātravyatirekeṇa pravṛttyanupapatteranupapannaṃ pravartakatvamiti cet / na /
GSP33brssbh2u:1266: yathāyaskānto maṇiḥ svayaṃ pravṛttirahito 'pyayasaḥ pravartako bhavati /
GSP33brssbh2u:1267: yathā vā rūpādayo viṣayāḥ svayaṃ pravṛttirahitā api cakṣurādīnāṃ pravartakābhavanti /
GSP33brssbh2u:1268: evaṃ pravṛttirahito 'pīśvaraḥ sarvagataḥ sarvātmā sarvajñaḥ sarvaśaktiśca san sarvaṃ pravartayedityupapannam /
GSP33brssbh2u:1276: yathāca jalamacetanaṃ svabhāvenaiva lokopakārāya syandata evaṃ pradhānamacetanaṃ svabhāvenaiva puruṣārthasiddhaye pravartiṣyata iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:1281: , 'etasya vā akṣarasya praśāsane gārgi prācyonyā nadyaḥ syandante' (bṛ. 3.8.9)
GSP33brssbh2u:1290: ityatra tu bāhyanimittanirapekṣamapi svāśrayaṃ kāryaṃ bhavatītyetallokadṛṣṭyā nidarśitam /
GSP33brssbh2u:1291: śāstradṛṣṭyā tu punaḥ sarvatraiveśvarāpekṣatvamāpadyamānaṃ na parāṇudyate // 3 // @----------------------
GSP33brssbh2u:1296: natu tadvyatirekeṇa pradhānasya pravartakaṃ nivartakaṃ vā kiñcidbāhyamapekṣyamavastitamasti /
GSP33brssbh2u:1297: puruṣastūdāsīno na pravartako na nivartaka ityato 'napekṣaṃ pradhānaṃ,
GSP33brssbh2u:1298: anapekṣatvācca kadācitpradhānaṃ mahadādyākāreṇa pariṇamate kadācinna pariṇamata ityetadayuktam /
GSP33brssbh2u:1299: īśvarasya tu sarvajñatvātsarvaśaktitvānmahāmāyatvācca pravṛttyapravṛttī na virudhyete // 4 //
GSP33brssbh2u:1302: yathā tṛṇapallavodādi nimittāntaranirapekṣaṃ svabhāvādeva kṣīrādyākāreṇa pariṇamata evaṃ pradhānamapi mahadādyākāreṇa pariṇaṃsyata iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:1305: yadi hi kiñcinnimittamupalabhemahi tato yathākāmaṃ tena tṛṇādyupādāya kṣīraṃ saṃpādayemahi,
GSP33brssbh2u:1308: atrocyate- bhavettṛṇādivatsvābhāvikaḥ pradhānasyāpi paraṇāmo yadi tṛṇāderapi svābhāvikaḥ pariṇāmo 'bhyupagamyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:1313: dhenvaiva hyupayuktaṃ tṛṇādi kṣīro bhavati na prahīṇamanaḍudādyupayuktaṃ vā /
GSP33brssbh2u:1315: naca yathākāmaṃ mānuṣairna śakyaṃ saṃpādayitumityetāvatā nirnimittaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssbh2u:1317: manuṣyā api śaknuvatyevocitenopāyena tṛṇādyupādāya kṣīraṃ saṃpādayitum /
GSP33brssbh2u:1318: prabhūtaṃ hi kṣīraṃ kāmayamānāḥ prabhūtaṃ ghāsaṃ dhenuṃ cārayanti /
GSP33brssbh2u:1324: athāpi nāma bhavataḥ śraddhāmanurudhyamānāḥ svābhāvikīmeva pradhānasya pravṛttimabhyupagacchema tathāpi doṣo 'nuṣajyetaiva /
GSP33brssbh2u:1327: yadi tāvatsvābhāvikī pradhānasya pravṛttirna kiñcidanyadihāpekṣata ityucyeta tato
GSP33brssbh2u:1328: yathaiva sahakāri kiñcinnāpekṣata evaṃ prayojanamapi kiñcinnāpekṣiṣyate ityataḥ pradhānaṃ
GSP33brssbh2u:1329: puruṣasyārthaṃ sādhayituṃ pravartata itīyaṃ pratijñā hīyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:1330: sa yadi brūyātsahakāryeva kevalaṃ nāpekṣate na prayojanamapīti /
GSP33brssbh2u:1331: tathāpi pradhānapravṛtteḥ prayojanaṃ vivektavyaṃ bhogo vā syādapavargo vobhayaṃ veti /
GSP33brssbh2u:1346: yathā kaścitpuruṣo dṛkśaktisaṃpannaḥ pravṛttiśaktihīnaḥ paṅguraparaṃ puruṣaṃ pravṛttiśaktisaṃpannaṃ dṛkśaktihīnamandhamadhiṣṭhāya pravartayati
GSP33brssbh2u:1348: evaṃ puruṣaḥ pradhānaṃ pravartayiṣyatīti dṛṣṭāntapratyayena punaḥ pratyavasthānam /
GSP33brssbh2u:1361: tathā pradhānasyācaitanyātpuruṣasya caudāsīnyāttṛtīyasya ca tayoḥ saṃbandhayiturabhāvātsaṃbandhānupapattiḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:1371: athāpi syādanyathā vayamanumimīmahe yathā nāyamanantaro doṣaḥ prasajyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:1374: yathā yathā kāryotpāda upapadyate tathā tathaiṣāṃ svabhāvo 'bhyupagamyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:1376: tasmātsāmyāvasthāyāmapi vaiṣamyopagamayogyā eva guṇā avatiṣṭhanta iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:1377: evamapi pradhānasya jñaśaktiviyogādracanānupapattyādayaḥ pūrvoktā doṣāstadavasthā eva /
GSP33brssbh2u:1380: vaiṣamyopagamayogyā api guṇāḥ sāmyāvasthāyāṃ nimittābhāvānnaiva vaiṣamyaṃ bhajeran /
GSP33brssbh2u:1381: bhajamānā vā nimittābhāvāviśeṣātsarvadaiva vaiṣamyaṃ bhajeranniti prasajyata evāyamanantaro 'pi doṣaḥ // 9 //
GSP33brssbh2u:1389: prasiddha eva tu śrutyeśvarakāraṇavādinyā virodhastadanuvartinyā ca smṛtyā /
GSP33brssbh2u:1392: ekaṃ hi brahma sarvātmakaṃ sarvasya prapañcasya kāraṇamabhyupagacchatāmekasyaivātmano viśeṣau tapyatāpakau na jātyantarabhūtāvityabhyupagantavyaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:1393: yadi cetau tapyatāpakāvekasyātmano viśeṣau syātāṃ sa tābhyāṃ tapyatāpakābhyāṃ na nirmucyata iti tāpopaśāntaye samyagdarśanamupadiśacchāstramanarthakaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:1394: nahyauṣṇyaprakāśadharmakasya pradīpasya tadavasthasyaiva tābhyāṃ nirmokṣa upapadyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:1396: tatrāpi jalātmana ekasya vīcyādanyo viśeṣā āvirbhāvatirobhāvarūpeṇa nityā eveti samāno jalātmano vīcyādibhiranirmokṣaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:1400: yasyārthino yadviṣayamarthitvaṃ sa tasyārtho nityasiddha eveti na tasya tadviṣayamarthitvaṃ syāt,
GSP33brssbh2u:1401: yathā prakāśātmanaḥ pradīpasya prakāśākhyortho nityasiddha eveti na tasya tadviṣayamarthitvaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssbh2u:1412: tapyastu puruṣo ya ekaḥ paryāyeṇobhābhyāṃ saṃbadhyata iti tayostapyatāpakayorekātmatāyāṃ mokṣānupapattiḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:1416: bhavedeṣa doṣo yadyekātmatāyāṃ tapyatāpakāvānyonyasya viṣayaviṣayibhāvaṃ pratipadyeyātām /
GSP33brssbh2u:1418: nahyagnirekaḥ sansvamātmānaṃ dahati prakāśayati vā satyapyauṣṇyaprakāśādidharmabhede pariṇāmitve ca /
GSP33brssbh2u:1421: ucyate- kiṃ na paśyasi karmabhūto jīvaddehastapyastāpakaḥ saviteti /
GSP33brssbh2u:1422: nanu taptirnāma duḥkhaṃ sā cetayiturnācetanasya dehasya /
GSP33brssbh2u:1423: yadi hi dehasyaiva taptiḥ syātsā dehanāśe svayameva naśyatīti tannāśāya sādhanaṃ naiṣitavyaṃ syāditi /
GSP33brssbh2u:1424: ucyate- dehābhāve 'pi kevalasya cetanasya taptirna dṛṣṭā /
GSP33brssbh2u:1425: naca tvayāpi taptirnāma vikriyā cetayituḥ kevalasyeṣyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:1428: kathaṃ tavāpi tapyatāpakabhāvaḥ sattvaṃ tapyaṃ tāpakaṃ raja iti cet / na /
GSP33brssbh2u:1433: nahi ḍuṇḍubhaḥ sarpaṃ ivetyetāvatā saviṣo bhavati /
GSP33brssbh2u:1434: sarpo vā ḍuṇḍubha ivetyetāvatā nirviṣo bhavati /
GSP33brssbh2u:1437: atha pāramārthikameva cetanasya tapyatvamabhyupagacchasi tavaiva sutarāmanirmokṣaḥ prasajyeta ,
GSP33brssbh2u:1440: tataścātyantiko mokṣa upapanna iti cet / na /
GSP33brssbh2u:1443: aupaniṣadasya tvātmaikatvābhyupagamādekasya ca viṣayaviṣayibhāvānupapattervikārabhedasya ca vācārambhaṇamātratvaśravaṇādanirmokṣaśaṅkā svapne 'pi nopajāyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:1444: vyavahāre tu yatra yathā dṛṣṭastapyatāpakabhāvastatra tathaiva sa iti na codayitavyaḥ parihartavyo vā bhavati // 10 // @----------------------
GSP33brssbh2u:1454: tatrādau tāvadyo 'ṇuvādinā brahmavādini doṣa utprekṣyate sa pratisamādhīyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:1455: tatrāyaṃ vaiśeṣikāṇāmabhyupagamaḥ - kāraṇadravyasamavāyino guṇāḥ kāryadravye samānajātīyaṃ guṇāntaramārabhante,
GSP33brssbh2u:1457: tasmāccetanasya brahmaṇo jagatkāraṇatve 'bhyupagamyamāne kārye 'pi jagati cetanyaṃ samaveyāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:1458: tadadarśanāttu na cetanaṃ brahma jagatkāraṇaṃ bhavitumarhatīti /
GSP33brssbh2u:1461: eṣā teṣāṃ prakriyā- paramāṇavaḥ kila kañcitkālamanārabdhakāryā yathāyogaṃ rūpādimantaḥ pārimaṇḍalyaparimāṇaśca tiṣṭhanti /
GSP33brssbh2u:1462: te ca paścādadṛṣṭādipuraḥsarāḥ saṃyogasacivāśca santo dvyaṇukādikrameṇa kṛtsnaṃ kāryajātamārabhante /
GSP33brssbh2u:1464: yadā dvau paramāṇū dvyaṇukamārabhete tadā paramāṇugatā rūpādiguṇaviśeṣāḥ śuklādayo dvyaṇuke śaklādīnaparānārabhante /
GSP33brssbh2u:1468: yadāpi dve dvyaṇuke caturaṇukamārabhete tadāpi samānaṃ dvyaṇukasamavāyināṃ śuklādīnāmārambhakatvam /
GSP33brssbh2u:1471: yadāpi bahavaḥ paramāṇavo bahūni vā dvyaṇukāni dvyaṇukasahito vā paramāṇuḥ kāryamārabhate tadāpi samānaiṣā yojanā /
GSP33brssbh2u:1472: tadevaṃ yathā paramāṇoḥ parimaṇḍalātsato 'ṇu hrasvaṃ ca dvyaṇukaṃ jāyate mahaddīrghaṃ ca tryaṇukādi na parimaṇḍalam,
GSP33brssbh2u:1473: yathā vā dvyaṇukādaṇorhrasvācca sato mahaddīrghaṃ ca tryaṇukaṃ jāyate nāṇu no hrasvam,
GSP33brssbh2u:1474: evaṃ cetanādbrahmaṇo 'cetanaṃ jagajjaniṣyata ityabyupagame kiṃ tava cchinnam /
GSP33brssbh2u:1475: atha manyase virodhinā parimāṇāntareṇākrāntaṃ kāryadravyaṃ dvyaṇukādītyato nārambhakāṇi kāraṇagatāni pārimaṇḍalyādīnītyabhyupagacchāmi,
GSP33brssbh2u:1477: yena kāraṇagatā cetanā kārye cetanāntaraṃ nārabheta /
GSP33brssbh2u:1482: yathā kāraṇe vidyamānānāmapi pārimāṇḍalyādināmanārambhakatvamevaṃ caitanyasyāpītyasyāṃśasya samānatvāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:1485: naca parimāṇāntarārambhe vyagrāṇi pārimāṇḍalyādīnītyataḥ svasamānajātīyaṃ parimāṇāntaraṃ nārabhante parimāṇāntarasyānyahetutvābhyupagamāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:1491: dravyāntare guṇāntare vārabhyamāṇe sarveṣāmeva kāraṇaguṇānāṃ svāśrayasamavāyaviśeṣāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:1497: naca dravyasya dravyamevodāhartavyaṃ guṇasya vā guṇa eveti kaścinniyame heturasti /
GSP33brssbh2u:1498: sūtrakāro 'pi bhavatāṃ dravyasya guṇamudājahāra- 'pratyakṣāpratyakṣāṇāmapratyakṣatvātsaṃyogasya pañcātmakaṃ na vidyate' (vai. sū. 4.2.2) iti
GSP33brssbh2u:1499: yathā pratyakṣāpratyakṣayorbhūmyākāśayoḥ samavayansaṃyogo 'pratyakṣa evaṃ pratyakṣāpratyakṣeṣu pañcasu bhūteṣu samavayaccharīramapratyakṣaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:1502: etaduktaṃ bhavati- guṇaśca saṃyogo dravyaṃ śarīram /
GSP33brssbh2u:1509: nanvatideśo 'pi samānanyāyatayā kṛtaḥ 'etena śiṣṭāparigrahā api vyākhyātāḥ' (bra.sū. 2.1.12) iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:1511: tasyaiva tvayaṃ vaiśeṣikaprakriyārambhe tatprakriyānugatena nidarśanena prapañcaḥ kṛtaḥ // 11 // @----------------------
GSP33brssbh2u:1512: FN: paramāṇuḥ parimaṇḍalaḥ tadgataṃ parimāṇaṃ pārimāṇḍalyam /
GSP33brssbh2u:1517: sa ca vāda itthaṃ samuttiṣṭhata- paṭādīni hi loke sāvayavāni dravyāṇi svānugateraiva saṃyogasacivaistantvādibhirdravyairārabhyamāṇāni dṛṣṭāni
GSP33brssbh2u:1518: tatsāmānyena yāvatkiñcitsāvayavaṃ tatsarvaṃ svānugateraiva saṃyogasacivaistairdravyairārabdhamiti gamyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:1519: sa cāyamavayavāvayavivibhāgo yato nivartate so 'pakarṣaparyantagataḥ paramāṇuḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:1522: nacākāraṇena kāryeṇa bhavitavyamityataḥ paramāṇavo jagataḥ kāraṇamiti kaṇabhugabhiprāyaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:1523: tānīmāni catvāri bhūtāni bhūmyudakatejaḥpavanākhyāni sāvayavānyupalabhya caturvidhāḥ
GSP33brssbh2u:1524: paramāṇavaḥ parikalpyante teṣāṃ cāpakarṣaparyantagatatvena parato vibhāgāsaṃbhavādvanaśyatāṃ
GSP33brssbh2u:1525: pṛthivyādīnāṃ paramāṇuparyanto vibhāgo bhavati sa pralayakālaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:1526: tataḥ sargakāle ca vāyavīyeṣvaṇuṣvadṛṣṭāpekṣaṃ karmotpadyate tatkarma svāśrayamaṇumaṇvantareṇa saṃniyukti tato dvyaṇukādikrameṇa vāyurutpadyate
GSP33brssbh2u:1530: aṇugatebhyaśca rūpādibhyo dvyaṇukādigatāni rūpādīni saṃbhavanti tantupaṭanyāyeneti kāṇādā manyante /
GSP33brssbh2u:1536: yathādṛṣṭaṃ kimapi karmaṇo nimittamabhyupagamyeta tasyāsaṃbhavānnaivāṇuṣvādyaṃ karma syāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:1538: śarīrapratiṣṭhe hi manasyātmanaḥ saṃyoge satyātmaguṇaḥ prayatno jāyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:1540: sargottarakālaṃ hi tatsarvaṃ nādyasya karmaṇo nimittaṃ saṃbhavati /
GSP33brssbh2u:1541: athādṛṣṭamādyasya karmaṇo nimittamityucyeta tatpunarātmasamavāyi vā syādaṇusamavāyi vā /
GSP33brssbh2u:1543: nahyacetanaṃ cetanenānadhiṣṭhitaṃ svatantraṃ pravartate pravartayati veti sāṃkhyaprakriyāyāmabhihitam /
GSP33brssbh2u:1550: saṃyogābhāvācca tannibandhanaṃ dvyaṇukādi kāryajātaṃ na syāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:1553: pradeśavato dravyasya pradeśavatā dravyāntareṇa saṃyogasya dṛṣṭatvāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:1556: kalpitānāmavastutvādavastveva saṃyoga iti vastunaḥ kāryasyāsamavāyikāraṇaṃ na syāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:1558: yathācādisarge nimittābhāvātsaṃyogotpattyarthaṃ karma nāṇūnāṃ saṃbhavatyevaṃ mahāpralaye 'pi vibhāgotpattyarthaṃ karma naivāṇūnāṃ saṃbhavet
GSP33brssbh2u:1560: adṛṣṭamapi bhogaprasiddhyarthaṃ na pralayaprasiddhyarthamityato nimittābhāvānna syādaṇūnāṃ saṃyogotpattyarthaṃ vibhāgotpattyarthaṃ vā karma
GSP33brssbh2u:1571: yathaiva hyaṇubhyāmatyantabhinnaṃ sadvyaṇukaṃ samavāyalakṣaṇena saṃbandhena tābhyāṃ
GSP33brssbh2u:1574: tataśca tasya tasyānyonyaḥ saṃbandhaḥ kalpayitavya ityanavasthaiva prasajyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:1575: nanviha pratyayagrāhyaḥ samavāyo nityasaṃbaddha eva samavāyibhirgṛhyate nāsaṃbaddhaḥ saṃbandhāntarāpekṣo vā /
GSP33brssbh2u:1576: tataśca na tasyānyaḥ saṃbandhaḥ kalpayitavyo yenānavasthā prasajyeteti /
GSP33brssbh2u:1578: saṃyogo 'pyevaṃ sati saṃyogibhirnityasaṃbaddha eveti samavāyavannānyaṃ saṃbandhamapekṣeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:1581: naca guṇatvātsaṃyogaḥ saṃbandhāntaramapekṣate na samavāyo 'guṇatvāditi yujyate vaktum /
GSP33brssbh2u:1588: apicāṇavaḥ pravṛttisvabhāvā vā nivṛttisvabhāvā vobhayasvabhāvā vānubhayasvabhāvā vābhyupagamyante gatyantarābhāvāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:1597: sāvayavānāṃ dravyāṇāmavayavavaśo vibhajyamānānāṃ yataḥ paro vibhāgo na saṃbhavati
GSP33brssbh2u:1598: te caturvidhā rūpādimantaḥ paramāṇavaścaturvidhasya rūpādimato bhūtabhautikasyārambhakā
GSP33brssbh2u:1599: nityāśceti yadvaiśeṣikā abhyupagacchanti sa teṣāmabhyupagamo nirālambana eva /
GSP33brssbh2u:1604: yadi loke rūpādimadvastu tatsvakāraṇāpekṣayā sthūlamanityaṃ ca dṛṣṭam /
GSP33brssbh2u:1605: tadyathā paṭastantūnapekṣya sthūle 'nityaśca bhavati tantavaścaṃśūnapekṣya sthūlā anityāśca bhavanti,
GSP33brssbh2u:1608: yacca nityatve kāraṇaṃ tairuktam- 'sadakāraṇavannityam' (vai. sū. 4.1.1) iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:1611: yadapi nityatve dvitīyaṃ kāraṇamuktam- 'anityamiti ca viśeṣataḥ pratiṣedhābhāvaḥ' (vai. sū. 4.1.4) iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:1613: asati hi yasminkasmiṃścinnitye vastuni nityaśabdena nañaḥ samāso nopapadyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:1618: yadapi nityatve tṛtīyaṃ kāraṇamuktam- 'avidyā ca' (vai. sū. 4.1.5)
GSP33brssbh2u:1619: iti, tadyadyevaṃ vivrīyate satāṃ paridṛśyamānakāryāṇāṃ kāraṇānāṃ pratyakṣeṇāgrahaṇamavidyeti,
GSP33brssbh2u:1622: tasya ca prāgevoktatvāt 'avidyā ca' iti punaruktaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:1623: athāpi kāraṇavibhāgātkāraṇavināśāccanyasya tṛtīyasya vināśahetorasaṃbhavo 'vidyā sā paramāṇūnāṃ nityatvaṃ khyapayatīti vyākhyāyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:1624: nāvaśyaṃ vinaśyadvastu dvābhyāmeva hetubhyāṃ vinaṣṭumarhatiti niyamo 'sti /
GSP33brssbh2u:1625: saṃyogasacive hyanekasmiṃśca dravye dravyāntarasyārambhake 'bhyupagamyamāna etadevaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:1626: yadā tvapāstaviśeṣaṃ sāmānyātmakaṃ kāraṇaṃ viśeṣavadavasthāntaramāpadyamānamārambhakamabhyupagamyate tadā ghṛtakāṭhinyavilayanavanmūrtyavasthāvilayanenāpi vināśa upapadyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:1633: sparśaguṇaḥ sūkṣmatamo vāyurityevametāni catvāri bhūtānyupacitāpacitaguṇāni sthūlasūkṣmatarasūkṣmatamatāratamyopetāni ca loke lakṣyante /
GSP33brssbh2u:1639: akalpyamāne tūpacitāpacitaguṇatve paramāṇutvasāmyaprasiddhaye yadi tāvatsarvaṃ ekaikaguṇā eva kalpyeraṃstatastejasi sparśasyopalabdhirna syāt,
GSP33brssbh2u:1652: ayaṃ tu paramāṇukāraṇavādo na kaiścidapi śiṣṭaiḥ kenacidapyaṃśena parigṛhīta ityatyantamevānādaraṇīyo vedavādibhiḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:1658: yathā hi loke śaśakuśapalāśaprabhṛtīnāmatyantabhinnānāṃ satāṃ netaretarādhīnatvaṃ bhavati,
GSP33brssbh2u:1660: atha bhavati dravyādhīnatvaṃ guṇādīnāṃ tato dravyabhāve bhāvāddravyābhāve 'bhāvāddravyameva saṃsthānādibhedādanekaśabdapratyayabhāgbhavati /
GSP33brssbh2u:1666: iha tu śuklaḥ kambalo rohiṇī dhenurnīlamutpalamiti dravyasyaiva tasya tasya tena tena viśeṣeṇa pratīyamānatvānnaiva dravyaguṇayoragnidhūmayoriva bhedapratītirasti /
GSP33brssbh2u:1675: paṭasya tu guṇāḥ śuklatvādayaḥ paṭadeśā abhyupagamyante na tantudeśāḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:1676: tathācāhuḥ - 'dravyāṇi dravyāntaramārabhante guṇāśca guṇāntaram' (vai. sū. 1.1.10) iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:1678: tantugatāśca guṇāḥ śuklādayaḥ kāryadravye paṭe śuklādiguṇāntaramārabhanta iti hi te 'bhyupagacchanti /
GSP33brssbh2u:1684: yutasiddhayoḥ saṃbandhaḥ saṃyogo 'pyutasiddhayostu samavāya ityayamabhyupagamo mṛṣaiva teṣāṃ,
GSP33brssbh2u:1686: athānyatarāpekṣa evāyamabhyupagamaḥ syādayutasiddhasya kāryasya kāraṇena saṃbandhaḥ samavāya iti,
GSP33brssbh2u:1687: evamapi prāgsiddhasyālabdhātmakasya kāryasya kāraṇena saṃbandho nopapadyate dvayāyattatvātsaṃbandhasya /
GSP33brssbh2u:1689: prākkāraṇasaṃbandhātkāryasya siddhāvabhyupagamyamānāyāmayutasiddhyabhāvātkāryakāraṇayoḥ saṃyogavibhāgau na vidyete itīdaṃ duruktaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:1691: saṃyoga evābhyupagamyate na samavāya evaṃ kāraṇadravyeṇāpi saṃbandhaḥ saṃyoga eva syānna samavāyaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:1692: nāpi saṃyogasya samavāyasya vā saṃbandhavyatirekeṇāstitve kiñcitpramāṇamasti /
GSP33brssbh2u:1695: yathaiko 'pi san devadatto loke svarūpaṃ saṃbandhirūpaṃ cāpekṣyānekaśabdapratyayabhāgbhavati,
GSP33brssbh2u:1696: manuṣyo brāhmaṇaḥ śrotriyo vadānyo bālo yuvā sthaviraḥ pitā putraḥ pautro bhrātā jāmāteti,
GSP33brssbh2u:1704: kalpitāḥ pradeśā aṇvātmamanasāṃ bhaviṣyantīti cet / na /
GSP33brssbh2u:1706: iyānevāvidyamāno viruddho 'viruddho vārthaḥ kalpanīyo nāto 'dhika iti niyamahetvabhāvāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:1708: naca vaiśeṣikaiḥ kalpitebhyaḥ ṣaḍbhyaḥ padārthebhyo 'nye 'dhikāḥ śataṃ sahasraṃ vārthā na kalpayitavyā iti nivārako heturasti /
GSP33brssbh2u:1710: kaścitkṛpāluḥ prāṇināṃ duḥkhabahulaṃ saṃsāra eva mābhūditi kalpayet /
GSP33brssbh2u:1711: anyo vā vyasanī muktānāmapi punarutpattiṃ kalpayet /
GSP33brssbh2u:1714: dvābhyāṃ paramāṇubhyāṃ niravayavābhyāṃ sāvayavasya dvyaṇukasyākāśeneva saṃśleṣānupapattiḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:1716: kāryakāraṇadravyayorāśritāśrayabhāvo 'nyathā nopapadyata ityavaśyaṃ kalpyaḥ samavāya iti cet / na /
GSP33brssbh2u:1722: paramāṇūnāṃ paricchinnatvādyāvatyo diśaḥ ṣaḍaṣṭau daśa vā tāvadbhiravayavaiḥ sāvayavāste syuḥ sāvayavatvādanityāśceti nityatvaniravayavatvābhyupagamo bādhyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:1723: yāṃstvaṃ digbhedabhedino 'vayavānkalpayasi ta eva paramāṇava iti cet / na /
GSP33brssbh2u:1725: yathā pṛthivī dvyaṇukādyapekṣayā sthūlatamā vastubhūtāpi vinaśyati,
GSP33brssbh2u:1726: tataḥ sūkṣmaṃ sūkṣmataraṃ ca pṛthivyekajātīyakaṃ vinaśyati,
GSP33brssbh2u:1751: tatra te sarvāstitvavādino bāhyamāntaraṃ ca vastvabhyupagacchanti bhūtaṃ bhautikaṃ ca cittaṃ caittaṃ ca,
GSP33brssbh2u:1755: catuṣṭaye ca pṛthivyādiparamāṇavaḥ svarasnehoṣṇasvabhāvāste pṛthivyādibhāvena saṃhanyanta iti manyante /
GSP33brssbh2u:1765: anyasya ca kasyaciccetanasya bhoktuḥ praśāsiturvā sthirasya saṃhanturanabhyupagamāt nirapekṣapravṛttyabhyupagame ca pravṛttyanuparamaprasaṅgāt
GSP33brssbh2u:1784: yadyapi bhoktā praśāsitā vā kaściccetanaḥ saṃhantā sthiro nābhyupagamyate tathāpyavidyādīnāmitaretarakāraṇatvādupapadyate lokayātrā /
GSP33brssbh2u:1786: te cāvidyādayo 'vidyā saṃskāro vijñānaṃ nāma rūpaṃ ṣaḍāyatanaṃ sparśā vedanā tṛṣṇā
GSP33brssbh2u:1787: upādānaṃ bhavo jātirjarā maraṇaṃ śokaḥ paridevanā duḥkhaṃ durmanastetyevañjātīyakā
GSP33brssbh2u:1788: itaretarahetukāḥ saugate samaye kvacitsaṃkṣiptā nirdiṣṭāḥ kvacitprapañcitāḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:1790: tadevamavidyādikalāpe parasparanimittanaimittikabhāvena ghaṭīyantravadaniśamāvartamāner'thākṣipta upapannaḥ saṃghāta iti cet /
GSP33brssbh2u:1796: yata itaretarapratyayatve 'pyavidyādīnāṃ pūrvapūrvamuttarottarasyotpattimātranimittaṃ bhavedbhavenna tu saṃghātotpatteḥ kiñcinnimittaṃ saṃbhavati
GSP33brssbh2u:1798: atrocyate- yadi tāvadayamabhiprāyo 'vidyādayaḥ saṃghātamantareṇātmānamalabhamānā apekṣante saṃghātamiti,
GSP33brssbh2u:1800: tacca nityeṣvapyaṇuṣvabhyupagamyamāneṣvāśrayāśrayibhūteṣu ca bhokteṣu satsu na saṃbhavatītyuktaṃ vaiśeṣikaparīkṣāyām /
GSP33brssbh2u:1801: kimaṅga punaḥ kṣaṇikeṣvapyaṇuṣu bhoktṛrahiteṣvāśrayiśūnyeṣu vābhyupagamyamāneṣu saṃbhavet /
GSP33brssbh2u:1804: atha manyase saṃghātā evānādau saṃsāre saṃtatyānuvartante tadāśrayāścāvidyādaya iti,
GSP33brssbh2u:1809: aniyamābhyupagame 'pi manuṣyapudgalaḥ kadācitkṣaṇena hastī bhūtvā devo vā punarmanuṣyo vā bhavediti prāpnuyāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:1811: apica yadbhogārthaḥ saṃghātaḥ syātsa nāsti sthiro bhokteti tavābhyupagamaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:1812: tataśca bhogo bhogārtha eva sa nānyena prārthanīyaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:1813: tathā mokṣo mokṣārthaṃ eveti mumukṣuṇā nānyena bhavitavyam /
GSP33brssbh2u:1816: tasmāditaretarotpattimātranimittatvamavidyādīnāṃ yadi bhavedbhavatu nāma natu saṃghātaḥ siddhyet /
GSP33brssbh2u:1818: FN: kāryaṃ prati ayate gacchatīti pratyayaḥ kāraṇam /
GSP33brssbh2u:1819: vijñānaṃ pṛthivyādicatuṣṭayaṃ rūpaṃ ceti ṣaḍāyatanāni yasyendriyajātasya tatṣaḍāyatanam /
GSP33brssbh2u:1826: kṣaṇabhaṅgavādino 'yamabhyupagama uttarasminkṣaṇa utpadyamāne pūrvaḥ kṣaṇo nirudhyata iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:1829: atha bhāvabhūtaḥ pariniṣpannāvasthaḥ pūrvakṣaṇa uttarakṣaṇasya heturityabhiprāyastathāpi nopapadyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:1831: atha bhāva evāsya vyāpāra ityabhiprāyastathāpi naivopapadyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:1833: svabhāvoparāgābhyupagame ca hetusvabhāvasya phalakālāvasthāyitve sati kṣaṇabhaṅgābhyupagamatyāgaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:1834: vinaiva vā svabhāvoparāgeṇa hetu phalabhāvamabhyupagacchataḥ sarvatra tatprāpteratiprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:1835: apicotpādanirodhau nāma vastunaḥ svarūpameva vā syātāmavasthāntaraṃ vā vastvantarameva vā /
GSP33brssbh2u:1837: yadi tāvadvastunaḥ svarūpamevotpādanirodhau syātāṃ tato vastuśabda utpādanirodhaśabdau ca paryāyāḥ prāpnuyuḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:1838: asthāsti kaścidviśeṣa iti manyetotpādanirodhaśabdābhyāṃ madhyavartino vastuna ādyantākhye avasthe abhilapyete iti,
GSP33brssbh2u:1842: yadi ca darśanādarśane vastuna utpādanirodhau syātām,
GSP33brssbh2u:1843: evamapi draṣṭṛdharmau tau na vastudharmāviti vastunaḥ śāśvatatvaprasaṅga eva /
GSP33brssbh2u:1851: caturvidhānhetūnpratītya cittacaittā utpadyanta itīyaṃ pratijñā hīyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:1853: athottarakṣaṇotpattiryāvattāvadavatiṣṭhate pūrvakṣaṇa iti brūyāttato yaugapadyaṃ hetuphalayoḥ syāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:1857: apica vaināśikāḥ kalpayanti buddhibodhyaṃ trayādanyatsaṃskṛtaṃ kṣaṇikaṃ ceti /
GSP33brssbh2u:1860: buddhipūrvakaḥ kila vināśo bhāvānāṃ pratisaṃkhyānirodho nāma bhāṣyate,
GSP33brssbh2u:1868: etau hi pratisaṃkhyāpratisaṃkhyānirodhau saṃtānagocarau vā syātāṃ bhāvagocarau vā /
GSP33brssbh2u:1872: nahi bhāvānāṃ niranvayo nirupākhyo vināśaḥ saṃbhavati,
GSP33brssbh2u:1877: pratīpā pratukūlaḥ saṃkhyā santaṃ bhāvamasantaṃ karomītyevaṃrūpā buddhiḥ pratisaṃkhyā tayā nirodhaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:1898: yenāvaraṇabhāvo viśeṣyate tattarhi vastubhūtamevākāśaṃ manyamānasya saugatasya svābhyupagamavirodhaḥ prasajyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:1899: saugate hi samaye 'pṛthivī bhagavaḥ kiṃsaṃniścayā' ityasminprativacanapravāhe pṛthivyādīnāmante
GSP33brssbh2u:1900: vāyuḥ 'kiṃsaṃniścayaḥ' ityasya praśnasya prativacanaṃ bhavati 'vāyurākāśasaṃniścayaḥ' iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:1903: apica nirodhadvayamākāśaṃ ca trayamapyetannirūpākhyamavastu nityaṃ ceti vipratiṣiddham /
GSP33brssbh2u:1908: kiṃ samyak niścaya āśrayo 'syā iti kiṃ saṃniścayā /
GSP33brssbh2u:1910: apica vaināśikaḥ sarvasya vastunaḥ kṣaṇikatāmabhyupayannupalabdhurapi kṣaṇikatāmabhyupeyāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:1915: kathaṃ hyahamado 'drākṣamidaṃ paśyāmīti ca pūrvottaradarśinyekasminnasati pratyayaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:1916: apica darśanasmaraṇayoḥ kartaryekasminpratyakṣaḥ pratyabhijñāpratyayaḥ sarvasya lokasya prasiddho 'hamado 'drākṣamidaṃ paśyāmīti /
GSP33brssbh2u:1917: yadi hi tayorbhinnaḥ kartā syāttato 'haṃ smārāmyadrākṣīdanya iti pratīyāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:1922: na nāhamityātmano darśanaṃ nirvṛttaṃ nihnute yathāgniranuṣṇo 'prakāśa iti vā /
GSP33brssbh2u:1923: tatraivaṃ satyekasya darśanasmaraṇalakṣaṇadvayasaṃbandhe kṣaṇikatvābhyupagamahāniraparihāryā vaināśikasya syāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:1925: pratipattīrā janmana ātmaikakartṛkāḥ pratisaṃdadhānaḥ kathaṃ kṣaṇabhaṅgavādī vaināśiko
GSP33brssbh2u:1933: tenedaṃ sadṛśamiti pratyayāntaramevedaṃ na pūrvottarakṣaṇadvayagrahaṇanimittamiticet / na /
GSP33brssbh2u:1936: pratyayāntarameva cetsādṛśyaviṣayaṃ syāttenedaṃ sadṛśamiti vākyaprayogo 'narthakaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:1938: yadā hi lokaprasiddhaḥ padārthaḥ parīkṣakairna parigṛhyate tadā svapakṣasiddhiḥ parapakṣadoṣo vobhayamapyucyamānaṃ parīkṣakāṇāmātmanaśca yathārthatvena na buddhisaṃtānamārohati /
GSP33brssbh2u:1943: bhavedapi kadācidbāhyavastuni vipralambhasaṃbhavāttadevedaṃ syāttatsadṛśaṃ veti saṃdehaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:1944: upalabdhari tu saṃdeho 'pi na kadācidbhavati sa evāhaṃ syāṃ tatsadṛśo veti /
GSP33brssbh2u:1945: ya evāhaṃpūrvedyuradrākṣaṃ sa evāhamadya smarāmīti niścitatadbhāvopalambhāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:1959: nahi bījādīnāmupamṛditānāṃ yo 'bhāvastasyābhāvasya śaśaviṣāṇādīnāṃ ca niḥsvabhāvatvāviśeṣādabhāvatve kaścidviśeṣo 'sti,
GSP33brssbh2u:1960: yena bījādevāṅ kuro jāyate kṣīrādeva dadhītyevañjātīyakaḥ kāraṇiśeṣaṇādibhyupagamor'thavānsyāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:1961: nirviśeṣasya tvabhāvasya kāraṇatvābhyupagame śaśaviṣāṇādibhyo 'pyaṅ kurādayo jāyeran /
GSP33brssbh2u:1963: yadi punarabhāvasyāpi viśeṣo 'bhyupagamyetotpalādīnāmiva nīlatvādistato viśeṣavattvādevābhāvasya bhāvatvamutpalādivatprasajyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:1969: sarvasya ca vastunaḥ svena svena rūpeṇa bhāvātmanaivopalabhyamānatvāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:1975: yeṣvapi bījādiṣu svarūpopamarde lakṣyate teṣvarapi nāsāvupamṛdyamānā pūrvāvasthottarāvasthāyāḥ kāraṇamabhyupagamyate,
GSP33brssbh2u:1979: paramāṇubhyaśca bhūtabhautikalakṣaṇaḥ samudāya utpadyata ityabhyupagamya punarabhāvādbhāvotpattiṃ kalpayadbhirabhyupagatamapahnuvānairvaināśikaiḥ sarvo loka ākulīkriyate // 26 //
GSP33brssbh2u:1994: evaṃ bāhyārtavādamāśritya samudāyāprāptyādiṣu dūṣaṇeṣūdbhāviteṣu vijñānavādī bauddha idānīṃ pratyavatiṣṭhite /
GSP33brssbh2u:1995: keṣāñcitkila bāhye vastunyabhiniveśamālakṣya tadanurodhena bāhyārthavādaprakriyeyaṃ virocitā /
GSP33brssbh2u:1998: tasmiṃśca vijñānavāde buddhyārūḍhena rūpeṇāntastha eva pramāṇaprameyavyavahāraḥ sarva upapadyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:2000: kathaṃ punaravagamyate 'ntastha evāyaṃ sarvavyavahāro na vijñānavyatirikto bāhyor'tho 'stīti /
GSP33brssbh2u:2002: sa hi bāhyortho 'bhyupagamyamānaḥ paramāṇavo vā syustatsamūhā vā stambhādayaḥ syuḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:2007: apicānubhāvamātreṇa sādhāraṇātmano jñānasya jāyamānasya yo 'yaṃ prativiṣayaṃ pakṣapātaḥ stambhajñānaṃ kuḍyajñānaṃ ghaṭajñānaṃ paṭajñānamiti,
GSP33brssbh2u:2021: anādau hi saṃsāre bījāṅ kuravadvijñānānāṃ vāsanānāṃ cānyonyanimittanaimittikabhāvena vaicitryaṃ na vipratiṣidhyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:2030: upalabhyate hi pratipratyayaṃ bāhyor'thaḥ stambhaḥ kuḍyaṃ ghaṭaḥ paṭa iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:2032: yathā hi kaścidbhuñjāno bhujitasādhyāyāṃ tṛptau svayamanubhūyamānāyāmevaṃ brūyānnāhaṃ bhuñje na vā tṛpyāmīti,
GSP33brssbh2u:2033: tadvadindriyasaṃnikarṣeṇa svayamupalabhamāna eva bāhyamarthaṃ nāhamupalabhe naca so 'stīti bruvankathamupādeyavacanaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:2034: nanu nāhamahaṃ bravīmi na kañcidarthamupalabha iti kiṃ tūpalabdhivyatiriktaṃ nopalabha iti bravīmi /
GSP33brssbh2u:2039: upalabdhiviṣayatvenaiva tu stambhakuḍyādīnsarve laukikā upalabhante yatpratyācakṣāṇā api bāhyārthameva vyācakṣate yadantarjñeyarūpaṃ tadbahirvadavabhāsata iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:2040: te 'pi sarvalokaprasiddhāṃ bahiravabhāsamānāṃ saṃvidaṃ pratilabhamānāḥ pratyākhyātukāmāśca bāhyamarthaṃ bahirvadati vatkāraṃ kurvanti /
GSP33brssbh2u:2043: tasmādyathānubhavaṃ tattvamabhyupagacchadbhirbahirevāvabhāsata iti yuktamabhyupagantuṃ natu bahirvadavabhāsata iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:2045: nāyaṃ sādhuradhyavasāyo yataḥ pramāṇapravṛttyapravṛttipūrvakau saṃbavāsaṃbhavāvavadhāryete na punaḥ saṃbhavāsaṃbhavapūrvike pramāṇapravṛttyapravṛttī
GSP33brssbh2u:2047: yattu na kenacidapi pramāṇenopalabhyate tanna saṃbhavati /
GSP33brssbh2u:2048: iha tu yathāsvaṃ sarvaireva pramāṇairbāhyor'tha upalabhyamānaḥ kathaṃ vyatirekāvyatirekādivikalpairna saṃbhavatītyucyetopalabdhereva /
GSP33brssbh2u:2052: ata eva sahopalambhaniyamo 'pi pratyayaviṣayayorupāyopeyabhāvahetuko nābhedahetuka ityabyupagantavyam /
GSP33brssbh2u:2053: apica ghaṭajñānaṃ paṭajñānamiti viśeṣaṇayoreva ghaṭapaṭayorbhedo na viśeṣyasya jñānasya /
GSP33brssbh2u:2054: dvābhyāṃ ca bheda etasya siddho bhavatyekasmācca dvayoḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:2057: atrāpi hi viśeṣyayoreva darśanasmaraṇayorbhedo na viśeṣaṇas ghaṭasya /
GSP33brssbh2u:2058: yathā kṣīragandhaḥ kṣīrarasa iti viśeṣyayoreva gandharasayorbhedo na viśeṣaṇasya kṣīrasya tadvat /
GSP33brssbh2u:2062: vijñānaṃ vijñānamityabhyupagacchatā bāhyorthaḥ stambhaḥ kuḍyamityevañjātīyakaḥ tasmānnābhyupagamyata eveti yuktamabhyupagantum /
GSP33brssbh2u:2063: atha vijñānaṃ prakāśātmakatvātpradīpavatsvayamevānubhūyate na tathā bāhyo 'pyartha iti cet /
GSP33brssbh2u:2065: aviruddhaṃ tu lokaprasiddhaṃ svātmavyatiriktena vijñānena bāhyor'thonubhūyata iti necchāsyaho pāṇḍityaṃ mahaddarśitam /
GSP33brssbh2u:2068: nanu vijñānasya svarūpavyatiriktagrāhyatve tadapyanena grāhyaṃ tadapyanyenetyanavasthā prāpnoti /
GSP33brssbh2u:2069: apica pradīpavadavabhāsātmakatvājjñānasya jñānāntaraṃ kalpayataḥ samatvādavabhāsyāvabhāsakabhāvānupapatteḥ kalpanānarthakyamiti /
GSP33brssbh2u:2075: pradīpavadvijñānamavabhāsakāntaranirapekṣaṃ svayameva prathata iti bruvatāpramāṇagamyaṃ vijñānamanavagantṛkamityuktaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:2078: anubhavarūpatvāttu vijñānasyeṣṭo naḥ pakṣastvayānujñāyata iti cet / na /
GSP33brssbh2u:2081: sākṣiṇo 'vagantuḥ svayaṃsiddhatāmupakṣipatā svayaṃ prathate vijñānamityeṣa eva mama pakṣastvayā vācoyuktyantareṇāśrita iti cet / na /
GSP33brssbh2u:2087: yaduktaṃ bāhyārthapalāyinā svapnādipratyayavajijāgaritagocarā api stambhādipratyayā vinaiva bāhyenārthena bhaveyuḥ pratyayatvāviśeṣāditi /
GSP33brssbh2u:2095: bādhyate hi svapnopalabdhaṃ vastu pratibuddhasya mithyā mayopalabdho mahājanasamāgama iti,
GSP33brssbh2u:2096: nahyasti mama mahājanasamāgamo nidrālagnaṃ tu me mano babhūva tenaiṣā bhrāntirudbabhūveti /
GSP33brssbh2u:2098: naivaṃ jāgaritopalabdhaṃ vastu stambhādikaṃ kasyāñcidapyavasthāyāṃ bādhyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:2101: smṛtyupalabdhayośca pratyakṣamantaraṃ svayamanubhūyater'thaviprayogasaṃyogātmakamiṣṭaṃ putraṃ smarāmi nopalabha upalabdhumicchāmīti /
GSP33brssbh2u:2102: tatraivaṃsati na śakyate vaktuṃ mithyā jāgaritopalabdhirūpalabdhitvātsvapnopalabdhivadityubhayorantaraṃ svayamanubhavatā /
GSP33brssbh2u:2105: naca yo yasya svato dharmo na saṃbhavati so 'nyasya sādharmyāttasya saṃbhaviṣyati /
GSP33brssbh2u:2115: arthopalabdhinimittā hi pratyarthaṃ nānārūpā vāsanā bhavanti /
GSP33brssbh2u:2116: anupalabhyamāneṣu tvartheṣu kiṃnimittā vicitrā vāsanā bhaveyuḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:2128: yadapyālayavijñānaṃ nāma vāsanāśrayatvena parikalpitaṃ tadapi kṣaṇikatvābhyupagamādanavasthitasvarūpaṃ satpravṛttivijñānavanna vāsanānāmadhikaraṇaṃ bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssbh2u:2132: apica vijñānavāde 'pi kṣaṇikatvābhyupagamasya samānatvādyāni bāhyārthavāde kṣaṇikatvanibandhanāni
GSP33brssbh2u:2134: evametau dvāvapi vaināśikapakṣau nirākṛtau bāhyārthavādipakṣo vijñānavādipakṣaśca /
GSP33brssbh2u:2135: śūnyavādipakṣastu sarvapramāṇavipratiṣiddha iti tannirākaraṇāya nādaraḥ kriyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:2137: FN: nādaraḥ kriyate sūtrāntarāṇi na racyanta etānyevāvṛttyā yojayante /
GSP33brssbh2u:2140: sarvaprakāreṇa yathāyathāyaṃ vaināśikasamaya upapattimattvāya parīkṣyate tathātathā sikatākūpavadvidīryata eva /
GSP33brssbh2u:2144: pradveṣo vā prajāsu viruddhārthapratipattyā vimuhyeyurimāḥ prajā iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:2151: sapta caiṣāṃ padārthāḥ saṃmatā jīvājīvāsravasaṃvaranirjarabandhamokṣā nāma /
GSP33brssbh2u:2154: tayorimamaparaṃ prapañcamācakṣate pañcāstikāyā nāma- jīvāstikāyaḥ pudgalāstikāyo dharmāstikāyo 'dharmāstikāya ākāśāstikāyaśceti /
GSP33brssbh2u:2167: ya ete saptapadārthā nirdhāritā etāvanta evaṃrūpāśceti te tathaiva vā syurnaiva vā tathā syuḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:2168: itarathā hi tathā vā syuratathā vetyanirdhāritarūpaṃ jñānaṃ saṃśayajñānavadapramāṇameva syāt /
