GSP33brssbh2u:2169: nanvanekātmakaṃ vastviti nirdhāritarūpameva jñānamutpadyamānaṃ saṃśayajñānavannāpramāṇaṃ bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssbh2u:2171: niraṅ kuśaṃ hyanekāntatvaṃ sarvavastuṣu pratijānānasya nirdhāraṇasyāpi vastutvaviśeṣātsyāditi syānavnāstītyādivikalpopanipātādinirdhāraṇātmakataiva syāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:2172: evaṃ nirdhārayiturnirdhāraṇaphalasya ca syātpakṣe 'stitā syācca pakṣe nāstīti /
GSP33brssbh2u:2175: aikāntikaphalatvanirdhāraṇe hi sati tatsādhanānuṣṭhānāya sarvo loko 'nākulaḥ pravartate nānyathā /
GSP33brssbh2u:2177: tathā pañcānāmastikāyānāṃ pañcatvasaṃkhyāsti vā nāsti veti vikalpyamānā syāttāvadekasminpakṣe,
GSP33brssbh2u:2178: pakṣāntare tu na syādityato nyūnasaṃkhyātvamadhikasaṃkhyātvaṃ vā prāpnuyāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:2183: tathā tadavadhāraṇaphalaṃ samyagdarśanamasti vā nāsti vā,
GSP33brssbh2u:2184: evaṃ tadviparītamasamyagdarśanamapyasti vā nāsti veti pralapanmattonmattapakṣasyaiva syānna pratyāyitavyapakṣasya /
GSP33brssbh2u:2185: svargāpavargayośca pakṣe bhāvaḥ pakṣe cābhāvastathā pakṣe nityatā pakṣe cānityatetyanavadhāraṇāyāṃ pravṛttyanupapattiḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:2190: yattu pudgalasaṃjñakebhyo 'ṇubhyaḥ saṃgātāḥ saṃbhavantīti kalpayanti tatpūrveṇaivāṇuvādanirākaraṇena nirākṛtaṃ bhavatītyato na pṛthaktannirākaraṇāya prayatyate // 33 // @----------------------
GSP33brssbh2u:2200: saptānāṃstitvādīnāṃ bhaṅgānāṃ samāhāraḥ saptabhaṅgī tasyā nayo nyāyaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:2202: yathaikasmindharmiṇi viruddhadharmāsaṃbhavo doṣaḥ syādvāde prasakta evamātmano 'pi jīvasyākārtsnyamaparo doṣaḥ prasajyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:2205: śarīraparimāṇatāyāṃ ca satyāmakṛtsno 'sarvagataḥ paricchinna ātmetyato ghaṭādivadanityatvamātmanaḥ prasajyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:2206: śarīrīṇāṃ cānavasthitaparimāṇatvānmanuṣyajīvo manuṣyaśarīraparimāṇo bhūtvā punaḥ kenacitkarmavipākena hastijanma prāpnuvanna kṛtsnaṃ hastiśarīraṃ vyāpnuyāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:2207: puttikājanma ca prāpmuvanna kṛtsnaḥ puttikāśarīre saṃmīyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:2208: samāna eṣa ekasminnapi janmani kaumārayauvanasthavireṣu doṣaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:2210: antāvayavo jīvastasya ta evāvayavā alpe śarīre saṃkuceyurmahati ca vikuceyuriti /
GSP33brssbh2u:2211: teṣāṃ punaranantānāṃ jīvāvayavānāṃ samānadeśatvaṃ pratihanyate vā naveti vaktavyam /
GSP33brssbh2u:2216: atha prayāyeṇa bṛhaccharīrapratipattau kecijjīvāvayavā upagacchanti tanuśarīrapratipattau ca kecidapagacchantītyucyeta tatrāpyucyate-
GSP33brssbh2u:2217: na ca paryāyād apy avirodho vikārādibhyaḥ / BBs_2,2.35 /
GSP33brssbh2u:2221: avayavopagamāpagamābhyāṃ hyaniśamāpūryamāṇasyāpakṣīyamāṇasya ca jīvasya vikriyāvattvaṃ tāvadaparihāryam,
GSP33brssbh2u:2223: tataśca bandhamokṣābhyupagamo bādhyeta karmāṣṭakapariveṣṭitasya jīvasyālābuvatsaṃsārasāgare nimagnasya bandhanocchedādūrdhvagāmitvaṃ bhavatīti
GSP33brssbh2u:2229: āgacchantaścaite jīvāvayavāḥ kutaḥ prādurbhavantyapagacchantaśca kva vā līyanta iti vaktavyam /
GSP33brssbh2u:2232: nāpi kaścidanyaḥ sādhāraṇo 'sādhāraṇo vā jīvānāmavayavādhāro nirūpyate pramāṇābhāvāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:2238: coditāyāṃ punaḥ paryāyeṇa parimāṇānavasthāne 'pi srotaḥsaṃtānanityatānyāyenātmano nityatā syāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:2239: yathā raktapaṭānāṃ vijñānānavasthāne 'pi tatsaṃtānanityatā tadvaddhisicāmapītyāśaṅkyānena sūtreṇottaramucyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:2257: yadi punaraviśeṣeṇeśvarakāraṇavādamātramiha pratiṣidhyeta pūrvottaravirodhādvyāhatābhivyāhāraḥ sūtrakāra ityetadāpadyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:2258: tasmādaprakṛtiradhiṣṭhātā kevalaṃ nimittakāraṇamīśvara ityeṣa pakṣo vedāntavihitabrahmaikatvapratipakṣatvādyatnenātra pratiṣidhyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:2260: kecittāvatsāṃkhyayogavyapāśrayāḥ kalpayanti pradhānapuruṣayoradhiṣṭhātā kevalaṃ nimittakāraṇamīśvara itaretaravilakṣaṇāḥ pradhānapuruṣeśvarā iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:2261: māheśvarāstu manyante kāryakāraṇayogavidhiduḥkhāntāḥ pañca padārthāḥ paśupatineśvareṇa paśupāśavimokṣaṇāyopadiṣṭāḥ paśupatirīśvaro nimittakāraṇamiti varṇayanti /
GSP33brssbh2u:2262: tathā vaiśeṣikādayo 'pi kecitkathañcitsvaprakriyānusāreṇa nimittakāraṇamīśvara iti varṇayanti /
GSP33brssbh2u:2275: nahi kaścidadoṣaprayuktaḥ svārthe parārthe vā pravartamāno dṛśyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:2276: svārthaprayukta eva ca sarvo janaḥ parārthe 'pi pravartata ityevamapyasāmañjasyaṃ,
GSP33brssbh2u:2296: apicāgamabalena brahmavādī kāraṇādisvarūpaṃ nirūpayatīti nāvaśyaṃ tasya yathādṛṣṭameva sarvamabhyupagantavyamiti niyamo 'sti /
GSP33brssbh2u:2297: parasya tu dṛṣṭāntabalena kāraṇādisvarūpaṃ nirūpayato yathādṛṣṭameva sarvamabhyupagantavyamityayamastyatiśayaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:2304: sa hi parikalpyamānaḥ kumabhakāra iva mṛdādīni pradhānādīnyadhiṣṭhāya pravartayet /
GSP33brssbh2u:2306: nahyapratyakṣaṃ rūpādihīnaṃ ca pradhānamīśvarasyādhiṣṭheyaṃ saṃbhavati mṛdādivailakṣaṇyāt // 39 //
GSP33brssbh2u:2309: yathā karaṇagrāmaṃ cakṣurādikamapratyakṣaṃ rūpādihīnaṃ ca puruṣo 'dhitiṣṭhatyevaṃ pradhānamapīśvaro 'dhiṣṭhāsyatīti /
GSP33brssbh2u:2315: sādhiṣṭhāno hi loke saśarīro rājā rāṣṭrasyeśvaro dṛśyate na niradhiṣṭhānaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:2316: ataśca taddṛṣṭāntavaśenādṛṣṭamīśvaraṃ kalpayitumicchata īśvarasyapi kiñciccharīraṃ karaṇāyatanaṃ varṇayitavyaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:2322: atha lokadarśanānusāreṇeśvarasyāpi kiñcitkāraṇānāmāyatanaṃ śarīraṃ kāmena kalpyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:2331: anantaṃ ca pradhānamanantāśca puruṣā mitho bhinnā abhyupagamyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:2332: tatra sarvajñeśvareṇa pradhānasya puruṣāṇāmātmanaśceyattā paricchidyeta vā na vā paricchidyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:2336: yaddhi loka iyattāparicchinnaṃ vastu paṭādi tadantavaddṛṣṭaṃ tathā pradhānapuruṣeśvaratrayamapīyattāparicchinnatvādantavatsyāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:2340: tataśceyattāparicchinnānāṃ madhye ye saṃsāriṇaḥ saṃsārānmucyante teṣāṃ saṃsāro 'ntavānsaṃsāritvaṃ ca teṣāmantavat /
GSP33brssbh2u:2341: evamitareṣvapi krameṇa mucyamāneṣu saṃsārasya saṃsāriṇāṃ cāntavattvaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:2342: pradhānaṃ ca savikāraṃ puruṣārthamīśvarasyādhiṣṭheyaṃ saṃsāritvenābhimataṃ tacchūnyatāyāmīśvaraḥ kimadhitiṣṭhet /
GSP33brssbh2u:2346: atha mā bhūdeṣa doṣa ityuttaro vikalpo 'bhyupagamyeta na pradhānasya puruṣāṇāmātmanaśceyatteśvareṇa paricchidyata iti,
GSP33brssbh2u:2353: yeṣāṃ punaḥ prakṛtiścādhiṣṭhātā cobhayātmakaṃ kāraṇamīśvaro 'bhimatasteṣāṃ pakṣaḥ pratyākhyāyayate /
GSP33brssbh2u:2354: nanu śrutisamāśrayaṇenāpyevaṃrūpa eveśvaraḥ prāṅnirdhāritaḥ prakṛtiścādhiṣṭhātā ceti /
GSP33brssbh2u:2360: sa caturdhātmānaṃ pravibhajya pratiṣṭhito vāsudevavyūharūpeṇa saṃkarṣaṇavyūharūpeṇa pradyumnavyūharūpeṇāniruddhavyūharūpeṇa ca /
GSP33brssbh2u:2365: teṣāṃ vāsudevaḥ parā parakṛtiritare saṃkarṣaṇādayaḥ kāryam /
GSP33brssbh2u:2366: tamitthaṃbhūtaṃ parameśvaraṃ bhagavantamabhigamanopādānejyāsvādhyāyayogairvarṣaśatamiṣṭvā kṣīṇakleśo bhagavantameva pratipadyata iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:2367: tatra yattāvaducyeta yo 'sau nārāyaṇaḥ paro 'vyaktātprasiddhaḥ paramātmā sarvātmā sa ātmānātmānamanekadhā vyūhyāvasthita iti,
GSP33brssbh2u:2374: yatpunaridamucyate vāsudevātsaṃkarṣaṇa utpadyate saṃkarṣaṇācca pradyumnaḥ pradyumnāccāniruddha iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:2375: atra brūmaḥ - na vāsudevasaṃjñakātparamātmanaḥ saṃkarṣaṇasaṃjñakasya jīvasyotpattiḥ saṃbhavati /
GSP33brssbh2u:2390: yasmānna hi loke karturdevadattādeḥ karaṇaṃ paraśvādyutpadyamānaṃ dṛśyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:2391: varṇayanti ca bhāgavatāḥ karturjīvātsaṃkarṣaṇasaṃjñakātkaraṇaṃ manaḥ pradyumnasaṃjñakamutpadyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:2396: athāpi syānna caite saṃkarṣaṇādayo jīvādibhāvenābhipreyante kiṃ tarhīśvarā evaite
GSP33brssbh2u:2398: vāsudevā evaite sarve nirdeṣā niradhiṣṭhāna niravadyāśceti /
GSP33brssbh2u:2400: atrocyate- evamapi tadapratiṣedha utpattyasaṃbhavasyāpratiṣedhaḥ prāpnotyevāmutpattyasaṃbhavo doṣaḥ prakārāntareṇetyabhiprāyaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:2402: yadi tāvadayamabhiprāyaḥ parasparabhinnā evaite vāsudevādayaścatvāra īśvarāstulyadharmāṇo naiṣāmekātmakatvamastīti,
GSP33brssbh2u:2407: athāyamabhiprāya ekasyaiva bhagavata ete catvāro vyūhāstulyadharmāṇa iti,
GSP33brssbh2u:2409: nahi vāsudevātsaṃkarṣaṇasyotpattiḥ saṃbhavati saṃkarṣaṇācca pradyumnasya pradyumnāccāniruddhasya,
GSP33brssbh2u:2414: vāsudevā eva hi sarve vyūhā nirviśeṣā iṣyante /
GSP33brssbh2u:2425: caturṣu vedeṣu paraṃ śreyo 'labdhvā śāṇḍilya idaṃ śāstramadhigatavānityādivedanindādarśanāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:2427: iti śrīgovindabhagavatpūjyapādaśiṣyaśrīmacchaṅkarabhagavatpūjyapādakṛtau śārīrakamīmāṃsābhāṣye dvitīyādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ samāptaḥ // 2
GSP33brssbh2u:2428: iti dvitīyādhyāyasya sāṃkhyādimatānāṃ duṣṭatvapradarśanaṃ nāma dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ // ____________________________________________________________________________________________
GSP33brssbh2u:2433: vedānteṣu tatra tatra bhinnaprasthānā utpattiśrutaya upalabhyante /
GSP33brssbh2u:2441: tatra prathamaṃ tāvadākāśamāśritya cintyate kimasyākāśasyotpattirastyuta nāstīti /
GSP33brssbh2u:2450: iti ca pañcānāṃ mahābhūtānāṃ madhyamaṃ teja ādiṅkṛtvā trayāṇāṃ tejobannānāmutpattiḥ śrāvyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:2458: taittirīyakā hi samāmananti- 'satyaṃ jñānamantaṃ brahma' iti prakṛtya 'tasmādvā etasmādātmana ākāśaḥ saṃbhūtaḥ' (tai. 2.1) iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:2468: nanu sakṛcchrutasyāpi kartuḥ kartavyadvayena saṃbandho dṛśyate,
GSP33brssbh2u:2472: prathamajatvaṃ hi chāndogye tejaso 'vagamyate taittirīyake cākāśasya /
GSP33brssbh2u:2476: ityatrāpi tasmādākāśaḥ saṃbhūtastasmāttejaḥ saṃbhūtamiti sakṛcchrutasyāpādānasya saṃbhavanasya ca viyattejobhyāṃ yugapatsaṃbandhānupapatteḥ
GSP33brssbh2u:2482: yā tvitarā viyadutpattivādinī śrutirudāhṛtā sā gauṇī bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssbh2u:2488: dravyasya caikajātīyakamanekaṃ ca dravyaṃ samavāyikāraṇaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssbh2u:2490: yasminsamavāyikāraṇe satyasamavāyikāraṇe ca tatsaṃyoga ākāśa utpadyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:2492: utpattimatāṃ ca tejaḥprabhṛtīnāṃ pūrvottarakāyorviśeṣaḥ saṃbhāvyate prāgutpatteḥ prakāśādikāryaṃ na babhūva paścācca bhavatīti /
GSP33brssbh2u:2496: tasmādyathā loka ākāśaṃ kurvākāśo jāta ityevañjātīyako gauṇaḥ prayogo bhavati,
GSP33brssbh2u:2497: yathāca ghaṭākāśaḥ karakākāśo gṛhākāśa ityekasyāpyākāśasyaivañjātīyako bhedavyapadeśo gauṇo bhavati,
GSP33brssbh2u:2504: ākāśavatsarvagataśca nityaḥ iti cākāśena brahma sarvagatatvanityatvābhyāṃ dharmābhyāmupamimāna ākāśasyāpi tau dharmau sūcayati /
GSP33brssbh2u:2506: 'sa yathānanto 'yamākāśa evamananta ātmā veditavyaḥ' iti codāharaṇam /
GSP33brssbh2u:2514: kathaṃ punarekasya saṃbhūtaśabdasya 'tasmādvā etasmādātmana ākāśaḥ saṃbhūtaḥ' (tai.
GSP33brssbh2u:2515: 2.1) ityasminnadhikāre pareṣu tejaḥprabhṛtiṣvanuvartamānasya mukhyatvaṃ saṃbhavatyākāśe ca gauṇatvamiti /
GSP33brssbh2u:2516: ata uttaramucyate- syāccaikasyāpi saṃbhūtaśabdasya viṣayaviśeṣavaśādgauṇo mukhyasya prayogo brahmaśabdavat /
GSP33brssbh2u:2519: ityasminnadhikāre 'nnādiṣu gauṇaḥ prayoga ānande ca mukhyaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:2520: yathā ca tapasi brahmavijñānasādhane brahmaśabdo bhaktyā prayujyate 'ñjasā tu vijñeye brahmaṇi tadvat /
GSP33brssbh2u:2523: nanu nabhasā dvitīyena sadvitīyaṃ brahma prāpnoti /
GSP33brssbh2u:2524: kathaṃ ca brahmaṇi vidite sarvaṃ viditaṃ syāditi /
GSP33brssbh2u:2526: yathā loke kaścitkumbhakārakule pūrvedyurmṛddaṇḍacakrādīni copalabhyāparedyuśca nānāvidhānyamatrāṇi
GSP33brssbh2u:2527: prasāritānyupalabhya brūyānmṛdevaikākinī pūrvedyurāsīditi sa ca tayāvadhāraṇayā mṛtkāryajātameva
GSP33brssbh2u:2530: yathā mṛdo 'matraprakṛteḥ kumbhakāro 'dhiṣṭhātā dṛśyate naivaṃ brahmaṇo jagatprakṛteranyo 'dhikṛtāstīti /
GSP33brssbh2u:2531: naca nabhasāpi dvitīyena sadvitīyaṃ brahma prasajyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:2534: sargakāle tu brahma jagadutpādayituṃ yatate stimitamitaravattiṣṭati /
GSP33brssbh2u:2541: ato brahmaṇā tatkāryeṇa ca vijñātena sahavijñātamevākāśaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssbh2u:2542: yathā kṣīrapūrṇe ghaṭe katicidabbindavaḥ prakṣiptāḥ santaḥ kṣīragrahaṇenaiva gṛhītā bhavanti,
GSP33brssbh2u:2552: iti, 'ātmani khalvare dṛṣṭe śrute mate vijñāta idaṃ sarvaṃ viditam' (bṛ. 4.5.6)
GSP33brssbh2u:2553: iti, 'kasminnu bhagavo vijñāte sarvamidaṃ vijñātaṃ bhavati' (muṇḍa. 1.1.3)
GSP33brssbh2u:2554: iti, 'na kācana maddhahirdhā vidyāsti' iti caivaṃrūpā prativedāntaṃ pratijñā vijñāyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:2557: vyatireke hi satyekavijñānena sarvaṃ vijñāyata itīyaṃ pratijñā hrīyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:2558: sa cāvyatireka evamupapadyate yadi kṛtsnaṃ vastujātamekasmādbrahmaṇa utpadyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:2560: tathāhi- 'yenāśrutaṃ śrutaṃ bhavati' iti pratijñāya mṛdādidṛṣṭāntaiḥ kāryakāraṇābhedapratipādanaparaiḥ pratijñaiṣā samarthyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:2564: ityevaṃ kāryajātaṃ brahmaṇaḥ pradarśyāvyatirekaṃ pradarśayanti- 'aitadātmyamidaṃ sarvam' (chā. 6.8.7)
GSP33brssbh2u:2566: tadyadyākāśaṃ na brahmakāryaṃ syānna brahmaṇi vijñāta ākāśaṃ vijñāyeta,
GSP33brssbh2u:2569: tathāhi- prativedāntaṃ te te śabdāstena tena dṛṣṭāntena tāmeva pratijñāṃ khyapayanti 'idaṃ sarvaṃ yadayamātmā' (bṛ. 2.4.6)
GSP33brssbh2u:2575: viyadutpattiviṣayaśrutyantarasya darśitatvāt 'tasmādvā etasmādātmana ākāśaḥ saṃbhūtaḥ' (tai. 2.1) iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:2583: tejaḥsargasya taittirīyake tṛtīyatvaśravaṇāt 'tasmādvā etasmādātmana ākāśaḥ saṃbhūtaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:2587: śakyā tu pariṇetuṃ chāndogyaśrutistadākāśaṃ vāyuṃ ca sṛṣṭvā 'tattejo 'sṛjata' iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:2588: nahīyaṃ śrutistejojanipradhānā satī śrutyantaraprasiddhāmākāśasyotpattiṃ vārayituṃ śaknoti /
GSP33brssbh2u:2592: nacāsmābhiḥ sakṛcchrutasya sraṣṭuḥ sraṣṭavyadvayasaṃbandho 'bhipreyate śrutyantaravaśena sraṣṭavyāntaropasaṃgrahāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:2594: ityatra sākṣādeva sarvasya vastujātasya brahmajatvaṃ śrūyamāṇaṃ na pradeśāntaravihitaṃ tejaḥpramukhamutpattikramaṃ vārayati,
GSP33brssbh2u:2595: evaṃ tejaso 'pi brahmajatvaṃ śrūyamāṇaṃ na śrutyantaravihitaṃ nabhaḥpramukhamutpattikramaṃ vārayitumarhati /
GSP33brssbh2u:2603: nahi tejaḥprāthamyānurodhena śrutyantaraprasiddho viyatpadārthaḥ parityaktavyo bhavati,
GSP33brssbh2u:2605: apica 'tattejo 'sṛjata' iti nātra kramasya vācakaḥ kaścicchabdo 'sti /
GSP33brssbh2u:2607: sa ca 'vāyoragniḥ' ityanena śrutyantaraprasiddhena krameṇa nivāryate /
GSP33brssbh2u:2610: apica chāndogye 'yenāśrutaṃ śrutaṃ bhavati' ityetāṃ pratijñāṃ vākyopakrame śrutāṃ samarthayitumasamāmnātamapi viyadutpattāvupasaṃkhyātavyaṃ,
GSP33brssbh2u:2611: kimaṅga punastaittirīyake samāmnātaṃ nabho na saṃgṛhyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:2612: yaccoktamākāśasya sarveṇānanyadeśakālatvādbrahmaṇā tatkāryaiśca saha viditameva tadbhavatyato na pratijñā hīyate,
GSP33brssbh2u:2618: kṣīrodakanyāyena ca sarvavijñānaṃ kalpyamānaṃ na samyagvijñānaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:2623: naca svakāryāpekṣayedaṃ vastvekadeśaviṣayaṃ sarvavijñānamekamevādvitīyatāvadhāraṇaṃ ceti nyāyyaṃ,
GSP33brssbh2u:2624: mṛdādiṣvapi hi tatsaṃbhavānna tadapūrvavadupanyasitavyaṃ bhavati 'śvetaketo yannu
GSP33brssbh2u:2625: somyedaṃ mahāmanā anūcānamānī stabdho 'syuta tamādeśamaprākṣyo 'yenāśrutaṃ śrutaṃ
GSP33brssbh2u:2627: tasmādaśeṣavastuviṣayamevedaṃ sarvavijñānaṃ sarvasya brahmakāryatāpekṣayopanyasyata iti draṣṭavyam // 6 //
GSP33brssbh2u:2633: yato yāvatkiñcidvikārajātaṃ dṛśyate ghaṭaghaṭikodañcanādi vā kaṭakakeyūrakuṇḍalādi vā sūcīnārācanistriṃśādi vā tāvāneva vibhāgo loke lakṣyate
GSP33brssbh2u:2638: nanvātmāpyākāśādibhyo vibhakta iti tasyāpi kāryatvaṃ ghaṭādivatprāpnoti / na /
GSP33brssbh2u:2640: yadi hyātmāpi vikāraḥ syāttasmātparamanyanna śrutamityākāśādi sarvaṃ kāryaṃ nirātmakamātmanaḥ kāryatve syāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:2650: āgantukaṃ hi vastu nirākriyate na svarūpam /
GSP33brssbh2u:2651: ya eva hi nirākartā tadeva tasya svarūpam /
GSP33brssbh2u:2656: tathā bhasmībhavatyapi dehe cātmana ucchedo vartamānasvabhāvādanyathāsvabhāvatvaṃ vā na saṃbhāvayituṃ śakyam /
GSP33brssbh2u:2659: tatpratyucyate- na tāvatsamānajātīyamevārabhate na bhinnajātīyamiti niyamo 'sti /
GSP33brssbh2u:2664: samavāyikāraṇaviṣaya eva samānajātīyatvābhyupagamo na kāraṇāntaraviṣaya iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:2672: ekaiko hi paramāṇirmanaścāyaṃ karmārabhate na dravyāntaraiḥ saṃhatyetyabhyupagamyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:2675: bhavedeṣa niyamo yadi saṃyogasacivaṃ dravyaṃ dravyāntarasyārambhakamabhyupagamyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:2676: tadeva tu dravyaṃ viśeṣavadavasthāntaramāpadyamānaṃ kāryaṃ nāmābhyupagamyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:2682: yaccoktamākāśasyotpattau na pūrvottarakālayorviśeṣaḥ saṃbhāvayituṃ śakyata iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:2684: yenaiva hi viśeṣeṇa pṛthivyādibhyo vyatiricyamānaṃ nabhaḥ svarūpavadidānīmadhyavasīyate sa eva viśeṣaḥ prāgutpatternāsīditi gamyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:2685: yathā ca brahma na sthūlādibhiḥ pṛthivyādisvabhāvaiḥ svabhāvavat,
GSP33brssbh2u:2701: 'ākāśavatsarvagataśca nityaḥ' ityapi prasiddhamahattvenākāśenopamānaṃ kriyate niratiśayamahattvāya nākāśasamatvāya /
GSP33brssbh2u:2702: yatheṣuriva savitā dhāvatīti kṣipragatitvāyocyate neṣutulyagatitvāya tadvat /
GSP33brssbh2u:2729: nanu vāyorākāśasya ca tulyayorutpattiprakaraṇe śravaṇāśravaṇayorekamevādhikaraṇamubhayaviṣayamastu kimatideśenāsati viśeṣa iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:2737: tathā vikārebhya evākāśādibhya uttareṣāṃ vikārāṇāmutpattimupaśrutyākāśasyāpi vikārādeva brahmaṇa utpattiriti kaścinmanyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:2739: na khalu brahmaṇaḥ sadātmakasya kutaścidanyataḥ saṃbhava utpattirāśaṅkitavyā /
GSP33brssbh2u:2746: sāmānyāddhi viśeṣā utpadyamānā dṛśyante mṛdāderghaṭādayo natu viśeṣebhyaḥ sāmānyam /
GSP33brssbh2u:2750: 'sa kāraṇaṃ karaṇādhipādhipo na cāsya kaścijjanitā na cādhipaḥ' (śve. 6.9)
GSP33brssbh2u:2752: vivatvapavanayoḥ punarutpattiḥ pradarśitā natu brahmaṇaḥ sāstīti vaiṣamyam /
GSP33brssbh2u:2753: naca vikārebhyo vikārāntarotpattidarśanādbrahmaṇo 'pi vikāratvaṃ bhavitumarhatīti mūlaprakṛtyanabhyupagame 'navastāprasaṅgāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:2754: yā mūlaprakṛtirabhyupagamyate tadeva ca no brahmetyavirodhaḥ // 9 //
GSP33brssbh2u:2759: tatra tejoyoniṃ prati śrutivipratipattau satyāṃ prāptaṃ tāvadbrahmayonikaṃ teja iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:2770: tasmāt 'vāyoragniḥ' iti kramopadeśo draṣṭavyo vāyoranantaramagniḥ saṃbhūta iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:2771: evaṃ prāpta ucyate- tejo 'to mātariśvano jāyata iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:2774: avyavahite hi tejaso brahmajatve satyasati vāyujatve vāyoragniritīyaṃ śrutiḥ kadarthitā syāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:2781: apica vāyorūrdhvamagniḥ saṃbhūta iti kalpya upapadārthayogaḥ kḷptastu kārakārthayogo vāyoragni saṃbhūta iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:2785: yadāpi hyākāśaṃ vāyuṃ ca sṛṣṭvā vāyubhāvāpannaṃ brahma tejo 'sṛjateti kalpyate,
GSP33brssbh2u:2787: yathā tasyāḥ śrutaṃ tasyā dadhi tasyā āmikṣetyādi /
GSP33brssbh2u:2788: darśayati ca brahmaṇo vikārātmanāvastānaṃ 'tadātmānaṃ svayamakuruta' (tai. 2.7.1) iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:2790: ityādyanukramya 'bhavati bhāvā bhūtānāṃ matta eva pṛthagvidhāḥ' (bha.gī. 10.5) iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:2791: yadyapi buddhyādayaḥ svakāraṇebhyaḥ pratyakṣaṃ bhavanto dṛśyante tathāpi sarvasya bhāvajātasya sākṣātpraṇāḍyā veśvaravaṃśyatvāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:2798: tasyā dhenoḥ śrutaṃ taptaṃ kṣīraṃ sākṣātkāryaṃ,
GSP33brssbh2u:2807: tathāhyāha- 'tadapo 'sṛjata' iti 'agnerāpaḥ' iti ca vacane nāsti saṃśayaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:2808: tejasastu sṛṣṭiṃ vyākhyāya pṛthivyā vyākhyāsyannapo 'ntariyāmityāpa iti sūtrayāṃbabhūva // 11 //
GSP33brssbh2u:2811: 'tā āpa aikṣanta bahvayaḥ syāma prajāyemahīti tā annamasṛjanta' (chā. 6.2.4)
GSP33brssbh2u:2813: tatra saṃśayaḥ - kimanenānnaśabdena vrīhiyavādyabhyavahāryai caudanādyucyate kiṃ vā pṛthivīti /
GSP33brssbh2u:2817: vrīhiyavādyeva hi sati varṣaṇe bahu bhavati na pṛthivīti /
GSP33brssbh2u:2818: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ pṛthivyeveyamannaśabdenādbhyo jāyamānā vivakṣyata iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:2822: tatra kramaprāptāṃ pṛthivīṃ mahābhūtaṃ vilaṅghya nākasmādvrīhyādiparigraho nyāyyaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:2823: tathā rūpamapi vākyaśeṣe pṛthivyanuguṇaṃ dṛśyate 'yatkṛṣṇaṃ tadannasya' iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:2826: nanu pṛthivyā api naiva kṛṣṇatvaniyamo 'sti payaḥpāṇḍurasyāṅgārarohitasya ca kṣetrasya darśanāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:2829: bhūyiṣṭhaṃ hi pṛthivyāḥ kṛṣṇaṃ rūpaṃ na tathā śvetarohite /
GSP33brssbh2u:2831: sā ca kṛṣṇābhāsetyataḥ kṛṣṇaṃ rūpaṃ pṛthivyā iti śliṣyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:2833: 'tadyadapāṃ śara āsīttatsamahanyata sā pṛthivyabhavat' (bṛ. 1.2.2) iti ca /
GSP33brssbh2u:2834: pṛthivyāstu vrīhyāderutpattiṃ darśayati- 'pṛthivyā oṣadhaya oṣadhībhyo 'nnam' iti ca /
GSP33brssbh2u:2835: evamadhikārādiṣu pṛthivyāḥ pratipādakeṣu satsu kuto vrīhyādipratipattiḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:2837: vākyaśeṣo 'pi pārthivatvādannādyasya taddvāreṇa pṛthivyā evādbhyaḥ prabhavatvaṃ sūcayatīti draṣṭavyam /
GSP33brssbh2u:2839: FN: tattatra sṛṣṭikāle yadapāṃ śaraḥmaṇḍavadghanībhāva āsītsa eva samahanyata kaṭhinaḥ saṃghāto 'bhūt /
GSP33brssbh2u:2841: tadabhidhyānād eva tu talliṅgāt saḥ / BBs_2,3.13 /
GSP33brssbh2u:2842: kimimāni viyadādīni bhūtāni svayameva svavikārānsṛjantyāhosvatparameśvara eva tena
GSP33brssbh2u:2843: tenātmanāvatiṣṭhamāno 'bhidhyāyaṃstaṃ taṃ vikāraṃ sṛjatīti saṃdehe sati prāptaṃ tāvatsvayameva sṛjantīti /
GSP33brssbh2u:2850: evaṃ prāpte 'bhidhīyate- sa eva parameśvarastena tenātmanāvatiṣṭhamāno 'bhidhyāyaṃstaṃ taṃ vikāraṃ sṛjatīti /
GSP33brssbh2u:2853: tathāhi śāstram- 'yaḥ pṛthivyāṃ tiṣṭhan pṛthivyā antaro yaṃ pṛthivī na veda yasya pṛthivī śarīraṃ yaḥ pṛthivīmantaro yamayati' (bṛ. 3.7.3)
GSP33brssbh2u:2855: tathā so 'kāmayata bahu syāṃ prajāyeya iti prastutya 'sacca tyaccābhavat /
GSP33brssbh2u:2857: iti ca tasyaiva ca sarvātmabhāvaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssbh2u:2860: prakṛtatvācca sata īkṣituḥ 'tadaikṣata bahu syāṃ prajāyeya' ityatra // 13 // @----------------------
GSP33brssbh2u:2861: FN: parameśvarasyāntaryāmibhāvenāveśaḥ saṃbandhastadvaśādbhūteṣvīkṣaṇaṃ śravaṇaṃ naitāvatā teṣāṃ cetanatvaṃ svātantryaṃ vetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:2863: viparyayeṇa tu kramo 'ta upapadyate ca / BBs_2,3.14 /
GSP33brssbh2u:2867: trayo 'pi cotpattisthitipralayā bhūtānāṃ brahmāyattāḥ śrūyante- 'yato vā imāni bhūtāni jāyante /
GSP33brssbh2u:2870: athavotpatteḥ kramasya śrutatvāpralayasyāpi kramākāṅkṣiṇaḥ sa eva kramaḥ syāditi /
GSP33brssbh2u:2871: evaṃ prāptaṃ tato brūmaḥ viparyayeṇa tu pralayakramo 'ta utpattikramādbhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssbh2u:2872: tathāhi loke dṛśyate yena krameṇa sopānamārūḍhastato viparītena krameṇāvarohatīti /
GSP33brssbh2u:2873: apica dṛśyate mṛdo jātaṃ ghaṭaśarāvādyapyayakāle mṛdbhāvamapyetyadbhyaśca jātaṃ himakarakādyabbhāvamapyetīti /
GSP33brssbh2u:2875: yadpṛthivyadbhyo jātā satī sthitikālavyatikrāntāvapo 'pīyādāpaśca tejaso jātāḥ satyastejo 'pīyuḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:2876: evaṃ krameṇa sūkṣmaṃ sūkṣmataraṃ cānantaramanantaraṃ kāraṇamapītya sarvaṃ kāryajātaṃ paramakāraṇaṃ paramasūkṣmaṃ ca brahmāpyetīti veditavyam
GSP33brssbh2u:2882: nahi kārye dhriyamāṇe kāraṇasyāpyayo yuktaḥ kāraṇāpyaye kāryasyāvasthānānupapatteḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:2883: kāryāpyaye tu kāraṇasyāvasthānaṃ yuktaṃ mṛdādiṣvevaṃ dṛṣṭatvāt // 14 // @----------------------
GSP33brssbh2u:2886: antarā vijñānamanasī krameṇa talliṅgād iti cen nāviśeṣāt / BBs_2,3.15 /
GSP33brssbh2u:2889: sendriyasya tu manaso buddheśca sadbhāvaḥ prasiddhaḥ śrutismṛtyoḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:2890: 'buddhiṃ tu sārathiṃ viddhi manaḥ pragrahameva ca /
GSP33brssbh2u:2897: khaṃ vāyurjyotirāpaḥ pṛthivī viśvasya dhāriṇī' (muṇaḍa. 2.1.3) iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:2900: yadi tāvadbhautikāni karaṇāni tato bhūtotpattipralayābhyāmevaiṣāmutpattipralayau bhavata iti naitayoḥ kramāntaraṃ mṛgyam /
GSP33brssbh2u:2902: 'annamayaṃ hi somya mana oṣadhayaḥ prāṇastejomayī vāk' (chā. 6.5.4)
GSP33brssbh2u:2904: vyapadeśo 'pi kvacidbhūtānāṃ karaṇānāṃ ca brāhmaṇaparivrājakanyāyena netavyaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:2905: atha tvabhautikāni karaṇāni tathāpi bhūtotpattikramo na karaṇairviśeṣyate prathamaṃ karaṇānyutpadyante caramaṃ bhūtāni prathamaṃ vā bhūtānyutpadyante caramaṃ vā karaṇānīti /
GSP33brssbh2u:2906: ātharvaṇe tu samāmnāyakramamātraṃ karaṇānāṃ bhūtānāṃ ca /
GSP33brssbh2u:2908: tathānyatrāpi pṛthageva bhūtakramātkaraṇakrama āmnāyate- 'prajāpatirvā idamagra āsītsa ātmānamaikṣata sa mano 'sṛjata tanmana evāsīttadātmānamaikṣata tadvācamasṛjata' ityādinā /
GSP33brssbh2u:2911: idaṃ sthūlamutpatteḥ prāk prajāpatiḥ sūtrātmā āsīt /
GSP33brssbh2u:2913: carācaravyapāśrayas tu syāt tadvyapadeśo bhāktas tadbhāvabhāvitvāt / BBs_2,3.16 /
GSP33brssbh2u:2915: jāto devadatto mṛto devadatta ityevajātīyakāllaukikavyapadeśāt jātakarmādisaṃskāravidhānācceti syātkasyacdbhrāntistāmapanudāmaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:2919: śrūyate ca- 'jīvāpetaṃ vāva kiledaṃ mriyate na jīvo mriyate' (chā. 6.11.3) iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:2923: kimāśrayaḥ punarayaṃ mukhyo yadapekṣayā bhākta iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:2926: sthāvarajaṅgamāni hi bhūtāni jāyante ca mriyante cātastadviṣayau janmamaraṇaśabdau mukhyau santau tatsthe jīvātmanyupacaryate,
GSP33brssbh2u:2929: nahi śarīrasaṃbandhādanyatra jīvo jāto mṛto vā kenacillakṣyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:2930: 'sa vā ayaṃ puruṣo jāyamānaḥ śarīramabhisaṃpadyamānaḥ sa utkrāman mriyamāṇaḥ (bṛ. 4.3.8)
GSP33brssbh2u:2934: jīvasya parasmādātmana utpattirviyadādīnāmivāsti nāsti vetyetaduttareṇa sūtreṇa vakṣyati /
GSP33brssbh2u:2935: dehāśrayau tāvajjīvasya sthūlāvutpattipralayau na sta ityetadanena sūtreṇāvocat // 16 // @----------------------
GSP33brssbh2u:2938: nātmā śruter nityatvāc ca tābhyaḥ / BBs_2,3.17 /
GSP33brssbh2u:2940: sa kiṃ vyomādivadutpadyate brahmaṇa āhosvidbrahmavadeva notpadyata iti śrutivipratipatterviśayaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:2942: kāsucittvavikṛtasya parasya brahmaṇaḥ kāryapraveśena jīvabhāvo vijñāyate nacotpattirāmnāyata iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:2946: ekasminvidite sarvamidaṃ viditam itīyaṃ pratijñā sarvasya vastujātasya brahmaprabhavatve sati noparudhyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:2948: nacāvikṛtaḥ paramātmaiva jīva iti śakyate vijñātuṃ,
GSP33brssbh2u:2953: yāvānhyākāśādiḥ pravibhaktaḥ sa sarvo vikārastasya cākāśāderutpattiḥ samadhigatā /
GSP33brssbh2u:2954: jīvātmāpi puṇyāpuṇyakarmā sukhaduḥkhayukpratiśarīraṃ pravibhakta iti tasyāpi prapañcotpattyavasara utpattirbhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssbh2u:2955: apica 'yathāgneḥ kṣudrā visphuliṅgā vyuccārantyevamevāsmādātmanaḥ sarve prāṇāḥ' (bṛ. 2.1.20)
GSP33brssbh2u:2956: iti prāṇāderbhogyajātasya sṛṣṭiṃ śiṣṭvā 'sarva eva ātmano vyuccaranti' iti bhoktṛṇīmātmanāṃ pṛthaksṛṣṭiṃ śāsti /
GSP33brssbh2u:2958: tathākṣarādvividhāḥ somya bhāvāḥ prajāyante tatra caivāpiyanti' (muṇḍa. 2.1.1)
GSP33brssbh2u:2961: jīvātmāno hi paramātmanā sarūpā bhavanti caitanyayogāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:2967: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - nātmā jīva utpadyata iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:2977: nityatvaṃ hyasya śrutibhyo 'vagamyate tathājatvamavikāritvamavikṛtasyaiva brahmaṇo jīvātmanāvasthānaṃ brahmātmanā ceti /
GSP33brssbh2u:2993: 'eko devaḥ sarvabhūteṣu gūḍhaḥ sarvavyāpī sarvabhūtāntarātmā' (śve. 6.11) iti śruteḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:2995: tathāca śāstram- 'sa vā ayamātmā brahma vijñānamayo manomayaḥ prāṇamayaścakṣurmayaḥ śrotramayaḥ' (bṛ. 4.4.5)
GSP33brssbh2u:2997: tanmayatvaṃ cāsya viviktasvarūpānabhivyaktyā taduparaktasvarūpatvaṃ strīmayo jālma ityādivaddraṣṭavyam /
GSP33brssbh2u:3000: tathāca darśayati- 'prajñānaghana evaitebhyo bhūtebhyaḥ samutthāya tānyevānu vinaśyati na pretya saṃjñāsti' (bṛ. 4.5.13) iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3002: vā ahamimaṃ vijānāmi na pretya saṃjñāsti' iti praśnapūrvakaṃ pratipādayati- 'na vā
GSP33brssbh2u:3003: are 'haṃ mohaṃ bravīmyavināśī vā are 'yamātmānucchittidharmā mātrāsaṃsargastvasya
GSP33brssbh2u:3008: iti ca prakṛtasyaiva vijñānamayasyātmanaḥ sarvasaṃsāradharmapratyākhyānena paramātmabhāvapratipādanāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:3014: etebhyo dehātmanā pariṇatebhyo bhūtebhyaḥ sāmyenotthāya janitvā tānyeva līyamānānyanu paścādvinaśyati /
GSP33brssbh2u:3018: sa kiṃ kaṇabhujānāmivāgantukacaitanyaḥ svato 'cetana āhosvitsāṃkhyānāmiva nityacaitanyasvarūpa eveti vādivipratipatteḥ saṃśayaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:3022: te pṛṣṭāḥ santo na kiñcidvayamacetayāmahīti jalpanti svasthāśca cetayamānā dṛśyante /
GSP33brssbh2u:3036: iti ca sarvaiḥ karaṇadvārairidaṃ vededaṃ vedeti vijñānenānusaṃdhānāttadrūpatvasiddhiḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:3040: yattu suptādayo na cetayanta iti tasya śrutyaiva parihāro 'bhihitaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:3041: suṣuptaṃ prakṛtya 'yadvai tanna paśyati paśyanvai tanna paśyati- nahi draṣṭurddaṣṭerviparilopo
GSP33brssbh2u:3042: vidyate 'vināśitvānna tu taddvitīyamasti tato 'nyadvibhaktaṃ yatpaśyet' (bṛ. 4.3.23) ityādinā /

GSP33brssbh2u:3500: naca loke prasiddhirasti kṛṣyādikāsu kriyāsvanaḍudādivadīśvaro 'paro 'pekṣitavya iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3501: kleṣātmakena ca kartṛtvena jantūnsaṃsṛjata īśvarasya nairghṛṇyaṃ prasajyeta,
GSP33brssbh2u:3505: sāpekṣatvaṃ ceśvarasya saṃbhavati satorjantūnāṃ dharmādharmayostayośca sadbhāvaḥ sati jīvasya kartṛtve /
GSP33brssbh2u:3509: etāṃ prāptiṃ tuśabdena vyāvartya pratijānīte- 'parāt' iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3517: yadyapi ca loke kṛṣyādiṣu karmasu neśvarakāraṇatvaṃ prasiddhaṃ,
GSP33brssbh2u:3519: tathāhi śrutirbhavati- 'eṣa hyeva sādhu karma kārayati taṃ yamebhyo lokebhya unninīyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:3520: eṣa hyevāsādhu karma kārayati taṃ yamadho ninīṣate' (kauṣī. 3.8) iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3522: nanvevamīśvarasya kārayitṛtve sati vaiṣamyanairghaṇye syātāmakṛtābhyāgamaśca jīvasyeti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3526: kṛto yaḥ prayatno jīvasya dharmādharmalakṣaṇastadapekṣa evainamīśvaraḥ kārayati /
GSP33brssbh2u:3528: jīvakṛtadharmādharmavaiṣamyāpekṣa eva tattatphalāni viṣamaṃ vibhajetparjanyavadīśvaro nimittatvamātreṇa /
GSP33brssbh2u:3529: yathā loke nānāvidhānāṃ gucchagulmādīnāṃ vrīhiyavādīnāṃ cāsādhāraṇebhyaḥ svasvabījebhyo jāyamānānāṃ sādhāraṇaṃ nimittaṃ bhavati parjanyaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:3532: evaṃ jīvakṛtaprayatnāpekṣa īśvarasteṣāṃ śubhāśubhaṃ vidadhyāditi śliṣyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:3533: nanu kṛtaprayatnāpekṣatvameva jīvasya parāyatte kartṛtve nopapadyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:3537: apica pūrvaprayatnamapekṣyedānīṃ kārayati pūrvataraṃ ca prayatnamapekṣya pūrvamakārayadityanāditvātsaṃsārasyetyanavadyam /
GSP33brssbh2u:3547: īśvarasya cātyantānapekṣatve laukikasyāpi puruṣakārasya vaiyarthyaṃ tathā deśakālanimittānāṃ pūrvoktadoṣaprasaṅgaścetyevañjātīyakaṃ doṣajātamādigrahaṇena darśayati // 42 //
GSP33brssbh2u:3549: aṃśo nānāvyapadeśād anyathā cāpi dāśakitavāditvam adhīyata eke / BBs_2,3.43 /
GSP33brssbh2u:3551: sa ca saṃbaddhayoreva loke dṛṣṭo yathā svāmibhṛtyayoryathā vāgnivisphuliṅgayoḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:3552: tataśca jīveśvarayorapyupakāryopakārakabhāvābhyupagamātkiṃ svāmibhṛtyavatsaṃbandha āhosvidagnivisphuliṅgavadityasyāṃ vicikitsāyāmaniyamo vā prāpnoti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3553: athavā svāmibhṛtyaprakāreṣveveśitrīśitavyabhāvasya prasiddhatvāttadvidha eva saṃbandha iti prāpnoti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3557: aṃśa ivāṃśo nahi niravayavasya mukhyoṃ'śaḥ saṃbhavati /
GSP33brssbh2u:3561: 'etameva viditvā munirbhavati' ' ya ātmani tiṣṭhannātmānamantaro yamayati' iti caivañjātīyako bhedanirdeśo nāsati bhede yujyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:3562: nanu cāyaṃ nānāvyapadeśaḥ sutarāṃ svāmibhṛtyasārūpye yujyata ityata āha- anyathā cāpīti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3564: kiṃ tarhyanyathā cāpi vyapadeśo bhavatyanānātvasya pratipādakaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:3565: tathāhi- eke śākhino dāśakitavādibhāvaṃ brahmaṇa āmanantyātharvaṇikā brahmasūkte- 'brahma dāśā brahma dāsā brahmaiveme kitavāḥ' ityādinā /
GSP33brssbh2u:3568: ye cānye kitavā dyūtakṛtaste sarve brahmaiveti hīnajantūdāharaṇena sarveṣāmeva nāmarūpakṛtakāryakaraṇasaṃghātapraviṣṭānāṃ jīvānāṃ brahmatvamāha
GSP33brssbh2u:3569: tathānyatrāpi brahmaprakriyāyāmevāyamarthaḥ prapañcyate- 'tvaṃ strī tvaṃ pumānasi tvaṃ kumāra uta vā kumārī /
GSP33brssbh2u:3570: tvaṃ jīrṇo daṇḍena vañcasi tvaṃ jāto bhavasi viśvatomukhaḥ' (śve. 4.3) iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3571: 'sarvāṇi rūpāṇi vicitya dhīro nāmāni kṛtvābhivadanyadāste' iti ca /
GSP33brssbh2u:3586: īśvaragītāsvapi ceśvaraṃśatvaṃ jīvasya smaryate- 'mamaivāṃśo jīvaloke jīvabhūtaḥ sanātanaḥ' (15.7) iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3591: atrāha- nanu jīvasyeśvarāṃśatvābhyupagame tadīyena saṃsāraduḥkhopabhogenāṃśina īśvarasyāpi duḥkhitvaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:3592: yathā loke hastapādādyanyatamāṅgagatena duḥkhenāṅgino devadattasya duḥkhitvaṃ tadvat /
GSP33brssbh2u:3594: ato varaṃ pūrvāvasthaḥ saṃsāra evāstviti samyagdarśanānarthakyaprasaṅgaḥ syāditi /
GSP33brssbh2u:3597: yathā jīvaḥ saṃsāraduḥkhamanubhavati naivaṃ para īśvaro 'nubhavatīti pratijānīmahe /
GSP33brssbh2u:3598: jīvo hyavidyāveśavaśāddehādyātmabhāvamiva gatvā tatkṛtena duḥkhena duḥkhyahamityavidyayā kṛtaṃ duḥkhopabhogamabhimanyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:3604: tataśca niścitametadavagamyate- mithyābhimānabhramanimitta eva duḥkhānubhava iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3606: tathāhi- putramitrādimatsu bahuṣūpaviṣṭeṣu tatsaṃbandhābhimāniṣvitareṣu ca putro
GSP33brssbh2u:3614: pratipadyamāneṣu tattadbhāvamiva pratipadyamāno 'pi na paramārthatastadbhāvaṃ pratipadyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:3615: yathā cākāśo ghaṭādiṣu gacchatsu gacchanniva vibhāvyamāno 'pi na paramārthato gacchati,
GSP33brssbh2u:3616: yathā codaśarāvādikampanāttadgate sūryapratibimbe kampamāne 'pi na tadvānsūryaḥ kampate,
GSP33brssbh2u:3617: evamavidyāpratyupasthāpite buddhyādyupahite jīvākhyeṃ'śe duḥkhāyamāne 'pi na tadvānīśvaro duḥkhāyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:3619: tathācāvidyānimittajīvabhāvavyudāsena brahmabhāvameva jīvasya pratipādayanti vedāntāḥ 'tattvamasi' ityevamādayaḥ,
GSP33brssbh2u:3623: smaranti ca vyāsādayo yathā jaivena duḥkhena na paramātmā duḥkhāyata iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3624: 'tatra yaḥ paramātmā hi sa nityo nirguṇaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:3626: karmātmā tvaparo yo 'sau mokṣabandhanaiḥ sa yujyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:3627: sa saptadaśakenāpi rāśinā yujyate punaḥ' iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3630: 'ekastathā sarvabhūtāntarātmā na lipyate lokaduḥkhena bāhyaḥ' (kaṭha. 5.11) iti ca // 47 //
GSP33brssbh2u:3631: atrāha- yadi tarhyeka eva sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāmantarātmā syātkathamanujñāparihārau syātāṃ lokikau vaidikau ceti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3635: anaṃśitvamapi hi jīvasyābhedavādinyaḥ śrutayaḥ pratipādayanti- 'tatsṛṣṭvā tadevānuprāviśat' (te. 2.6.1)
GSP33brssbh2u:3637: , 'mṛtyoḥ sa mṛtyumāpnoti ya iha nāneva paśyati' (bṛ. 4.4.19)
GSP33brssbh2u:3643: abheda eva tvatra pratipipādayiṣito brahmātmatvapratipattau puruṣārthasiddheḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:3645: naca niravayavasya brahmaṇo mukhyoṃ'śo jīvaḥ saṃbhavatītyuktam /
GSP33brssbh2u:3646: tasmātparaḥ evaikaḥ sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāmantarātmā jīvabhāvenāvasthita ityato vaktavyānujñāparihāropapattiḥ // 47 // @----------------------
GSP33brssbh2u:3649: saptadaśakena daśendrayāṇi pañca prāṇaḥ mano buddiśceti saptadaśasaṃkhyāko rāśirliṅgam /
GSP33brssbh2u:3650: mṛtyoḥ sa mṛtyu - iha brahmaṇi yo nāneva kalpitabhedaśāli cetanācetanātmakaṃ viśvaṃ paśyati sa mṛtyoranantaraṃ mṛtyuṃ janmamaraṇādiparamparārūpaṃ saṃsāraṃ prāpnotītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:3663: dṛṣṭā ca sā sarvaprāṇināmahaṃ gacchāmyahamāgacchāmyahamandho 'hamanandho 'haṃ mūḍho 'hamamūḍha ityevamātmikā /
GSP33brssbh2u:3674: satyaṃ vyatirekadarśino niyojyatvaṃ tathāpi vyomādivaddehādyasaṃhatatvamapaśyata evātmano niyojyatvābhimānaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:3682: yathāca prakāśa ekasyāpi savituramedhyadeśasaṃbaddhaḥ parihriyate netaraḥ śucibhūmiṣṭhaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:3685: yathā mūtraparīṣaṃ gavāṃ pavitratayā parigṛhyate tadeva jātyantare parivarjyate tadvat // 48 // @----------------------
GSP33brssbh2u:3691: yatsvayaṃ karmaphalasaṃbandhaḥ sa caikātmyābhyupagame vyatikīryeta svāmyekatvāditi cet /
GSP33brssbh2u:3694: nahi kartṛbhoktṛścātmanaḥ saṃtataḥ sarvaiḥ śarīraiḥ saṃbandho 'sti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3697: tataśca karmavyatikaraḥ phalavyatikaro vā na bhaviṣyati // 49 //
GSP33brssbh2u:3699: ābhāsa eva caiṣa jīvaḥ parasyātmano jalasūryakādivatpratipattavyaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:3702: ataśca yathā naikasmiñjalasūryake kampamāne jalasūryakāntaraṃ kampate,
GSP33brssbh2u:3707: yeṣāṃ tu bahava ātmānaste ca sarve sarvagatāsteṣāmevaiṣa vyatikaraḥ prāpnoti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3709: bahavo vibhavaścātmānaścaitanyamātrasvarūpā nirguṇā niratiśayāśca tadarthaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ pradhānaṃ tannimittaiṣāṃ bhogāpavargasiddhiriti sāṃkhyāḥ
GSP33brssbh2u:3710: sati bahutve vibhutve ca ghaṭakuḍyādisamānā dravyamātrasvarūpāḥ svato 'cetanā ātmanastadupakaraṇāni cāṇūni manāṃsyacetanāni /
GSP33brssbh2u:3711: tatrātmadravyāṇāṃ manodravyāṇāṃ ca saṃyogānnavecchādayo vaiśeṣikā ātmaguṇā utpadyante /
GSP33brssbh2u:3712: te cāvyatirekeṇa pratyekamātmasu samavayanti sa saṃsāraḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:3714: tatra sāṃkhyānāṃ tāvaccaitanyasvarūpatvātsarvātmanāṃ saṃnidhānādyaviśeṣāccaikasya sukhaduḥkhasaṃbandhe sarveṣāṃ sukhaduḥkhasaṃbandhaḥ prāpnoti
GSP33brssbh2u:3722: asatyāṃ punarupapattau kāmaṃ mā bhūdabhilaṣitaṃ puruṣakaivalyaṃ,
GSP33brssbh2u:3724: kāṇādānāmapi yadaikenātmanā manaḥ saṃyujyate tadātmāntarairapi nāntarīyakaḥ saṃyogaḥ syātsaṃnidhānādyaviśeṣāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:3725: tataśca hetvaviśeṣātphalāviśeṣa ityekasyātmanaḥ sukhaduḥkhayoge sarvātmanāmapi samānaṃ sukhaduḥkhitvaṃ prasajyeta // 50 //
GSP33brssbh2u:3731: sāṃkhyānāṃ tāvattadanātmasamavāyi pradhānavarti pradhānasādhāraṇyānna pratyātmaṃ sukhaduḥkhopabhogasya niyāmakamupapadyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:3732: kāṇādānāmapi pūrvavatsādhāraṇenātmamanaḥsaṃyogena nirvartitasyādṛṣṭasyāpyasyaivātmana idamadṛṣṭamiti niyame hetvabhāvādeṣa eva doṣaḥ // 51 //
GSP33brssbh2u:3734: ahamidaṃ phalaṃ prāpnavānīdaṃ pariharāṇītthaṃ prayatā itthaṃ karavāṇītyevaṃvidhā abhisaṃdhyādayaḥ pratyātmaṃ pravartamānā adṛṣṭasyātmanāṃ ca svasvāmibhāvaṃ niyaṃsyantīti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3737: abhisaṃdhyādīnāmapi sādhāraṇenaivātmamanaḥsaṃyogena sarvātmasaṃnidhau kriyamāṇānāṃ niyamahetutvānupapatteruktadoṣānuṣaṅga eva // 52 //
GSP33brssbh2u:3739: athocyeta vibhutve 'pyatmanaḥ śarīrapratiṣṭhena manasā saṃyogaḥ śarīrāvacchinna evātmapradeśe
GSP33brssbh2u:3740: bhaviṣyatīti ataḥ pradeśakṛtā vyavasthābhisaṃdhyādīnāmadṛṣṭasya sukhaduḥkhayośca bhaviṣyatīti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3745: tatra na vaiśeṣikaiḥ śarīrāvacchinno 'pyātmānaḥ pradeśaḥ kalpayituṃ śakyaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:3746: kalpyamāno 'pyayaṃ niṣpradeśasyātmanaḥ pradeśaḥ kālpanikatvādeva na pāramārthikaṃ kāryaṃ niyantuṃ śaknoti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3747: śarīramapi sarvātmasaṃnidhāvutpadyamānamasyaivātmano netareṣāmiti na niyantuṃ śakyam /
GSP33brssbh2u:3748: pradeśaviśeṣābhyupagame 'pi ca dvayorātmanoḥ samānasukhaduḥkhabhājoḥ kadācidekenaiva tāvaccharīreṇopabhogasiddhiḥ syāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:3751: yajñadattaśarīre ca taṃ pradeśamanuprāpte tasyāpītareṇa samānaḥ sukhaduḥkhānubhavo
GSP33brssbh2u:3752: dṛśyate sa na syādyadi devadattayajñadattayoḥ samānapradeśamaniṣṭaṃ na syāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:3765: iti śrīgovindabhagavatpūjyapādaśiṣyaśrīmacchaṅkarabhagavatpūjyapādakṛtau śrīśārīrakamīmāṃsābhāṣye dvitīyādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ samāptaḥ //
GSP33brssbh2u:3774: iti caivamādiṣūtpattiprakaraṇeṣu prāṇānāmutpajirnāmnāyate kvaciccānutpattirevaiṣāmāmnāyate 'asadvā idamagra āsīt' (tai. 2.7)
GSP33brssbh2u:3777: prāṇā vāva ṛṣayaḥ' ityatra prāgutpatteḥ prāṇānāṃ sadbhāvaśravaṇāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:3778: anyatra tu prāṇānāmapyutpattiḥ paṭhyate- 'yathāgnerjvalataḥ kṣudrā visphuliṅgā vyuccarantyevamevaitasmādātmanaḥ sarve prāṇāḥ' iti,
GSP33brssbh2u:3781: iti, 'sa prāṇamasṛjata prāṇācchraddhāṃ khaṃ vāyurjyotirāpaḥ pṛthivīndriyaṃ mano 'nnam' (pra. 6.4)
GSP33brssbh2u:3798: atra prāṇotpattivādivākyajātamujadāharaṇam- 'etasmādātmanaḥ sarve prāṇāḥ sarve lokāḥ sarve devāḥ sarvāṇi bhūtāni vyuccaranti' (bṛ. 2.1.20)
GSP33brssbh2u:3800: tatra yathā lokādayaḥ parasmādbrahmaṇa utpadyante tathā prāṇā apītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:3801: tathā- 'etasmājjāyate prāṇo manaḥ sarvendriyāṇi ca khaṃ vāyurjyotirāpaḥ pṛthivī viśvasya dhāriṇī' (muṇḍa. 2.1.3)
GSP33brssbh2u:3805: yathātītānantarapādādyuktā viyadādayaḥ parasya brahmaṇo vikārāḥ samadhigatāstathā prāṇā api parasya brahmaṇo vikārā iti yojayitavyam /
GSP33brssbh2u:3808: nanu keṣucitpradeśeṣu na prāṇānāmutpattiḥ śrūyata ityuktaṃ tadayuktam /
GSP33brssbh2u:3814: yathā tṛtīyādhyaye caturthapādeṣvapratigraheṣvadhikaraṇapūrvapakṣanyāyo bahusūtravyavahito 'pi somavamane parāmṛśyate tadvadatrāpi jñeyam /
GSP33brssbh2u:3822: iti hyekavijñānena sarvavijñānaṃ pratijñāya tatsādhanāyedamāmnāyate- 'etasmājjāyate prāṇaḥ' (muṇḍa. 2.1.3) ityādi /
GSP33brssbh2u:3823: sā ca pratijñā prāṇādeḥ samastasya jāgato brahmavikāratve sati prakṛtivyatirekeṇa vikārābhāvātsiddhyati /
GSP33brssbh2u:3825: tathāca pratijñātārthamupasaṃharati- 'puruṣa evedaṃ viśvaṃ karma tapo brahma parāmṛtam' (muṇḍa. 2.2.11)
GSP33brssbh2u:3827: tathā 'ātmano vā are darśanena śravaṇena matyā vijñānenedaṃ sarvaṃ viditam' ityevañjātīyakāsu śrutiṣveṣaiva pratijñā yojayitavyā /
GSP33brssbh2u:3832: avāntaraprakṛtiviṣayaṃ tvetatsvavavikārāpekṣaṃ pragutpatteḥ prāṇānāṃ sadbhāvāvadhāraṇamiti draṣṭavyam /
GSP33brssbh2u:3834: viyadadhikaraṇe hi 'gauṇyasaṃbhavāt' iti pūrvapakṣasūtratvādgauṇī janmaśrutirasaṃbhavāditi vyākhyātam /
GSP33brssbh2u:3837: tadanurodena tvihāpi gauṇī janmaśrutisaṃbhavāditi vyācakṣāṇaiḥ pratijñāhānirupekṣitā syāt // 2 //
GSP33brssbh2u:3840: yajjāyata ityekaṃ janmavācipadaṃ prāṇeṣu prākśrutaṃ saduttareṣvapyākāśādiṣvanuvartate /
GSP33brssbh2u:3842: ityatrākāśādiṣu mukhyaṃ janmeti pratiṣṭhāpitaṃ tatsāmānyātprāṇeṣvapi mukhyameva janma bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssbh2u:3843: nahyekasminprakaraṇa ekasmiṃśca vākya ekaḥ śabdaḥ sakṛduccarito bahubhiḥ saṃbadhyamānaḥ kvacinmukhyaḥ kvacidgauṇa ityadhyavasātuṃ śakyam /
GSP33brssbh2u:3846: ityatrāpi prāṇeṣu śrutaḥ sṛjatiḥ pareṣvapyutpattimatsu śraddhādiṣvanuṣajyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:3847: yatrāpi paścacchruta utpattivacanaḥ śabdaḥ pūrvaiḥ saṃbadhyate tatrāpyeṣa eva nyāyaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:3848: yathā 'sarvāṇi bhūtāni vyuccaranti' ityayamante paṭhito vyuccarantiśabdaḥ pūrvairapi prāṇādibhiḥ saṃbadhyate // 3 //
GSP33brssbh2u:3853: tathāpi brahmaprakṛtikatejobannapīrvakatvābhidhānādvākprāṇamanasāṃ tatsāmānyācca sarveṣāmeva prāṇānāṃ brahmaprabhavatvaṃ siddhaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssbh2u:3854: tathāhi- asminneva prakaraṇe tejobannapūrvakatvaṃ vākprāṇamanasāmāmnāyate- 'annamayaṃ hi somya mana āpomayaḥ prāṇastejomayī vāk' (chā. 6.5.4) iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3855: tatra yadi tāvanmukhyamevaiṣāmannādimayatvaṃ tato vartata eva brahmaprabhavatvam /
GSP33brssbh2u:3856: atha bhāktaṃ tatāpi brahmakartṛkāyāṃ nāmarūpavyākriyāyāṃ śravaṇāt 'yenāśrutaṃ śrutaṃ bhavati' (chā. 6.1.3)
GSP33brssbh2u:3865: saṃprati tu katītare prāṇā iti saṃpradhārayati /
GSP33brssbh2u:3867: kvacitsapta prāṇāḥ saṃkīrtyante- 'sapta prāṇāḥ prabhavanti tasmāt' (muṇḍa. 2.1.8) iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3868: kvaciccāṣṭau prāṇā grahatvena guṇena saṃkīrtyante- ' aṣṭau grahā aṣṭāvatigrahāḥ'' (bṛ. 3.2.1) iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3869: kvacinnava- 'sapta vai śīrṣaṇyāḥ prāṇā dvāvavāñcau' (tai. saṃ. 5.1.7.1) iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3870: kvaciddaśa- 'nava vai puruṣe prāṇā nābhirdaśamī' iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3874: evaṃ hi vipratipannāḥ prāṇeyattāṃ prati śrutayaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:3885: puruṣabhedābhiprāyeyaṃ vīpsā pratipuruṣaṃ sapta sapta prāṇā iti,
GSP33brssbh2u:3886: na tattvabhedābhiprāyā sapta saptānye 'nye prāṇā iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3887: nanvaṣṭatvādikāpi saṃkhāyā prāṇeṣūdāhṛtā kathaṃ saptaiva syuḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:3900: hastādayastvapare saptabhyo 'tiriktāḥ prāṇāḥ śrūyante- 'hastau vai grahaḥ sa karmaṇātigraheṇa gṛhīto hastābhyāṃ hi karma karoti' (bṛ. 3.2.8)
GSP33brssbh2u:3903: hīnādhikasaṃkhyāvipratipattau hyadhikā saṃkhyā saṃgrāhyā bhavati tasyāṃ hīnāntarbhavati natu hīnāyāmadhikā /
GSP33brssbh2u:3904: ataśca naivaṃ mantavyaṃ stokakalpanānurodhātsaptaiva prāṇāḥ syuriti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3906: tathā codāhṛtā śrutiḥ - 'daśeme puruṣe prāṇā ātmaikādaśaḥ' (bṛ. 3.9.4) iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3911: nanvekādaśābhyaḥ kāryajātebhyo 'dhikaṃ kāryajātamasti yadarthamadhikaṃ karaṇaṃ kalpyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:3913: vacanādānaviharaṇotsargānandāḥ pañca karmabhedāstadarthāni ca pañca karmendriyāṇi /
GSP33brssbh2u:3915: tadeva vṛttibhedāt kvacidbhinnavadvyapadiśyate- 'mano buddhiraṅaṃkāraścittaṃ ca' iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3916: tathāca śrutiḥ kāmādyā nānāvidhā vṛttiranukramyāha- 'etatsarvaṃ mana eva' (bṛ. 1.5.3) iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3917: apica saptaiva śīrṣaṇyānprāṇānabhimanyamānasya catvāra eva prāṇā abhimatāḥ syuḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:3918: sthānabhedāddhyete catvāraḥ santaḥ sapta gaṇyante 'dve śrotre dve cakṣuṣī dve nāsike ekā vāk' iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3919: naca tāvatāmeva vṛttibhedā itare prāṇā iti śakyate vaktuṃ,
GSP33brssbh2u:3922: ityatrāpi dehacchidrabhedābhiprāyeṇaiva daśa prāṇā ucyante na prāṇatattvabhedābhiprāyeṇa /
GSP33brssbh2u:3925: mukhyasya tu prāṇasya bhavati nābhirapyekaṃ viśeṣāyatanamityato nābhirdaśamītyucyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:3927: tadevaṃ vicitre prāṇeyattāmnāne sati kva kiṃparamāmnānamiti vivektavyam /
GSP33brssbh2u:3930: saptaiva prāṇāḥ syuryataḥ saptānāmeva gatiḥ śrūyate- 'tamutkrāmantaṃ prāṇo 'nūtkrāmantaṃ sarve prāṇā anūtkrāmanti' (bṛ. 4.4.2) ityatra /
GSP33brssbh2u:3934: saptaiva hi prāṇāścakṣurādayastvakparyantā viśeṣitā iha prakṛtāḥ 'sa yatraiva cākṣuṣaḥ puruṣaḥ parāṅparyāvartate 'thārūpajño bhavati' (bṛ. 4.4.1)
GSP33brssbh2u:3937: prakṛtagāmī ca sarvaśabdo bhavati yathā sarve brāhmaṇā bhojayitavyā iti ye nimantritāḥ prakṛtā brāhmaṇāsta eva sarvaśabdenocyante nānye /
GSP33brssbh2u:3938: evamihāpi ye prakṛtāḥ sapta prāṇāsta eva sarvaśabdenocyante nānya iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3944: evaṃprāpte brūmaḥ - hastādayastvapare saptabhyo 'tiriktāḥ prāṇāḥ pratīyante-' hastau vai grahaḥ' (bṛ. 3.2.8)
GSP33brssbh2u:3948: sa ca kṣetrajño naikasminneva śarīre badhyate,
GSP33brssbh2u:3951: tathāca smṛtiḥ - puryaṣṭakena liṅgena prāṇādyena sa yujyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:3952: tena baddhasya vai bandho mokṣo muktasya tena ca /
GSP33brssbh2u:3954: ātharvaṇe ca viṣayendriyānukramaṇe cakṣuṣa draṣṭavyaṃ ca ityatra tulyavaddhastādīnīndriyāṇi
GSP33brssbh2u:3955: saviṣayāṇyanukrāmati-' hastau cādātavyaṃ copasthaścānandayitavyaṃ ca pāyuśca visarjayitavyaṃ
GSP33brssbh2u:3956: ca pādau ca gantavyaṃ ca' ( pra. 4.8) iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3957: tathā 'daśeme puruṣe prāṇā ātmaikādaśaste yadāsmāccharīrānmartyādutkrāmantyatha rodayanti' (bṛ. 3.9.4)
GSP33brssbh2u:3960: sarvaśabdo 'pi ca prāṇaśabdena saṃbadhyamāno 'śeṣānprāṇānabhidadhāno na prakaraṇavaśena saptasvevāvasthāpayituṃ śakyate,
GSP33brssbh2u:3962: sarve brāhmaṇā bhojayitavyā ityatrāpi sarveṣāmevāvanivartināṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ grahaṇaṃ nyāyyaṃ,
GSP33brssbh2u:3969: FN: guhāyāṃ hṛdaye śerata iti guhāśayāḥ svastāneṣu nihitāḥ nikṣiptāḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:3974: prāṇādipañcakaṃ bhūtasūkṣmapañcakaṃ jñānendriyapañcakaṃ karmendriyapañcakaṃ antaḥkaraṇacatuṣṭayaṃ avidyā kāmaḥ karma ceti paryuṣṭakam /
GSP33brssbh2u:3981: sūkṣmā ete prāṇāḥ sthūlāścetsyurmaraṇakāle śarīrānnirgacchanto bilādahirivopalabhyeranmriyamāṇasya pārśvasthaiḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:3986: yadeva hyupalabdhisādhanaṃ vṛttiranyadvā tasyaiva naḥ karaṇatvaṃ saṃjñāmātre vivāda iti karaṇānāṃ vyāpitvakalpanā nirarthikā /
GSP33brssbh2u:4000: nāsadāsīye hi brahmapradhāne sūkte mantravarṇo bhavati 'na mṛtyurāsīdamṛtaṃ na tarhi na rātryā ahnu āsītpraketaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:4001: ānīdavātaṃ svadhayā tadekaṃ tasmāddhānyanna paraḥ kiñcanāsa' (ṛ.saṃ. 8.7.17) iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:4007: 'aprāṇo hyamanāḥ śubhraḥ' iti ca mulaprakṛteḥ prāṇādisamastaviśeṣarahitatvasya darśitatvāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:4009: śreṣṭha iti ca mukhyaṃ prāṇamabhidadhāti- 'prāṇo vāva jyeṣṭhaśca śreṣṭhaśca' (chā. 5.1.1)
GSP33brssbh2u:4012: na cetasya tadānīṃ vṛttilābhaḥ syādyonau niṣiktaṃ śukraṃ pūyeta na saṃbhavedvā /
GSP33brssbh2u:4016: FN: tarhi tadā pralayakāle mṛtyurmārako mṛtyumatkāryaṃ vā nāsīt,
GSP33brssbh2u:4018: rātryāḥ praketaścihnarūpaścandraḥ ahaḥ praketaḥ sūryaśca nāstāṃ,
GSP33brssbh2u:4023: sa punarmukhyaḥ prāṇaḥ kiṃsvarūpa itīdānīṃ jijñāsyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:4025: evaṃ hi śrūyate- 'yaḥ prāṇaḥ sa vāyuḥ sa eṣa vāyuḥ pañcavidhaḥ prāṇo 'pāno vyāna udānaḥ samānaḥ' iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:4027: evaṃ hi tantrāntarīyā ācakṣate- 'sāmānyā karaṇavṛttiḥ prāṇādyā vāyavaḥ pañce' ti /
GSP33brssbh2u:4028: atrocyate- na vāyuḥ prāṇo nāpi karaṇavyāpāraḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:4030: vāyostāvatprāṇasya pṛthagupadeśo bhavati- 'prāṇa eva brahmaṇaścaścaturthaḥ pādaḥ sa vāyunā jyotiṣā bhāti ca tapati ca' (chāndo. 3.18.4) iti
GSP33brssbh2u:4035: nahi karaṇavyāpāra eva san karaṇebhyaḥ pṛthagupadiśyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:4038: ityevamādayo 'pi vāyoḥ karaṇebhyaśca prāṇasya pṛthagupadeśā anusartavyāḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:4042: yathaitapañjaravartina ekādaśapakṣiṇaḥ pratyekaṃ pratiniyatavyāpārāḥ santaḥ saṃbhūyaikaṃ pañjaraṃ cālayanti,
GSP33brssbh2u:4043: evamekaśarīravartina ekādaśa prāṇāḥ pratyekaṃ pratiniyatavṛttayaḥ santaḥ saṃbhūyaikāṃ prāṇākhyāṃ vṛttiṃ pratilapsyanta iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:4045: yuktaṃ tatra pratyekavṛttibhiravāntaravyāpāraiḥ pañjaracālanānurūpairevopetāḥ pakṣiṇaḥ saṃbhūyaikaṃ pañjaraṃ cālayeyuriti /
GSP33brssbh2u:4047: iha tu śravaṇādyavāntaravyāpāropetāḥ prāṇa na saṃbhūya prāṇyuriti yuktam,
GSP33brssbh2u:4050: tathā prāṇasya śreṣṭhatvādyudghoṣaṇaṃ guṇabhāvopagamaśca taṃ prati vāgādīnāṃ,
GSP33brssbh2u:4053: kathaṃ tarhīyaṃ śrutiḥ 'yaḥ prāṇaḥ sa vāyuḥ' iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:4054: ucyate- vāyurevāyamadhyātmamāpannaḥ pañcavyūho viśeṣātmanāvatiṣṭhamānaḥ prāṇo nāma bhaṇyate na tattvāntaraṃ nāpi vāyumātram /
GSP33brssbh2u:4059: tathāhyanekavidhā vibhūtiḥ prāṇasya śrāvyate- 'supteṣu vāgādiṣu prāṇa eko hi jāgarti
GSP33brssbh2u:4060: prāṇa eko mṛtyunānāptaḥ prāṇaḥ saṃvargo vāgādīnsaṃvṛṅ kte prāṇa itarānprāṇānrakṣati
GSP33brssbh2u:4066: yathā cakṣurādīni rājaprakṛtivajjīvasya kartṛtvaṃ bhoktṛtvaṃ ca pratyupakaraṇāni na svatantrāṇi /
GSP33brssbh2u:4067: tathā mukhyo 'pi prāṇo rājamantrivajjīvasya sarvārthakaratvenopakaraṇabhūto na svatantraḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:4071: samānadharmāṇāṃ ca saha śāsanaṃ yuktaṃ bṛhadrathantarādivat /
GSP33brssbh2u:4076: rūpādyālocanādibhirvṛttibhiryathāsvaṃ cakṣurādīnāṃ jīvaṃ prati karaṇabhāvo bhavati /
GSP33brssbh2u:4077: apicaikādaśaiva kāryajātāni rūpālocanādīni parigaṇitāni yadarthamekādaśa prāṇāḥ saṃgṛhītāḥ natu dvādaśamaparaṃ kāryajātamadhigamyate yadarthamayaṃ dvādaśaḥ prāṇaḥ pratijñāyeteti /
GSP33brssbh2u:4079: akaraṇatvāc ca na doṣas tathā hi darśayati / BBs_2,4.11 /
GSP33brssbh2u:4085: tathāhi śrutiḥ prāṇāntareṣvasaṃbhāvyamānaṃ mukhyaprāṇasya vaiśeṣikaṃ kāryaṃ darśayati
GSP33brssbh2u:4086: prāṇasaṃvādādiṣu- 'atha ha prāṇā ahaṃśreyasi vyūdire' ityupakramya 'yasminva utkrānte
GSP33brssbh2u:4087: śarīraṃ pāpiṣṭhataramiva dṛśyate sa vaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ' (chā. 5.1.6,7)
GSP33brssbh2u:4088: iti copanyasya pratyekaṃ vāgādyutkramaṇena tadvṛttimātrahīnaṃ yathāpūrvaṃ jīvanaṃ
GSP33brssbh2u:4089: darśayitvā prāṇoccikramiṣāyāṃ vāgādiśaithilyāpattiṃ śarīrapātaprasaṅgaṃ ca darśayantī
GSP33brssbh2u:4091: 'tāvanvariṣṭhaḥ prāṇa uvāca mā mohamāpadyathāhamevaitatpañcadhātmānaṃ pravibhajyaitadbāṇamavaṣṭabhya vidhārayāmi,
GSP33brssbh2u:4093: 4.3.12) iti ca supteṣu cakṣurādiṣu prāṇanimittāṃ śarīrarakṣāṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssbh2u:4095: 'tena yadaśnāti yatpibati tenetarānprāṇānavati' iti ca prāṇanimittāṃ śarīrendriyapuṣṭiṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssbh2u:4096: 'kasminnvahamutkrānta utkrānto bhaviṣyāmi kasminvā pratiṣṭhite pratiṣṭhāsyāmi' iti,
GSP33brssbh2u:4097: 'sa prāṇamasṛjata' iti ca prāṇanimitte jīvasyotkrāntapratiṣṭhe darśayati // 11 // @----------------------
GSP33brssbh2u:4104: yatkāraṇaṃ pañcavṛttirayaṃ vyapadiśyate śrutiṣu 'prāṇo 'pāno vyāna udānaḥ samānaḥ' (bṛ. 1.5.3) iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:4112: yathā manasaḥ pañca vṛttaya evaṃ prāṇasyāpītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:4113: śrotrādinimittāḥ śabdādiviṣayā manasaḥ pañca vṛttayaḥ prasiddhāḥ,
GSP33brssbh2u:4114: natu kāmaḥ saṃkalpaḥ ityādyāḥ paripaṭhitāḥ parigṛhyeran /
GSP33brssbh2u:4116: nanvatrāpi śrotrādinirapekṣā bhūtabhaviṣyadādiviṣayāparā manaso vṛttirastīti samānaḥ pañcasaṃkhyātirekaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:4117: evaṃ tarhi 'paramatamapratiṣiddhamanumataṃ bhavati' iti nyāyādihāpi yogaśāstraprasiddhā
GSP33brssbh2u:4120: bahuvṛttitvamātreṇa vā manaḥ prāṇasya nidarśanamiti draṣṭavyam /
GSP33brssbh2u:4133: nanu vibhutvamapi prāṇasya samāmnāyate- 'samaḥ pluṣiṇā samo maśakena samo nāgena sama ebhistribhirlokaiḥ samo 'nena sarveṇa (bṛ. 1.3.22)
GSP33brssbh2u:4135: taducyate- ādhidaivikena samaṣṭivyaṣṭirūpeṇa hairaṇyagarṇeṇa prāṇātmanaivaitadvibhutvamāmnāyate nādhyātmikena /
GSP33brssbh2u:4136: apica samaḥ pluṣiṇetyādinā sāmyavacanena pratiprāṇivartinaḥ prāṇasya pariccheda eva pradarśyate tasmādadoṣaḥ // 13 // @----------------------
GSP33brssbh2u:4137: FN: pluṣirmaśakādapi sūkṣmo jantuḥ, nāgo hastī /
GSP33brssbh2u:4140: te punaḥ prakṛtāḥ prāṇāḥ kiṃ svamahimnaiva svasmai kāryāya prabhavantyāhosviddevatādhiṣṭhitāḥ
GSP33brssbh2u:4141: prabhavantīti vicāryate- tatra prāptaṃ tāvadyathā svakāryaśaktiyogātsvamahimnaiva
GSP33brssbh2u:4143: apica devatādhiṣṭhitānāṃ prāṇānāṃ pravṛttāvabhyupagamyamānāyāṃ tāsāmevādhiṣṭhātrīṇāṃ devatānāṃ bhoktṛtvaprasaṅgāccharīrasya bhoktṛtvaṃ pralīyeta
GSP33brssbh2u:4145: evaṃ prāptaṃ idamucyate- jyotirādyadhiṣṭhānaṃ tu iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:4147: jyotirādibhiragnyādyabhimāninībhirdevatābhiradhiṣṭhitaṃ vāgādi karaṇajātaṃ svakāryeṣu pravartata iti pratijānīte /
GSP33brssbh2u:4151: nahi devatāsaṃbandhaṃ pratyākhyāyāgnervāci mukhe vā kaścidviśeṣasaṃbandho dṛśyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:4154: tathānyatrāpi vāgeva brahmaṇaścaturthaḥ pādaḥ so 'gninā jyotiṣā bhāti ca tapati ca' (chā. 3.18.3)
GSP33brssbh2u:4156: 'sa vai vācameva prathamāmatyavahatsā yadā mṛtyumatyamucyata so 'gnirabhavat' (bṛ. 1.3.12)
GSP33brssbh2u:4168: sa prāṇo vācaṃ prathamāmudgīthakarmāṇi pradhānāṃ anṛtādipāpmarūpaṃ mṛtyumatītyāvahanmṛtyunā muktāṃ kṛtvā agnidevatātmatvaṃ prāpitavān /
GSP33brssbh2u:4169: yadapyuktaṃ devatānāmevādhiṣṭhātrīṇāṃ bhoktṛtvaprasaṅgo na śārīrasyeti tatparihriyate-
GSP33brssbh2u:4171: satīṣvapi prāṇānāmadhiṣṭātrīṣu devatāsu prāṇavatā kāryakaraṇasaṃghātasvāminā śārīreṇaivaiṣāṃ prāṇānāṃ saṃbandhaḥ śruteravagamyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:4172: tathāhi śrutiḥ - 'atha yatraitadākāśamanuviṣaṇṇaṃ cakṣuḥ sa cākṣuṣaḥ puruṣo darśanāya takṣuratha yo vededaṃ jighrāṇīti sa ātmā gandhāya ghrāṇam' (chā. 8.124)
GSP33brssbh2u:4176: FN: atha dehe prāgapraveśānantaraṃ yatra golake etacchidramanupraviṣṭaṃ cakṣurindriyaṃ tatra cakṣuṣyabhimānī sa ātmā cākṣuṣaḥ tasya rūpadarśanāya cakṣuḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:4178: tasya ca śārīrasyāsmiñśarīre bhoktṛtvena nityatvena puṇyapāpopalepasaṃbhavātsukhaduḥkhopabhogasaṃbhavācca na devatānām /
GSP33brssbh2u:4179: tā hi parasminnaiśvarye pade 'vatiṣṭhamānā na hine 'smiñśarīre bhoktṛtvaṃ pratilabdhumarhanti /
GSP33brssbh2u:4180: śrutiśca bhavati- 'puṇyamevāmuṃ gacchati na ha vai devānpāpaṃ gacchati' (bṛ. 1.5.3)
GSP33brssbh2u:4181: iti śārīreṇaiva ca nityaḥ prāṇānāṃ saṃbandha utkrāntyādiṣu tadanuvṛttidarśanāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:4184: tasmātsatīṣvapi karaṇānāṃ niyantrīṣu devatāsu na śārīrasya bhoktṛtvamapagacchati /
GSP33brssbh2u:4187: ta indriyāṇi tadvyapadeśād anyatra śreṣṭhāt / BBs_2,4.17 /
GSP33brssbh2u:4190: kiṃ mukhyasyaiva prāṇasya vṛttibhedā itare prāṇā āhosvittattvāntarāṇīti /
GSP33brssbh2u:4194: tathāhi śrutirmukhyamitarāṃśca prāṇānsaṃnidhāpya mukhyātmatāmitareṣāṃ khyāpayati- 'hantāsyaiva sarve rūpamasāmeti ta etasyaiva sarve rūpamabhavan' (bṛ. 1.5.21) iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:4198: tasmādyathaikasyaiva prāṇasya prāṇādyāḥ pañca vṛttaya evaṃ vāgādyā apyekādaśeti /
GSP33brssbh2u:4203: te prakṛtāḥ prāṇāḥ śreṣṭhaṃ varjayitvāvaśiṣṭā ekādaśenjadriyāṇītyucyante /
GSP33brssbh2u:4206: iti hyevañjātīyakeṣu pradeśeṣu pṛthakprāṇo vyapadiśyate pṛthaktcendriyāṇi /
GSP33brssbh2u:4211: prāṇasya tvindriyatvaṃ na śrutau smṛtau vā prasiddhamasti /
GSP33brssbh2u:4213: tattvaikatve tu sa evaikaḥ sanprāṇa indriyavyapadeśaṃ labhate na labhate ceti vipratiṣiddham /
GSP33brssbh2u:4215: FN: asyaiva mukhyaprāṇasya rūpaṃ asāma bhavemeti saṃkalpya,
GSP33brssbh2u:4219: bhedena vāgādibhyaḥ prāṇaḥ sarvatra śrūyate- 'te ha vācamūcuḥ' (bṛ. 1.3.2)
GSP33brssbh2u:4220: ityupakramya vāgādīnasurapāpmavidhvastānupanyasyopasaṃhṛtya vāgādiprakaraṇam 'atha hemamāsanyaṃ prāṇamūcuḥ' ityasuravidhvaṃsino mukhyasya prāṇasya pṛthagupakramāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:4221: tathā 'mano vācaṃ prāṇaṃ tānyātmane 'kuruta' ityevamādyā api bhedaśrutaya udāhartavyāḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:4226: suṣupteṣu vāgādiṣu mukhya eko jāgarti sa eva caiko mṛtyunānāpta āptāstvitare /
GSP33brssbh2u:4228: viṣayālocanahetutvaṃ cendriyāṇāṃ na prāṇasyevañjātīyako bhūyāllakṣaṇabhedaḥ prāṇendriyāṇām /
GSP33brssbh2u:4235: iti vāgādīnīndriyāṇyanukramya 'tāni mṛtyuḥ śramo bhūtvopayeme tasmācchrāmyatyeva
GSP33brssbh2u:4236: vāk' iti ca śramarūpeṇa mṛtyunā grastatvaṃ vāgādīnāmabhidhāya 'athemameva nāpnodyo
GSP33brssbh2u:4241: tasmāttadavirodhena vāgādiṣu parispandalābhasya prāṇāyattatvaṃ tadrūpabhavanaṃ vāgādīnāmiti mantavyaṃ na tādātmyam /
GSP33brssbh2u:4245: iti mukhyaprāṇaviṣayasyaiva prāṇaśabdasyendriyeṣu lākṣaṇikīṃ vṛttiṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssbh2u:4251: satprakriyāyāṃ tejobannānāṃ sṛṣṭimabhidhāyopadiśyate- 'seyaṃ devataikṣata hantāhamimāstisro devatā anena jīvenātmanānupraviśya nāmarūpe vyākaravāṇīti
GSP33brssbh2u:4256: yathā loke cāreṇāhaṃ parasainyamanupraviśya saṃkalayānītyevañjātīyake prayoge cārakartṛkameva
GSP33brssbh2u:4259: apica ḍitthaḍavitthādiṣu nāmasu ghaṭaśarāvādiṣu ca rūpeṣu jīvasyaiva vyākartṛtvaṃ dṛṣṭam /
GSP33brssbh2u:4267: tathā kuśakāśapalāśādiṣu paśumṛgamanuṣyādiṣu ca pratyākṛti prativyakti cānekaprakārā /
GSP33brssbh2u:4268: sā khalu parameśvarasyaiva tejobannānāṃ nirmātuḥ kṛtirbhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssbh2u:4270: tathāhi- 'seyaṃ devataikṣata' ityupakramya 'vyākaravāṇi' ityuttamapuruṣaprayogeṇa parasyaiva brahmaṇo vyākartṛtvamihopadiśyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:4275: tena hi saṃbandhe vyākaravāṇītyayaṃ devatāviṣaya uttamapuruṣa aupacārikaḥ kalpyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:4276: naca girinadīsamudrādiṣu nānāvidheṣu nāmarūpeṣvanīśvarasya jīvasya vyākaraṇasāmarthyamasti /
GSP33brssbh2u:4277: yeṣvapi cāsti sāmarthyaṃ teṣvapi parameśvarāyattameva tat /
GSP33brssbh2u:4278: naca jīvo nāma parameśvarādatyantabhinnaścāra iva rājñaḥ,
GSP33brssbh2u:4288: tacca trivṛtkaraṇamagnyādityacandravidyutsu śrutirdarśayati- 'yadagre rohitaṃ rūpaṃ tejasastadrūpaṃ yacchuklaṃ tadapāṃ yatkṛṣṇaṃ tadannasya' (chā. 6.4.1) ityādinā /
GSP33brssbh2u:4290: sati ca rūpavyākaraṇe viṣayapratilambhādagniritīdaṃ nāma vyākriyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:4292: anena cāgnyādyudāharaṇena bhaumāmbhasataijaseṣu triṣvapi dravyeṣvaviśeṣeṇa trivṛtkaraṇamuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssbh2u:4295: aviśeṣeṇaiva copasaṃhāraḥ - 'yadu rohitamivābhūditi tejasastadrūpam' ityevamādiḥ 'yadavijñātamivābhūdityetāsāmeva devatānāṃ samāsa iti' (chā. 6.4.6.7) evamantaḥ // 20 // @----------------------
GSP33brssbh2u:4297: tāsāṃ tisṛṇāmekaikāṃ devatāṃ tejobannātmanā tryātmikāṃ kariṣyāmīti śrutiḥ pañcīkaraṇopalakṣaṇārthā /
GSP33brssbh2u:4298: tāsāṃ tisṛṇāṃ devatānāṃ bahistrivṛtkṛtānāṃ satīnāmadhyātmamaparaṃ trivṛtkaraṇamuktam- 'imāstisro devatāḥ puruṣaṃ prāpya trivṛttrivṛdekaikā bhavati' (chā. 6.4.7) iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:4302: tathāhi śrutiḥ - 'annamaśitaṃ tredhā vidhīyate tasya yaḥ sthaviṣṭho dhātustatpurīṣaṃ bhavati yo madhyamastanmāṃsaṃ yo 'ṇiṣṭhastanmanaḥ' (chā. 6.5.1) iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:4310: atrāha- yadi sarvameva trivṛtkṛtaṃ bhūtabhautikamaviśeṣaśruteḥ 'tāsa trivṛtaṃ trivṛtamekaikāmakarot' iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:4311: kiṅkṛtastarhyayaṃ viśeṣavyapadeśaḥ 'idaṃ teja imā āpa idamannam' iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:4322: vyavahāraśca trivṛtkṛtarajjuvadekatvāpattau satyāṃ na bhedena bhūtatrayagocaro lokasya prasiddhyet /
GSP33brssbh2u:4323: tasmātsatyapi trivṛtkaraṇe vaiśeṣyādeva tejobannaviśeṣavādo bhūtabhautikaviṣaya upapadyate /
